original: Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: pañcaviṃśati sāhasrikā prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūte parvate
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūte parvate

original: mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair
analyzed: mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham pañca mātraiḥ bhikṣu sahasraiḥ sarvaiḥ arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇa āsravaiḥ

original: niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ
analyzed: niḥkleśaiḥ vaśībhūtaiḥ su vimukta cittaiḥ su vimukta prajñaiḥ ājāneyaiḥ mahā nāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ

original: kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ
analyzed: kṛta karaṇīyaiḥ apahṛta bhāraiḥ anuprāpta svaka arthaiḥ parikṣīṇa bhava saṃyojanaiḥ samyak ājñā su vimukta cittaiḥ

original: sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptaiḥ pañcamātrair bhikṣunīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś
analyzed: sarva cetaḥ vaśi parama pāramitā prāptaiḥ pañca mātraiḥ bhikṣunī śataiḥ upāsakaiḥ upāsikābhiḥ

original: ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair aparimāṇaiś ca bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
analyzed: ca sārdham sarvaiḥ dṛṣṭadharmaiḥ aparimāṇaiḥ ca bodhisattva koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ

original: sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir ānimittagocaraiḥ praṇidhānākalpitaiḥ
analyzed: sārdham sarvaiḥ dhāraṇī pratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatā vihāribhiḥ ā nimitta gocaraiḥ praṇidhāna a kalpitaiḥ

original: kṣāntisamatāpratilabdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair
analyzed: kṣānti samatā pratilabdhaiḥ asaṅga dhāraṇī pratilabdhaiḥ acyuta abhijñaiḥ ādeya vacanaiḥ

original: akūhakair alapakair apagatajñātralābhacittair nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair gambhīradharmakṣāntipāraṅgatair
analyzed: a kūhakaiḥ a lapakaiḥ apagata jñātra lābha cittaiḥ nirāmiṣa dharma deśakaiḥ gambhīra dharma kṣānti pāraṅga taiḥ

original: vaiśāradyaprāptair mārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ karmāvaraṇapratiprasrabdhair dharmapravicayavibhaktinirdeśakuśalair
analyzed: vaiśāradya prāptaiḥ māra karma samatikrāntaiḥ karma āvaraṇa pratiprasrabdhaiḥ dharma pravicaya vibhakti nirdeśa kuśalaiḥ

original: asaṃkhyeyakalpapraṇidhānasusamārabdhaiḥ smitamukhaiḥ pūrvālāpibhir vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair
analyzed: asaṃkhyeya kalpa praṇidhāna su samārabdhaiḥ smita mukhaiḥ pūrva ālāpibhiḥ vigata bhṛkuṭī mukhaiḥ

original: gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair apagatalīnacittair anācchedyapratibhānair anantaparṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgatair
analyzed: gāthābhiḥ gīta ālapana kuśalaiḥ apagata līna cittaiḥ an ācchedya pratibhānaiḥ ananta parṣad abhibhavana vaiśāradya samanvāgataiḥ

original: anantakalpakoṭīniḥsaraṇakuśalair māyāmarīcidakacandrasvapnapratiśrutkāpratibhāsapratibimbanirmāṇopamadharmādhimuktaiḥ
analyzed: ananta kalpa koṭī niḥsaraṇa kuśalaiḥ māyā marīci daka candra svapna pratiśrutkā pratibhāsa pratibimba nirmāṇa upama dharma adhimuktaiḥ

original: sattvagaticaritasūkṣmanānādhimuktyavatārakuśalair apratihatacittair adhimātrakṣāntisamanvāgatair
analyzed: sattva gati carita sūkṣma nānā adhimukti avatāra kuśalaiḥ apratihata cittaiḥ adhimātra kṣānti samanvāgataiḥ

original: yāthātmyāvatāraṇakuśalaiḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrānantavyūhapraṇidhānaprasthānaparigṛhītair
analyzed: yāthātmya avatāraṇa kuśalaiḥ sarva buddhakṣetra ananta vyūha praṇidhāna prasthāna parigṛhītaiḥ

original: asaṃkhyeyalokadhātubuddhānusmṛtisamāhitasatatasamitābhimukhībhūtair aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalair
analyzed: asaṃkhyeya lokadhātu buddha anusmṛti samāhita satata samitā abhimukhībhūtaiḥ aparimita buddha adhyeṣaṇa kuśalaiḥ

original: nānādṛṣṭyanuśayaparyavasthānakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaśatasahasranirhārakuśalaiḥ.
analyzed: nānā dṛṣṭi anuśaya paryavasthāna kleśa praśamana kuśalaiḥ samādhi vikrīḍita śata sahasra nirhāra kuśalaiḥ

original: tadyathā bhadrapālena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca
analyzed: tat yathā bhadrapālena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca

original: naradattena ca varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca (PvsP1-1: 2)
analyzed: naradattena ca varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca

original: indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣamatinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā
analyzed: indradattena ca uttara matinā ca viśeṣa matinā ca vardhamāna matinā ca amogha darśinā

original: ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhūreṇa ca
analyzed: ca susaṃprasthitena ca su vikrānta vikrāmiṇā ca nitya udyuktena ca a nikṣipta dhūreṇa ca

original: sūryagarbheṇa ca anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañjuśriyā
analyzed: sūryagarbheṇa ca anupama cintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañjuśriyā

original: ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityotkṣiptahastena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena,
analyzed: ca vajramatinā ca ratna mudrā hastena ca nitya utkṣipta hastena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: evaṃ pramukhair anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdham.
analyzed: evam pramukhaiḥ anekaiḥ bodhisattva koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ sārdham

original: atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ  #
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanam prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkam baddhvā ṛju kāyam praṇidhāya abhimukhīm smṛtim upasthāpya samādhi rājam

original: nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
analyzed: nāma samādhim samāpadyate sma

original: yatra sarvasamādhayo 'ntargamān saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: yatra sarva samādhayaḥ ntargamān saṃgraham samavasaraṇam gacchanti

original: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān saṃprajānan tasmāt samādheḥ vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣā sarva lokadhātum vyavalokya sarva kāyāt smitam akarot

original: tasyādhastāt pādatalayoḥ sahasrābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ,
analyzed: tasya adhastāt pāda talayoḥ sahasrābhyām cakrābhyām ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭī raśmi koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi niśceruḥ

original: daśabhyaḥ pādāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ,
analyzed: daśabhyaḥ pāda aṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭī raśmi koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi niśceruḥ

original: evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir gulphābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jaṅghābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām,
analyzed: evam ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭiḥ gulphābhyām ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭiḥ jaṅghābhyām ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭiḥ jānu maṇḍalābhyām

original: evaṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ hṛdayaśrīvatsān mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt,
analyzed: evam dvābhyām ūrubhyām kaṭi nābhi maṇḍalābhyām dvābhyām pārśvābhyām hṛdaya śrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇāt

original: evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām aṃśābhyām,
analyzed: evam ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭiḥ daśabhyaḥ hasta aṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭiḥ dvābhyām bāhubhyām ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭiḥ dvābhyām aṃśābhyām

original: evaṃ grīvāyāś catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ
analyzed: evam grīvāyāḥ catvāriṃśadbhyaḥ dantebhyaḥ dvābhyām ghrāṇābhyām dvābhyām śrotrābhyām

original: dvābhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyād ūrṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
analyzed: dvābhyām cakṣurbhyām madhyāt ūrṇāyāḥ upariṣṭāt uṣṇīṣāt ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭī raśmi koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi

original: niśceruḥ. yai raśmibhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt parisphuṭaḥ,
analyzed: niśceruḥ yaiḥ raśmibhiḥ ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ avabhāsitaḥ bhūt parisphuṭaḥ

original: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan,
analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ tena mahatā raśmi avabhāsena sphuṭāḥ avabhāsitāḥ ca abhūvan

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttara pūrvasyām pūrva dakṣiṇasyām dakṣiṇa paścimāyām

original: paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā
analyzed: paścima uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ tena mahatā

original: raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan,
analyzed: raśmi avabhāsena sphuṭāḥ avabhāsitāḥ ca abhūvan

original: ye ca sattvās tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ tena mahatā raśmi avabhāsena sphuṭāḥ avabhāsitāḥ te sarve niyatāḥ abhūvan anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarva romakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot

original: ekaikataś ca romakūpāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭīraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ,
analyzed: ekaikataḥ ca romakūpāt ṣaṣṭi ṣaṣṭī raśmi koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi niśceruḥ

original: yair ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt,
analyzed: yaiḥ ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭaḥ bhūt

original: taiś ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamāḥ sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan,
analyzed: taiḥ ca pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ sarva lokadhātavaḥ vabhāsena avabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāḥ ca abhūvan

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām uttara pūrvasyām pūrva dakṣiṇasyām dakṣiṇa paścimāyām

original: paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsenāvabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan,
analyzed: paścima uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ vabhāsena avabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāḥ ca abhūvan

original: tena ca raśmyavabhāsenaye sattvāḥ spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
analyzed: tena ca raśmyavabhāsena ye sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ te sarve niyatāḥ abhūvan anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānām bhagavatām prakṛti prabhā tayā prabhayā tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa

original: yāvat sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tayā prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan,
analyzed: yāvat sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ tayā prabhayā avabhāsitāḥ abhūvan

original: ye ca sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭāḥ te sarve niyatāḥ abhūvan anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayāmāsa,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām jihvā indriyam nirṇāmayāmāsa

original: yenemaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa,
analyzed: yena imam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum jihvā indriyeṇa ācchādayāmāsa

original: trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāj jihvendriyāt smitam akarot,
analyzed: tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum jihvā indriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāt jihvā indriyāt smitam akarot

original: yato 'nekāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ,
analyzed: yatas nekāni raśmi koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi niśceruḥ

original: raśmimukhe caikaikasminn uttamamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāny utpannāny abhūvan,
analyzed: raśmi mukhe ca ekaikasmin uttama mayāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni utpannāni abhūvan

original: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇāḥ saṃsthitāś cābhūvan dharmaṃ deśayanto yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
analyzed: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddha vigrahāḥ niṣaṇṇāḥ saṃsthitāḥ ca abhūvan dharmam deśayantaḥ yat uta imām eva ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktām dharma deśanām

original: te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamavyativṛttāsaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
analyzed: te pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upama vyativṛtta asaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānām dharmam deśayanti sma

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu,
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt ūrdhvam diś vidikṣu

original: ekaikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma,
analyzed: ekaikasyām ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānām dharmam deśayanti sma

original: yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
analyzed: yat uta imām eva ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktām dharma deśanām

original: ye ca sattvās tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śmvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ tām dharma deśanām te niyatāḥ bhavanti anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasmin eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitam nāma samādhim samāpede

original: tathārūpaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram  #
analyzed: tathārūpam ca ṛddhi abhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma yathārūpeṇa ṛddhi abhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ ṣaṣ vikāram

original: akampata prākampata saṃprākampata,
analyzed: akampata prākampata saṃprākampata

original: acalat prācalat saṃprācalat,
analyzed: acalat prācalat saṃprācalat

original: avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat,
analyzed: avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat

original: araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat,
analyzed: araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat

original: akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat,
analyzed: akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat

original: agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat,
analyzed: agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat

original: ante unnamati madhye avanamati,
analyzed: ante unnamati madhye avanamati

original: madhye unnamati ante avanamati,
analyzed: madhye unnamati ante avanamati

original: mṛdukaḥ snigdhaḥ sarvasattvasukhajanano 'bhūt.
analyzed: mṛdukaḥ snigdhaḥ sarva sattva sukha jananaḥ bhūt

original: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau nirayā vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ śūnyā
analyzed: atha khalu tena kṣaṇa lava muhūrtena ye smin tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau nirayāḥ vā tiryagyonayaḥ vā yama lokāḥ vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ śūnyā

original: sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan,
analyzed: sarva akṣaṇāḥ ca astamitāḥ abhūvan

original: ye ca sattvās tābhyo narakatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve tenaiva prītiprāmodhyena manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan,
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ tābhyaḥ naraka tiryagyoni yama loka gatibhyaḥ cyutāḥ te sarve tena eva prīti prāmodhyena manuṣyāṇām sabhā gatāyām upapannāḥ ca abhūvan

original: evaṃ cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan.
analyzed: evam cāturmahārājikānām devānām trayastriṃśānām yāmānām tuṣitānām nirmāṇaratīnām paranirmitavaśavartinām devānām sabhā gatāyām upapannāḥ ca abhūvan

original: atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny anusmaranti sma,
analyzed: atha khalu te manuṣyāḥ te ca devāḥ bhagavataḥ eva anubhāvena pūrva janmāni anusmaranti sma

original: anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
analyzed: anusmṛtya ca tena eva prīti prāmodyena yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ

original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir abhivandya bhagavantaṃ prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma,
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhiḥ abhivandya bhagavantam prāñjalayaḥ bhūtvā namasyanti sma

original: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ
analyzed: evam pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām

original: vidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasmin digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu
analyzed: vidikṣu ūrdhvam adhas samantāt daśasu dikṣu ekaikasmin digbhāge gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu sarve nirayāḥ sarvās tiryagyonayaḥ sarve yamalokāḥ samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan,
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu sarve nirayāḥ sarvāḥ tiryagyonayaḥ sarve yama lokāḥ samucchinnāḥ śūnyāḥ abhūvan

original: sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan,
analyzed: sarva akṣaṇāḥ ca astamitāḥ abhūvan

original: ye ca sattvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma,
analyzed: ye ca sattvāḥ tābhyaḥ niraya tiryagyoni yama loka gatibhyaḥ cyutāḥ te sarve deva manuṣyeṣu upapadyante sma

original: te ca devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvanivāsam (PvsP1-1: 5)
analyzed: te ca deva manuṣyeṣu upapannāḥ bhagavataḥ eva anubhāvena pūrva nivāsam

original: anusmaranti sma,
analyzed: anusmaranti sma

original: anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhā bhagavanta utpannās teṣām antikān upasaṃkrāntāḥ,
analyzed: anusmṛtya ca tena eva prīti prāmodyena svaka svakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ utpannāḥ teṣām antikān upasaṃkrāntāḥ

original: upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pādavandanāṃ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā bhagavato namasyanti sma.
analyzed: upasaṃkramya teṣām buddhānām bhagavatām pāda vandanām kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayaḥ bhūtvā bhagavataḥ namasyanti sma

original: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ sattvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma,
analyzed: atha khalu ye smin tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau jāti andhāḥ sattvāḥ te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma

original: vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇvanti sma,
analyzed: vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śṛṇvanti sma

original: unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma,
analyzed: unmattāḥ smṛtim pratilabhante sma

original: vikṣiptacittā ekāgracittā bhavanti sma,
analyzed: vikṣipta cittāḥ ekāgra cittāḥ bhavanti sma

original: jighatsitāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhavanti sma,
analyzed: jighatsitāḥ pūrṇa gātrāḥ bhavanti sma

original: tṛṣitā vigatapipāsā bhavanti sma,
analyzed: tṛṣitāḥ vigata pipāsāḥ bhavanti sma

original: rogaspṛṣṭā vigatarogā bhavanti sma,
analyzed: roga spṛṣṭāḥ vigata rogāḥ bhavanti sma

original: hīnendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti sma,
analyzed: hīna indriyāḥ paripūrṇa indriyāḥ bhavanti sma

original: avirahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntājīvā virahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmāntājīvāś ca bhavanti sma,
analyzed: avirahita akuśala kāya vāc manaḥ karmānta ajīvāḥ virahita akuśala kāya vāc manaḥ karmānta ajīvāḥ ca bhavanti sma

original: sarvasattvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma,
analyzed: sarva sattvāḥ ca mātā pitṛ sama cittāḥ bhavanti sma

original: bhrātṛbhaginīsamacittā mitrāmātyajñātisālohitasamacittā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaś ca bhavanti sma,
analyzed: bhrātṛ bhaginī sama cittāḥ mitra amātya jñāti sālohita sama cittāḥ daśa kuśala karma patha sevinaḥ ca bhavanti sma

original: brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmayagandhāḥ sarvasattvāś ca sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ
analyzed: brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayaḥ nirāmaya gandhāḥ sarva sattvāḥ ca sarva sukha samarpitāḥ īdṛśam sukham

original: pratilabhante sma tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasminn eva ca
analyzed: pratilabhante sma tat yathā api nāma tṛtīya dhyāna samāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasmin eva ca

original: samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā te samanvāgatā bhavanti sma,
analyzed: samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā te samanvāgatāḥ bhavanti sma

original: yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānayanti sma. sādhu damaḥ asādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇo brahmacaryāvāsaḥ sādhu
analyzed: yat anya buddhakṣetra sthāḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ evam udānayanti sma sādhu damaḥ asādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇaḥ brahmacarya āvāsaḥ sādhu

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasmin eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ

original: imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
analyzed: imam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma

original: ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca,
analyzed: ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca

original: pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati  #
analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt ūrdhvam diś vidikṣu gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya tathāgataḥ tiṣṭhati  /

original: bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
analyzed: bhāsate tapati virocate sma

original: ābhayā varnena śriyā tejasā ca,
analyzed: ābhayā varnena śriyā tejasā ca

original: tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvaparvatān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma sumeruḥ parvata rājaḥ sarva parvatān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate smaḥ ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca

original: evam eva bhagavān (PvsP1-1: 6)
analyzed: evam eva bhagavān

original: sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma,
analyzed: sarva lokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma

original: ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca.
analyzed: ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca

original: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvānām ātmabhāvas tat samānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛś tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sattvānām ātma bhāvaḥ tat samānam ātma bhāvam prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa

original: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā
analyzed: atha khalu ye smin tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsa kāyikāḥ devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ

original: ābhāsvarā brahmakāyikā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaś ca nirmāṇaratayaś ca tuṣitāś
analyzed: ābhāsvarāḥ brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ ca nirmāṇaratayaḥ ca tuṣitāḥ

original: ca yāmāś ca trāyastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca devās te taṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakam
analyzed: ca yāmāḥ ca trāyastriṃśāḥ ca cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ ca devāḥ te tam tathāgatasya asecanakam

original: ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyāḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantīr
analyzed: ātma bhāvam dṛṣṭvā divyāḥ puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chattra dhvaja patākā vaijayantīḥ

original: gṛhītvā divyāni utpalakumudasaugandhikapuṇḍarīkapadmāni gṛhītvā divyāni ca keśaratamālapatrāṇi
analyzed: gṛhītvā divyāni utpala kumuda saugandhika puṇḍarīka padmāni gṛhītvā divyāni ca keśara tamāla patrāṇi

original: gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
analyzed: gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasya asecanakaḥ ātmabhāvaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ

original: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyās te 'pi taṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakam
analyzed: ye ca iha tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyāḥ te tam tathāgatasya asecanakam

original: ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ.
analyzed: ātma bhāvam dṛṣṭvā sthala jala jāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasya asecanakaḥ ātma bhāvaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntāḥ

original: atha khalu te devās te ca mānuṣās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhis
analyzed: atha khalu te devāḥ te ca mānuṣāḥ tābhiḥ divyābhiḥ puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chattra dhvaja patākā vaijayantībhiḥ

original: taiś ca sthalajalajaiḥ puṣpais taṃ tathāgatakāyam avakiranti sma,
analyzed: taiḥ ca sthala jala jaiḥ puṣpaiḥ tam tathāgata kāyam avakiranti sma

original: abhyavakiranti sma.
analyzed: abhyavakiranti sma

original: atha khalu yais taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantīvarṣaiḥ
analyzed: atha khalu yaiḥ taiḥ puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chattra dhvaja patākā vaijayantī varṣaiḥ

original: sthalajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān avakīrṇas tāni ca sarvāṇi uparyantarīkṣe bhagavato
analyzed: sthala jala jaiḥ ca puṣpaiḥ bhagavān avakīrṇaḥ tāni ca sarvāṇi upari antarīkṣe

original: 'dhiṣṭhānena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātupramāṇam ekaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ saṃsthitam abhūt,
analyzed: dhiṣṭhānena tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra lokadhātu pramāṇam ekam kūṭāgāram saṃsthitam abhūt

original: tataś ca kūṭāgārāt tāni divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante pralambante sma,
analyzed: tatas ca kūṭāgārāt tāni divyāni puṣpa paṭṭa dāmāni lambante pralambante sma

original: taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ paṭṭadāmabhiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīvāśobhata,
analyzed: taiḥ ca puṣpa dāmabhiḥ paṭṭa dāmabhiḥ ca ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ atīva aśobhata

original: tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitāś
analyzed: tena ca suvarṇa varṇena bhagavataḥ prabhā avabhāsena daśasu dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭa avabhāsitāḥ

original: asmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarveṣu cāturdvīpakeṣu lokadhātuṣu teṣāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ (PvsP1-1: 7)
analyzed: asmin ca tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sarveṣu cāturdvīpakeṣu lokadhātuṣu teṣām deva manuṣyāṇām

original: ca ekaikasyaitad abhūt,
analyzed: ca ekaikasya etat abhūt

original: mama puratas tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayatīti.
analyzed: mama puratas tathāgataḥ niṣaṇṇaḥ dharmam deśayati iti

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva smitam akarot,
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasmin eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva smitam akarot

original: yena smitāvabhāsenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt,
analyzed: yena smita avabhāsena ayam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ sphuṭaḥ bhūt

original: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
analyzed: yāvat daśasu dikṣu gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāḥ abhūvan

original: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma
analyzed: ye ca iha tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ te sarve pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma

original: tasyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ
analyzed: tasyām ca pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ te sarve imām

original: sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena. evaṃ
analyzed: sahā lokadhātum paśyanti sma śākyamunim ca tathāgatam sārdham bhikṣu saṃghena evam

original: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttara pūrvasyām pūrva dakṣiṇasyām dakṣiṇa paścimāyām

original: paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāge gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān
analyzed: paścima uttarasyām adhas ūrdhvam digbhāge gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān

original: bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān,
analyzed: bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma sa śrāvaka saṃghān

original: teṣu ca gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena.
analyzed: teṣu ca gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ te sarve imām sahā lokadhātum paśyanti sma śākyamunim ca tathāgatam sārdham bhikṣu saṃghena

original: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko
analyzed: atha khalu pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyaḥ yaḥ sarvāvasānikaḥ

original: lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
analyzed: lokadhātuḥ ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaraḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
analyzed: saḥ imām eva prajñāpāramitām bodhisattvānām dharmam deśayati

original: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
analyzed: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmiḥ nāma bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tam mahāntam avabhāsam

original: dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam ca mahāntam pṛthivīcālam tam ca bhagavataḥ secanakam ātmabhāvam dṛṣṭvā

original: yena bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
analyzed: yena bhagavān ratnākaraḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena upasaṃkrāmat upasaṃkramya

original: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat:
analyzed: tasya bhagavataḥ pādau abhivandya tam tathāgatam ratnākaram etat avocat

original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
analyzed: kaḥ bhagavan hetuḥ

original: kaḥ pratyayo?

analyzed: vandanāya paryupāsanāya tān ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumāra bhūtān

analyzed: yena ca śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: dārikās tataḥ sarvaśokāpagatāyā lokadhātoḥ vigataśokena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
analyzed: dārikāḥ tatas sarva śoka apagatāyāḥ lokadhātoḥ vigataśokena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
analyzed: sārdham āgatāḥ svaka svakaiḥ kuśala mūlaiḥ bhagavantam śākyamunim satkṛtya gurukṛtya

original: saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
analyzed: saṃmānya saṃpūjya ekānte nyaṣīdan

original: atha khalu paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko
analyzed: atha khalu paścimāyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyaḥ yaḥ sarvāvasānikaḥ

original: lokadhātur upaśāntā nāma tatra ratnārcir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
analyzed: lokadhātuḥ upaśāntā nāma tatra ratnārciḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
analyzed: saḥ imām eva prajñāpāramitām bodhisattvānām dharmam deśayati

original: atha tatra lokadhātau cāritramatir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
analyzed: atha tatra lokadhātau cāritramatiḥ nāma bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tam mahāntam avabhāsam

original: dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam ca mahāntam pṛthivīcālam tam ca bhagavataḥ secanakam ātmabhāvam dṛṣṭvā

original: yena bhagavān ratnārcis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya
analyzed: yena bhagavān ratnārciḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena upasaṃkrāmat upasaṃkramya

original: tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnārciṣam etad avocat:
analyzed: tasya bhagavataḥ pādau abhivandya tam tathāgatam ratna arciṣam etat avocat

original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
analyzed: kaḥ bhagavan hetuḥ

original: kaḥ pratyayo?
analyzed: kaḥ pratyayaḥ

original: 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
analyzed: sya mahataḥ vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca tathāgatasya asecanaka ātma bhāvasya saṃdarśanāya

original: evam ukte ratnārciḥ tathāgataḥ cāritramatiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte ratnārciḥ tathāgataḥ cāritramatim bodhisattvam etat avocat

original: asti kulaputretaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas  #
analyzed: asti kula putra itas pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamuniḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
analyzed: tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
analyzed: sa bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām saṃprakāśayati tasya ayam īdṛśaḥ nubhāvaḥ

original: atha khalu cāritramatir bodhisattvo ratnārciṣaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu cāritramatiḥ bodhisattvaḥ ratnārciṣam tathāgatam etat avocat

original: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca (PvsP1-1: 12)
analyzed: gamiṣyāmi aham bhagavan tām sahām lokadhātum tam ca

original: śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān
analyzed: śākyamunim tathāgatam darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tān ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān

original: bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramitāṅ gatān.
analyzed: bhūyas tvena kumāra bhūtān dhāraṇī pratilabdhān samādhi nirhāra kuśalān sarva samādhi vaśi pāramitām gatān

original: sa bhagavān āha:
analyzed: sa bhagavān āha

original: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
analyzed: gaccha tvam kula putra yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: atha khalu ratnārcis tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni cāritramataye bodhisattvāya prādāt,
analyzed: atha khalu ratnārciḥ tathāgataḥ nānā ratna mayāni suvarṇa avabhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni cāritramataye bodhisattvāya prādāt

original: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
analyzed: etaiḥ tvam kula putra padmaiḥ tam śākyamunim tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ

original: evañ ca vadeḥ,
analyzed: evam ca vadeḥ

original: ratnārcir bhagavān bhagavantam alpabādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
analyzed: ratnārciḥ bhagavān bhagavantam alpa bādha tām paripṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām laghu utthāna tām yātrām balam sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca paripṛcchati

original: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnārciṣā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
analyzed: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnārciṣā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ iti

original: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: saṃprajāna kārī ca tvam kula putra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
analyzed: durāsadāḥ hi te bodhisattvāḥ ye tatra sahāyām lokadhātau upapannāḥ

original: atha khalu cāritramatir bodhisattvo ratnārciṣas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni
analyzed: atha khalu cāritramatiḥ bodhisattvaḥ ratnārciṣaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānā ratna mayāni

original: padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
analyzed: padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi anekaiḥ bodhisattva koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ

original: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ paścimāyāṃ
analyzed: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiḥ ca dārakaiḥ dārikābhiḥ ca sārdham parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ paścimāyām

original: diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
analyzed: diśi teṣu gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan

original: mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir

original: yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ,
analyzed: yena iyam sahā lokadhātuḥ tena saṃprāptaḥ

original: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgatas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
analyzed: yena ca śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat,
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya ekānte tiṣṭhat

original: ekānte sthitaś ca cāritramatir bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
analyzed: ekānte sthitaḥ ca cāritra matiḥ bodhisattvaḥ bhagavantam śākyamunim etat avocat

original: ratnārcir bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
analyzed: ratnārciḥ bhagavān bhagavantam alpa ābādha tām paripṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām laghu utthāna tām yātrām balam sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca paripṛcchati

original: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnārciṣā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
analyzed: imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnārciṣā tathāgatena nānā ratna mayāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā (PvsP1-1: 13)
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ tāni padmāni gṛhītvā

original: yena te paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
analyzed: yena te paścimāyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ tena prākṣipat

original: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
analyzed: taiḥ ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāḥ abhūvan

original: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām,
analyzed: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddha vigrahāḥ niṣaṇṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmam deśayanti yat uta imām eva prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktām dharma deśanām

analyzed: atha khalu te bodhisattvāḥ te ca gṛhasthāḥ te ca pravrajitāḥ te ca dārakāḥ tāḥ ca

original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat,
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya ekānte tiṣṭhat

original: ekānte sthitaś ca jayadatto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
analyzed: ekānte sthitaḥ ca jayadattaḥ bodhisattvaḥ bhagavantam śākyamunim etat avocat

original: jayendro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
analyzed: jaya indraḥ bhagavān bhagavantam alpa ābādha tām paripṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām laghu utthāna tām yātrām balam sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca paripṛcchati

original: imāni ca tena bhagavatā jayendreṇa tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
analyzed: imāni ca tena bhagavatā jayendreṇa tathāgatena nānā ratna mayāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena (PvsP1-1: 15)
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ tena

original: prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
analyzed: prākṣipat taiḥ ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāḥ abhūvan

original: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ,
analyzed: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddha vigrahāḥ niṣaṇṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmam deśayanti yat uta imām eva prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktām dharma deśanām

original: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
analyzed: yaiḥ ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ te niyatāḥ abhūvan anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca
analyzed: atha khalu te bodhisattvāḥ te ca gṛhasthāḥ te ca pravrajitāḥ te ca dārakāḥ tāḥ ca

original: dārikās tato jayāyā lokadhātoḥ jayadattena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ
analyzed: dārikāḥ tatas jayāyāḥ lokadhātoḥ jayadattena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdham āgatāḥ

original: svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
analyzed: svaka svakaiḥ kuśala mūlaiḥ bhagavantam śākyamunim satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjya ekānte nyaṣīdan

original: atha khalv uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo
analyzed: atha khalu uttara pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyaḥ

original: yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātuḥ samādhyalaṅkṛtā nāma tatra samādhihastyuttaraśrīr nāma
analyzed: yaḥ sarvāvasānikaḥ lokadhātuḥ samādhyalaṅkṛtā nāma tatra samādhihastyuttaraśrīḥ nāma

original: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
analyzed: tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
analyzed: saḥ imām eva prajñāpāramitām bodhisattvānām dharmam deśayati

original: atha tatra lokadhātau vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
analyzed: atha tatra lokadhātau vijayavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tam mahāntam avabhāsam

original: dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavato 'secanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam ca mahāntam pṛthivīcālam tam ca bhagavataḥ secanakam ātmabhāvam dṛṣṭvā

original: yena bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad
analyzed: yena bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena upasaṃkrāmat

original: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv abhivandya bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ samādhihastyuttaraśriyam etad avocat:
analyzed: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau abhivandya bhagavantam tathāgatam samādhi hasti uttara śriyam etat avocat

original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?
analyzed: kaḥ bhagavan hetuḥ

original: kaḥ pratyayo?
analyzed: kaḥ pratyayaḥ

original: 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya cāsecanakasya tathāgatātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya.
analyzed: mahataḥ vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca asecanakasya tathāgata ātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya

original: evam ukte bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato vijayavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān samādhihastyuttaraśrīḥ tathāgataḥ vijayavikrāmiṇam bodhisattvam etat avocat

original: asti kulaputreto dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya
analyzed: asti kula putra itas dakṣiṇa paścimāyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamān lokadhātūn atikramya

original: sahā nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
analyzed: sahāḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra śākyamuniḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃprakāśayati,
analyzed: sa bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām saṃprakāśayati

original: tasyāyam īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ.
analyzed: tasya ayam īdṛśaḥ nubhāvaḥ

original: atha khalu vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyaṃ tathāgatam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyam tathāgatam etat avocat

original: gamiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahālokadhātun (PvsP1-1: 16)
analyzed: gamiṣyāmi aham bhagavan tām sahā lokadhātun

original: tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān
analyzed: tam ca śākyamunim tathāgatam darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tān ca bodhisattvān

original: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumārabhūtān dhāraṇīpratilabdhān samādhinirhārakuśalān sarvasamādhivaśipāramiṅ gatān.
analyzed: mahāsattvān bhūyastvena kumāra bhūtān dhāraṇī pratilabdhān samādhi nirhāra kuśalān sarva samādhi vaśi pāramiṅ gatān

original: sa bhagavān āha:
analyzed: sa bhagavān āha

original: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase.
analyzed: gaccha tvam kula putra yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: atha khalu samādhihastyuttaraśrīs tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāṇi vijayavikrāmiṇe bodhisattvāya prādāt,
analyzed: atha khalu samādhihastyuttaraśrīḥ tathāgataḥ nānā ratna mayāni suvarṇa avabhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāṇi vijayavikrāmiṇe bodhisattvāya prādāt

original: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmaiḥ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
analyzed: etaiḥ tvam kula putra padmaiḥ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ

original: evaṃ ca vadeḥ,
analyzed: evam ca vadeḥ

original: samādhihastyuttaraśrīr bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānetāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
analyzed: samādhi hastyuttara śrīḥ bhagavantam alpa ābādha tām paripṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām laghūtthāna itām yātrām balam sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca paripṛcchati

original: imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,

analyzed: saṃprajāna kārī ca tvam kula putra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
analyzed: durāsadāḥ hi te bodhisattvāḥ ye tatra sahāyām lokadhātau upapannāḥ

original: atha vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhihastyuttaraśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni
analyzed: atha vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvaḥ samādhi hastyuttara śriyaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni

analyzed: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiḥ ca dārakaiḥ dārikābhiḥ ca sārdham parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ uttara pūrvasyām

original: yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ,
analyzed: yena iyam sahā lokadhātuḥ tena saṃprāptaḥ

original: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat,

original: ekānte sthitaś ca vijayavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:

original: samādhisastyuttaraśrīr bhagavan bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchati,
analyzed: samādhisastyuttaraśrīḥ bhagavan bhagavantam alpa ābādha tām paripṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām laghu utthāna tām yātrām balam sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca paripṛcchati

original: imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
analyzed: imāni ca tena bhagavatā samādhihastyuttaraśriyā tathāgatena nānā ratna mayāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena (PvsP1-1:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te uttara pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ tena

original: prākṣipat, taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan. teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā
analyzed: prākṣipat taiḥ ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāḥ abhūvan teṣu ca padmeṣu buddha vigrahā

analyzed: dharma deśanām yaiḥ ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ te niyatāḥ abhūvan anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

analyzed: atha khalu te bodhisattvāḥ te ca gṛhasthāḥ te ca pravrajitāḥ te ca dārakāḥ tāḥ ca

original: saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
analyzed: saṃmānya saṃpūjya ekānte nyaṣīdan

analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam ca mahāntam pṛthivīcālam tam ca bhagavataḥ secanakam ātmabhāvam dṛṣṭvā

analyzed: gaccha tvam kula putra yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: atha khalu padmottaraśrī tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni padmahastāya bodhisattvāya prādāt,
analyzed: atha khalu padmottaraśrī tathāgataḥ nānā ratna mayāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni padmahastāya bodhisattvāya prādāt

original: etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ,
analyzed: etaiḥ tvam kula putra padmaiḥ tam śākyamunim tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ

original: evañ ca vadeḥ,
analyzed: evam ca vadeḥ

original: padmottaraśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
analyzed: padma uttara śrīḥ bhagavān bhagavantam alpa ābādha tām paripṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām laghu utthāna tām yātrām balam sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca paripṛcchati

original: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmottaśriyā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti,
analyzed: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmottaśriyā tathāgatena arhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ iti

original: saṃprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: saṃprajāna kārī ca tvam kula putra tatra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ.
analyzed: durāsadāḥ hi te bodhisattvāḥ ye tatra sahāyām lokadhātau upapannāḥ

original: atha khalu padmahasto bodhisattvaḥ padmottaraśriyas tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi,
analyzed: atha khalu padmahastaḥ bodhisattvaḥ padmottaraśriyaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni nānā ratna mayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi

original: anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikābhiś
analyzed: anekaiḥ bodhisattva koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiḥ ca dārakaiḥ dārikābhiḥ

original: ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu
analyzed: ca sārdham parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇasyām diśi teṣu gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchattradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhir
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chattra dhvaja patākā vaijayantībhiḥ

original: yeneyaṃ sahālokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ,
analyzed: yena iyam sahā lokadhātuḥ tena saṃprāptaḥ

original: yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
analyzed: yena ca śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ

original: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte 'tiṣṭhat,
analyzed: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya ekānte tiṣṭhat

original: ekāntasthitaś ca padmahasto bodhisattvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim etad avocat:
analyzed: ekānta sthitaḥ ca padma hastaḥ bodhisattvaḥ bhagavantam śākyamunim etat avocat

original: padmottaraśrī bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchati,
analyzed: padma uttara śrīḥ bhagavān bhagavantam alpa ābādha tām paripṛcchati alpa ātaṅka tām laghu utthāna tām yātrām balam sukha sparśa vihāra tām ca paripṛcchati

original: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmottaraśriyā tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ.
analyzed: imāni ca tena bhagavatā padmottaraśriyā tathāgatena nānā ratna mayāni suvarṇa nirbhāsāni sahasra patrāṇi padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā (PvsP1-1: 19)
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tathāgataḥ tāni padmāni gṛhītvā

original: yena te pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat,
analyzed: yena te pūrva dakṣiṇasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ tena prākṣipat

original: taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan,
analyzed: taiḥ ca padmaiḥ te lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāḥ abhūvan

original: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti yad utemām eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ,
analyzed: teṣu ca padmeṣu buddha vigrahāḥ niṣaṇṇakāḥ teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu dharmam deśayanti yat uta imām eva prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktām dharma deśanām

original: yaiś ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
analyzed: yaiḥ ca sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ te niyatāḥ abhūvan anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau

original: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās te ca dārakās tāś ca
analyzed: atha khalu te bodhisattvāḥ te ca gṛhasthāḥ te ca pravrajitāḥ te ca dārakāḥ tāḥ ca

original: dārikās tato bodhimaṇḍālaṃkārasurucirāyā lokadhātoḥ padmahastena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
analyzed: dārikāḥ tatas bodhimaṇḍa alaṃkāra su rucirāyāḥ lokadhātoḥ padmahastena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: sārdham āgatāḥ svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
analyzed: sārdham āgatāḥ svaka svakaiḥ kuśala mūlaiḥ bhagavantam śākyamunim satkṛtya gurukṛtya

original: saṃmānya saṃpūjyaikānte nyaṣīdan.
analyzed: saṃmānya saṃpūjya ekānte nyaṣīdan

original: atha khalu dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo

original: yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātur vigatarajaḥsañcayā nāma tatra sūryamaṇḍalaprabhāsottamaśrīr

analyzed: nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.

original: atha tatra lokadhātau sūryaprabhāso nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
analyzed: atha tatra lokadhātau sūryaprabhāsaḥ nāma bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tam mahāntam avabhāsam

analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam ca mahāntam pṛthivīcālam tam ca bhagavataḥ secanakam ātmabhāvam dṛṣṭvā

original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ?

original: kaḥ pratyayo?

analyzed: mahataḥ vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya asya ca asecanakasya tathāgata ātmabhāvasya saṃdarśanāya

analyzed: kaḥ pratyayaḥ

original: upariṣṭād diśi divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadībālukopamān buddhān bhagavato draṣṭukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.

analyzed: ye paścimāyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ nānā buddhakṣetreṣu upapannāḥ tān sarvān buddha śabdam dharma śabdam saṃgha śabdam saṃśrāvayitu kāmena

analyzed: tān ca sattvān samyak dṛṣṭyām pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: ye adhastād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,

original: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: tān ca sattvān samyak dṛṣṭyām pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: ye upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣūpapannās tān sarvān buddhaśabdaṃ dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ saṃśrāvayitukāmena,
analyzed: ye upariṣṭāt diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ nānā buddhakṣetreṣu upapannāḥ tān sarvān buddha śabdam dharma śabdam saṃgha śabdam saṃśrāvayitu kāmena

original: tāṃś ca sattvān samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: tān ca sattvān samyak dṛṣṭyām pratiṣṭhāpayitu kāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: iti dharmoddānasahagata ānandaśabdopamaḥ
analyzed: iti dharma uddāna sahagataḥ ānanda śabda upamaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā andhās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu sarva buddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvāḥ andhāḥ te mama anubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi

original: drakṣyantīti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam. evaṃ vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyantīti,
analyzed: drakṣyanti iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam evam vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śroṣyanti iti

original: unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilapsyanta iti,
analyzed: unmattāḥ smṛtim pratilapsyante iti

original: nagnāś cailāni pratilapsyanta iti,
analyzed: nagnāḥ cailāni pratilapsyante iti

original: adṛṣṭasatyān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
analyzed: adṛṣṭa satyān srotaāpatti phale pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iti

original: sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
analyzed: sakṛdāgāmi phale anāgāmi phale arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iti

original: pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
analyzed: pratyeka bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iti

original: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: iti ekāyanamārgasahagato nadīsrotopamaḥ
analyzed: iti ekāyana mārga sahagataḥ nadī srota upamaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgateryāpathe śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgata īryāpathe śikṣitu kāmena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kadā nv ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam avalokayiṣyāmīti,
analyzed: kadā nu aham nāgāvalokitam avalokayiṣyāmi iti

original: kim ity ahaṃ pṛthīvīṃ caturaṅgulam aspṛśan padbhyāṃ gaccheyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: kim iti aham pṛthīvīm caturaṅgulam a spṛśan padbhyām gaccheyam iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim ity ahaṃ cāturmahārājakāyikais trayastriṃśair yāmais tuṣitair nirmāṇaratibhiḥ
analyzed: kim iti aham cāturmahārājakāyikaiḥ trayastriṃśaiḥ yāmaiḥ tuṣitaiḥ nirmāṇaratibhiḥ

original: paranirmitavaśavartibhir brahmakāyikair brahmapurohitair brahmapāriṣadyaiḥ parīttābhair
analyzed: paranirmitavaśavartibhiḥ brahmakāyikaiḥ brahmapurohitaiḥ brahma pāriṣadyaiḥ parītta ābhaiḥ

original: apramāṇābhair ābhāsvaraiḥ parīttaśubhair apramāṇaśubhaiḥ śubhakṛtsnair anabhrakaiḥ
analyzed: apramāṇābhaiḥ ābhāsvaraiḥ parīttaśubhaiḥ apramāṇaśubhaiḥ śubhakṛtsnaiḥ anabhrakaiḥ

original: puṇyaprasavair bṛhatphalair asaṃjñisattvaiḥ śuddhāvāsair aspṛhair atapaiḥ sudṛśaiḥ
analyzed: puṇya prasavaiḥ bṛhat phalaiḥ asaṃjñi sattvaiḥ śuddha āvāsaiḥ aspṛhaiḥ a tapaiḥ sudṛśaiḥ

original: sudarśanair akaniṣṭhaiś ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'nekadevaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrair
analyzed: sudarśanaiḥ akaniṣṭhaiḥ ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ neka devaputra koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ

original: bodhimaṇḍadrumamūlam upasaṃkrāmeyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: bodhimaṇḍa druma mūlam upasaṃkrāmeyam iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim iti ye cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino
analyzed: kim iti ye cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ trayastriṃśāḥ yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ

original: brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapāriṣadyaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā
analyzed: brahmakāyikāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ brahma pāriṣadyaḥ parīttābhāḥ apramāṇābhāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhāḥ

original: apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsā
analyzed: apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalāḥ asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhāvāsāḥ

original: aspṛhā atapāḥ (PvsP1-1: 50)
analyzed: aspṛhāḥ atapāḥ

original: sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ,
analyzed: sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ ca devāḥ

original: bodhimaṇḍadrumamūlaṃ pratisaṃstareyur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: bodhimaṇḍa druma mūlam pratisaṃstareyuḥ iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato vā tiṣṭhato vā niṣaṇṇasya vā śayānasya vā sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheteti  #
analyzed: kim iti me nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchataḥ vā tiṣṭhataḥ vā niṣaṇṇasya vā śayānasya vā sa pṛthivī pradeśaḥ vajra mayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheta iti

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva divase niṣkāmeyaṃ tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeyam iti,
analyzed: kim iti aham yatra eva divase niṣkāmā iyam tatra eva divase nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyeyam iti

original: tatraiva divase dharmacakraṃ pravartayeyam iti,
analyzed: tatra eva divase dharmacakram pravartayeyam iti

original: dharmacakraṃ ca me pravartayamānasyāsaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ virajovigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyed iti,
analyzed: dharmacakram ca me pravartayamānasya asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇām sattvānām virajaḥ vigata malam dharmeṣu dharmacakṣuḥ viśudhyet iti

original: asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānām anupādāyāsrvebhyaś cittāni vimucyeyur iti,
analyzed: asaṃkhyeyānām aprameyāṇām sattvānām an upādāya a srvebhyaḥ cittāni vimucyeyuḥ iti

original: asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā sattvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhir iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: asaṃkhyeyāḥ aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ a vinivartanīyāḥ bhaveyuḥ anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhiḥ iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim iti me 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyaḥ śrāvakasaṃghaḥ syād iti,
analyzed: kim iti me saṃkhyeyaḥ śrāvaka saṃghaḥ syāt iti

original: aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā ekadharmadeśanāyā ekāsanikā bodhisattvā bhaveyur avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti,
analyzed: aprameyāḥ asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ eka dharma deśanāyāḥ eka āsanikāḥ bodhisattvāḥ bhaveyuḥ a vinivartanīyāḥ anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ iti

original: asaṃkhyeyaś cāprameyaś ca bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaved iti,
analyzed: asaṃkhyeyaḥ ca aprameyaḥ ca bodhisattva saṃghaḥ bhavet iti

original: aparimitaṃ cāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaved iti,
analyzed: aparimitam ca āyuḥ pramāṇam bhavet iti

original: aparimitā ca prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: aparimitā ca prabhā saṃpad bhavet iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tasmin buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohāyatanāni sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaveyur  #
analyzed: kim iti me nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tasmin buddhakṣetre rāga dveṣa moha āyatanāni sarveṇa sarvam sarvathā sarvam na bhaveyuḥ

original: iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya evaṃrūpayā prajñayā sattvāḥ samanvāgatā (PvsP1-1: 51)
analyzed: kim iti me nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya evaṃrūpayā prajñayā sattvāḥ samanvāgatāḥ

original: bhaveyur, yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavantaḥ evam udānam udānayeyuḥ. sādhu
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ yat anya buddhakṣetra sthāḥ buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ evam udānam udānayeyuḥ sādhu

original: śamaḥ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇabrahmacaryavāsaḥ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣv
analyzed: śamaḥ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇa brahmacarya vāsaḥ sādhu avihiṃsā sarva prāṇi bhūteṣu

original: iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: iti prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam upaparīkṣitavyam

original: kim iti me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānam api na syāt,
analyzed: kim iti me parinirvṛtasya saddharma antardhānam api na syāt

original: sahaśravaṇena ca me nāmadheyasya ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher iti  #
analyzed: saha śravaṇena ca me nāmadheyasya ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgā nadī bālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ te niyatāḥ bhaveyuḥ anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ iti

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati,
analyzed: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān guṇān utpādayati

original: tadā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahārājānas ta evaṃ cintayanti,
analyzed: tadā ye tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau mahā rājānaḥ te evam cintayanti

original: vayam asmai bodhisattvāya catvāri pātrāṇi dāsyāmaḥ,
analyzed: vayam asmai bodhisattvāya catvāri pātrāṇi dāsyāmaḥ

original: yathā dattāni pūrvakair mahārājaiḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ trayastriṃśāś ca devā āttamanaskā bhavanti yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino  #
analyzed: yathā dattāni pūrvakaiḥ mahā rājaiḥ pūrvakāṇām tathāgatānām trayastriṃśāḥ ca devāḥ ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti yāmāḥ tuṣitāḥ nirmāṇa ratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ

original: devā utsukā bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: devāḥ utsukāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: vayam asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopasthānaparicaryāḥ kariṣyāma iti,
analyzed: vayam asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasthāna paricaryāḥ kariṣyāmaḥ iti

original: evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyante divyāḥ kāyāḥ abhivardhiṣyante.
analyzed: evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyante divyāḥ kāyāḥ abhivardhiṣyante

original: āttamanaskāś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bhavanti brahmapāriṣadyā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmāṇaḥ,
analyzed: ātta manaskāḥ ca tri sāhasra mahā sāhasre lokadhātau bhavanti brahma pāriṣadyāḥ brahma purohitāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ

original: āttamanaskā bhavanti parīttābhā apramāṇābhāś ca ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ
analyzed: ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti parītta ābhāḥ apramāṇa ābhāḥ ca ābhāsvarāḥ parītta śubhāḥ apramāṇa śubhāḥ

original: śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhābhāsā avṛhā atapāḥ
analyzed: śubhakṛtsnāḥ anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ bṛhatphalāḥ asaṃjñisattvāḥ śuddhābhāsāḥ avṛhāḥ atapāḥ

original: sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devās teṣām evaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: sudṛśāḥ sudarśanāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ ca devāḥ teṣām evam bhavati

original: vayam enam abhisaṃbuddham adhyeṣiṣyāmo dharmacakrapravartanāya,
analyzed: vayam enam abhisaṃbuddham adhyeṣiṣyāmaḥ dharma cakra pravartanāya

original: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ,
analyzed: yasmin samaye śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran vivardhate ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ

original: tasmin samaya āttamanaskā bhavanti bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca vayam asya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo bhāryāputrajñātisālohitā
analyzed: tasmin samaye ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti bodhisattva yānikāḥ kula putrāḥ kula duhitaraḥ ca vayam asya mātā pitarau bhaviṣyāmaḥ bhāryā putra jñāti sālohitā

original: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājāno devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā
analyzed: ātta manaskāḥ bhavanti catvāraḥ mahārājānaḥ devāḥ trayastriṃśāḥ devāḥ yāmāḥ devāḥ tuṣitā

original: devā nirmāṇaratayo devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmapārṣadyā devā brahmapurohitā
analyzed: devāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ devāḥ brahmapārṣadyāḥ devāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ

original: devā mahābrahmāṇo (PvsP1-1: 52)
analyzed: devāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ

original: devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā anabhrakā
analyzed: devāḥ parīttaśubhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇaśubhāḥ devāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ devāḥ śubhakṛtsnāḥ devāḥ

original: devāḥ puṇyaprasavā devā bṛhatphalā devā asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ śuddhāvāsā devā aspṛhā
analyzed: devāḥ puṇya prasavāḥ devāḥ bṛhat phalāḥ devāḥ asaṃjñi sattvāḥ devāḥ śuddha āvāsāḥ devāḥ

original: devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhāś ca devā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
analyzed: devāḥ atapāḥ devāḥ sudṛśāḥ devāḥ sudarśanāḥ devāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ ca devāḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: maithunadharmaparivarjanena,
analyzed: maithuna dharma parivarjanena

original: atha yaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo brahmacārī bhavati,
analyzed: atha yaḥ prathama citta utpādam upādāya bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ brahmacārī bhavati

original: na saṃyojanīyair dharmaiḥ saṃyujyate,
analyzed: na saṃyojanīyaiḥ dharmaiḥ saṃyujyate

original: tasyaivaṃ bhavati abrahmacāriṇaḥ sa khalu punaḥ kāmān pratisevamāṇasya brahmalokopapatter apy antarāyo bhavati,
analyzed: tasya evam bhavati abrahmacāriṇaḥ sa khalu punar kāmān pratisevamāṇasya brahma loka upapatteḥ api antarāyaḥ bhavati

original: kaḥ punar vādo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
analyzed: kaḥ punar vādaḥ nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ

original: tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena brahmacāriṇaiva gṛhād abhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā.
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena brahmacāriṇā eva gṛhāt abhiniṣkramya anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃboddhavyā na a brahmacāriṇā

original: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: kiṃ punar bhagavann avaśyaṃ bodhisattvasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ bhavitavyaṃ bhāryāputrajñātisālohitair bhavitavyam?
analyzed: kim punar bhagavan avaśyam bodhisattvasya mātā pitṛbhyām bhavitavyam bhāryā putra jñāti sālohitaiḥ bhavitavyam

original: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāriputram etat avocat

original: keṣāṃcic chāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātāpitarau bhavataḥ bhāryāputrajñātisālohitā vā,
analyzed: keṣāṃcid śāriputra bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām mātā pitarau bhavataḥ bhāryā putra jñāti sālohitā vā

original: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:

original: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya avinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāpnoti bodhimārgaṃ ca pariśodhayati.
analyzed: katham bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmim ca atikramya a vinivartanīya bhūmim anuprāpnoti bodhi mārgam ca pariśodhayati

original: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāriputram etat avocat

original: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu sarveṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ
analyzed: iha śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prathama citta utpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihiteṣu sarveṣu sthitvā śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmim

original: avinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāpnoti bodhimārgaṃ ca pariśodhayati.
analyzed: a vinivartanīya bhūmim anuprāpnoti bodhi mārgam ca pariśodhayati

original: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satatasamitaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati.
analyzed: katamasyām bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ satata samitam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām dakṣiṇīyaḥ bhavati

original: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāriputram etat avocat

original: prathamacittotpādam upādāya śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yāvadā bodhimaṇḍād atrāntare satatasamitaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ  #
analyzed: prathama citta utpādam upādāya śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yāvadā bodhimaṇḍāt atra antare satata samitam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām

original: dakṣiṇīyo bhavati,
analyzed: dakṣiṇīyaḥ bhavati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi śāriputra bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: tathā hi śāriputra bodhisattvam mahāsattvam āgamya sarveṣām kuśalānām dharmāṇām loke prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati

original: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ pañcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya
analyzed: yat uta daśānām kuśalānām karma pathānām pañcānām śikṣā padānām aṣṭāṅga samanvāgatasya

original: poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pañcānām
analyzed: poṣadhasya caturṇām dhyānānām caturṇām apramāṇānām catasṛṇām ārūpya samāpattīnām pañcānām

original: abhijñānāṃ caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ
analyzed: abhijñānām caturṇām ārya satyānām caturṇām smṛti upasthānānām caturṇām samyakprahāṇānām

analyzed: caturṇām ṛddhipādānām pañcānām indriyāṇām pañcānām balānām saptānām bodhyaṅgānām

original: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
analyzed: yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran adhyātma śūnyatāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

analyzed: adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: yāvat parabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
analyzed: yāvat para bhāva śūnyatāyām yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann āsu sarvāsu śūnyatāsu yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ,
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran āsu sarvāsu śūnyatāsu yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: sa ābhiḥ śūnyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yukto yukta iti vaktavyo 'yukta iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: saḥ ābhiḥ śūnyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na tāvat bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ yuktaḥ yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ yuktaḥ iti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi na sa rūpaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati.
analyzed: tathā hi na sa rūpam na vedanām na saṃjñām na saṃskārān na vijñānam yuktam iti vā a yuktam iti vā samanupaśyati

original: iti duḥkhasatyāvavādaḥ
analyzed: iti duḥkha satya avavādaḥ

analyzed: sa na rūpam utpāda dharmi vā nirodha dharmi vā samanupaśyati

analyzed: na saṃskārān utpāda dharmiṇaḥ vā nirodha dharmiṇaḥ vā samanupaśyati

analyzed: na vijñānām utpāda dharmi vā nirodha dharmi vā samanupaśyati

analyzed: na vedanā saṃjñāyām samavasarati iti samanupaśyati

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra uttara pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti

original: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ
analyzed: ye ca teṣām śrāvakāḥ ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ te pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣām

original: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
analyzed: mā khalu asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaḥ bhūt iti

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti

original: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ
analyzed: ye ca teṣām śrāvakāḥ ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ te pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣām

original: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
analyzed: mā khalu asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaḥ bhūt iti

analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra dakṣiṇa paścimāyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti

original: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniśṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ
analyzed: ye ca teṣām śrāvakāḥ ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniśṭhāḥ devāḥ te tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣām

original: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
analyzed: mā khalu asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaḥ bhūt iti

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra paścima uttarasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti

analyzed: ye ca teṣām śrāvakāḥ ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniśṭhāḥ devāḥ te tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣām

original: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
analyzed: mā khalu asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaḥ bhūt iti

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca (PvsP1-1: 77)
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra adhastāt diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca
