analyzed: deśayanti ye ca teṣām śrāvakāḥ ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ te tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: rakṣāṃ kurvanti,
analyzed: rakṣām kurvanti

original: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti,
analyzed: mā khalu asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaḥ bhūt iti

original: ye 'pi te śāriputra ūrdhvaṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
analyzed: ye pi te śāriputra ūrdhvam diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam ca deśayanti

original: ye ca teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye ca pratyekabuddhā ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāṃ
analyzed: ye ca teṣām śrāvakāḥ ye ca pratyekabuddhāḥ ye ca cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ yāvat akaniṣṭhāḥ devāḥ te pi tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣām

original: mā khalv asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyo 'bhūd iti.
analyzed: mā khalu asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyaḥ bhūt iti

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ

original: alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukhāni samādhimukhāni cāmukhībhavanti sarvopapattyāyataneṣu
analyzed: alpa kṛcchreṇa dhāraṇī mukhāni samādhi mukhāni ca ā mukhībhavanti sarva upapatti āyataneṣu

original: ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayati nanu kadācid buddhair bhagavadbhir virahito bhavati,
analyzed: ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayati nanu kadācid buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ virahitaḥ bhavati

original: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya iti,
analyzed: yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyai iti

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ na evam bhavati

original: asti sa kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ saha saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā.
analyzed: asti sa kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ dharmaiḥ saha saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ na evam bhavati

original: kañcid ahaṃ kṣiprataraṃ dharmadhātum abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ vā na cābhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ,
analyzed: kañcid aham kṣiprataram dharmadhātum abhisaṃbudhyeyam vā na ca abhisaṃbudhyeyam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi dharmadhātur dharmadhātunābhisaṃbudhyate,
analyzed: na hi dharmadhātuḥ dharmadhātunā abhisaṃbudhyate

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kiñcid dharmadhātor vyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na kiñcid dharmadhātoḥ vyatiriktam samanupaśyati

original: nāpi dharmadhātor dharmanānākaraṇaṃ karoti,
analyzed: na api dharmadhātoḥ dharma nānākaraṇam karoti

original: nāpy asyaivaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: na api asya evam bhavati

original: ayaṃ dharmadhātur evaṃ pratividhyate na vā pratividhyata iti,
analyzed: ayam dharmadhātuḥ evam pratividhyate na vā pratividhyate iti

original: tathā hi na sa kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa tāṃ dharmatāṃ pratividhyed iti,
analyzed: tathā hi na sa kañcid dharmam samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa tām dharma tām pratividhyet iti

original: tathā hi sa na dharmadhātuṃ śūnyam iti yojayati nāśūnyam iti yojayati, evaṃ hi (PvsP1-1: 78)
analyzed: tathā hi sa na dharmadhātum śūnyam iti yojayati na a śūnyam iti yojayati evam hi

original: śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ.
analyzed: śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurdhātunā yojayanti,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na cakṣuḥ dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām cakṣuḥ dhātunā yojayanti

original: na rūpadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ rūpadhātunā yojayati,
analyzed: na rūpadhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām rūpadhātunā yojayati

original: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātunā yojayati.
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātunā yojayati

original: na śrotradhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ śrotradhātunā yojayati,
analyzed: na śrotradhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām śrotradhātunā yojayati

original: na śabdadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ śabdadhātunā yojayanti,
analyzed: na śabdadhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām śabdadhātunā yojayanti

original: na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ cakṣurdhātunā yojayati.
analyzed: na śrotra vijñāna dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām cakṣuḥ dhātunā yojayati

original: na ghrāṇadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ ghrāṇadhātunā yojayanti,
analyzed: na ghrāṇa dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām ghrāṇa dhātunā yojayanti

original: na gandhadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ gandhadhātunā yojayati,
analyzed: na gandha dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām gandha dhātunā yojayati

original: na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātunā yojayati.
analyzed: na ghrāṇa vijñāna dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām ghrāṇa vijñāna dhātunā yojayati

original: na jihvādhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ jihvādhātunā yojayanti,
analyzed: na jihvā dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām jihvā dhātunā yojayanti

original: na rasadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ rasadhātunā yojayati,
analyzed: na rasadhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām rasadhātunā yojayati

original: na jihvāvijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ jihvāvijñānadhātunā yojayati.
analyzed: na jihvā vijñāna dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām jihvā vijñāna dhātunā yojayati

original: na kāyadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ kāyadhātunā yojayati,
analyzed: na kāyadhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām kāyadhātunā yojayati

original: na spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ spraṣṭavyadhātunā yojayati,
analyzed: na spraṣṭavya dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām spraṣṭavya dhātunā yojayati

original: na kāyavijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ kāyavijñānadhātunā yojayati.
analyzed: na kāya vijñāna dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām kāya vijñāna dhātunā yojayati

original: na manodhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ manodhātunā yojayanti,
analyzed: na manaḥ dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām manaḥ dhātunā yojayanti

original: na dharmadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ dharmadhātunā yojayati,
analyzed: na dharmadhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām dharmadhātunā yojayati

original: na manovijñānadhātuṃ śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatāṃ manovijñānadhātunā yojayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna dhātum śūnyatayā yojayati na śūnyatām manaḥ vijñāna dhātunā yojayati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: eṣa hi śāriputra paramo yogo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yad uta śūnyatāyogaḥ,
analyzed: eṣa hi śāriputra paramaḥ yogaḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yat uta śūnyatā yogaḥ

original: śūnyatāyāṃ śāriputra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau
analyzed: śūnyatāyām śāriputra caran bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmau

original: patati buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati sattvān paripācayati kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
analyzed: patati buddhakṣetram pariśodhayati sattvān paripācayati kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate

original: ye kecic chāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yogās teṣāṃ prajñāpāramitāyogo (PvsP1-1: 79)
analyzed: ye kecid śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yogāḥ teṣām prajñāpāramitā yogaḥ

original: 'gra ākhyāyate śreṣṭha ākhyāyate jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate varaḥ pravara uttamo 'nuttamo niruttamo 'samo 'samasamaḥ praṇīta ākhyāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: ākhyāyate śreṣṭhaḥ ākhyāyate jyeṣṭhaḥ ākhyāyate varaḥ pravaraḥ uttamaḥ nuttamaḥ niruttamaḥ samaḥ samasamaḥ praṇītaḥ ākhyāyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: niruttamo hy eṣaḥ śāriputra yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śūnyatāyoga ānimittayogo 'praṇihitayogaḥ,
analyzed: niruttamaḥ hi eṣaḥ śāriputra yogaḥ yat uta prajñāpāramitā yogaḥ śūnyatā yogaḥ praṇihita yogaḥ

original: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛta iti dhārayitavyaḥ,
analyzed: evam yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vyākṛtaḥ iti dhārayitavyaḥ

original: āsannībhūto vyākaraṇasya.
analyzed: āsannībhūtaḥ vyākaraṇasya

original: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyati,
analyzed: evam yujyamānaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām sattvānām artham kariṣyati

original: na cāsyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: na ca asya evam bhaviṣyati

original: māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyantīti,
analyzed: mām buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ vyākariṣyanti iti

original: aham āsannībhūto vyākaraṇasyeti,
analyzed: aham āsannībhūtaḥ vyākaraṇasya iti

original: ahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmīti,
analyzed: aham buddhakṣetram pariśodhayiṣyāmi iti

original: ahaṃ sattvān paripācayiṣyāmīti,
analyzed: aham sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi iti

original: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyāmīti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: aham anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakram pravartayiṣyāmi iti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na viviktīkaroti,
analyzed: tathā hi sa dharmadhātum na viviktīkaroti

original: na ca dharmadhātor anyadharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na ca dharmadhātoḥ anya dharmam samanupaśyati

original: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
analyzed: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caret

original: yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākriyeta anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yaḥ vā buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ vyākriyeta anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na sattvasaṃjñotpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ na sattva saṃjñā utpadyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy atyantatayā sattvo notpadyate na nirūdhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi atyanta tayā sattvaḥ na utpadyate na nirūdhyate

original: anutpādānirodhadharmatvāt,
analyzed: anutpāda anirodha dharma tvāt

original: yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati. evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: yasya ca na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ sa katham prajñāpāramitāyām cariṣyati evam caran bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sattva anutpāda tayā prajñāpāramitāyām

original: sattvaśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
analyzed: sattva śūnyatayā prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: sattvānupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
analyzed: sattva anupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: sattvaviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
analyzed: sattva vivikta tayā prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śūnyatāyogaḥ sarvān anyān yogān abhibhūyāvatiṣṭhate,
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām paramaḥ yogaḥ yat uta śūnyatā yogaḥ sarvān anyān yogān abhibhūya avatiṣṭhate

original: atra hi śāriputra yoge caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahākaruṇām abhinirharati,
analyzed: atra hi śāriputra yoge caran bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā karuṇām abhinirharati

original: mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati,
analyzed: mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati

original: na ca mātsaryacittam utpādayati,
analyzed: na ca mātsarya cittam utpādayati

original: na dauḥśīlyacittam utpādayati,
analyzed: na dauḥśīlya cittam utpādayati

original: na vyāpādacittam utpādayati,
analyzed: na vyāpāda cittam utpādayati

original: na kuśīdacittam utpādayati,
analyzed: na kuśīda cittam utpādayati

original: na vikṣiptacittam utpādayati,
analyzed: na vikṣipta cittam utpādayati

original: na dauṣprajñācittam utpādayati.
analyzed: na dauṣprajñā cittam utpādayati

original: iti dharmaratnāvavādaḥ
analyzed: iti dharmaratna avavādaḥ

original: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo 'nena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati sa kutaś cyuta ihopapadyate,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ nena prajñāpāramitā vihāreṇa viharati sa kutas cyutaḥ iha upapadyate

original: ito vā cyutaḥ kutropapatsyate?
analyzed: itas vā cyutaḥ kutra upapatsyate

original: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam śāriputram etat avocat

original: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati sa itaś cyuta ihaiva buddhakṣetre upapadyate,
analyzed: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ nena prajñāpāramitā vihāreṇa viharati saḥ itas cyutaḥ iha eva buddhakṣetre upapadyate

original: anyebhyo vā buddhakṣetrebhyaś cyutas tuṣitebhyo vā devebhyaś cyuta ihopapadyate.
analyzed: anyebhyaḥ vā buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ cyutaḥ tuṣitebhyaḥ vā devebhyaḥ cyutaḥ iha upapadyate

original: iti bodhisattvo 'ṣṭamakaḥ
analyzed: iti bodhisattvaḥ ṣṭamakaḥ

original: tatra śāriputra yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyutvā manuṣyāṇām eva sabhāgatāyām upapadyate,
analyzed: tatra śāriputra yaḥ yam bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ manuṣyebhyaḥ eva cyutvā manuṣyāṇām eva sabhāgatāyām upapadyate

original: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
analyzed: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya a vinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā dhanvāni indriyāṇi bhavanti

original: na ca kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate,
analyzed: na ca kṣipram prajñāpāramitā yogam samāpadyate

original: na cāsya dhāraṇīmukham abhimukhībhavati na ca samādhimukham,
analyzed: na ca asya dhāraṇī mukham abhimukhībhavati na ca samādhi mukham

original: yat punaḥ śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: yat punar śāriputra evam vadasi

original: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaimaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate sa itaś cyutaḥ kutropapadyata iti,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattva emam prajñāpāramitā yogam samāpadyate saḥ itas cyutaḥ kutra upapadyate iti

original: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate,
analyzed: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ imam prajñāpāramitā yogam samāpadyate

original: sa ito buddhakṣetrāc cyutaḥ buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
analyzed: saḥ itas buddhakṣetrāt cyutaḥ buddhakṣetrāt buddhakṣetram saṃkramiṣyati

original: tatra buddhakṣetre buddhān bhagavata ārāgayiṣyati,
analyzed: tatra buddhakṣetre buddhān bhagavataḥ ārāgayiṣyati

original: na kadācid buddhavirahito bhaviṣyati.
analyzed: na kadācid buddha virahitaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: iti bodhisattvaśraddhānusārī
analyzed: iti bodhisattva śraddhā anusārī

original: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputrāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaś cyuta ihopapadyate tasya tīkṣṇānīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
analyzed: yaḥ punar śāriputra ayam bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ nyebhyaḥ buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ cyutaḥ iha upapadyate tasya tīkṣṇāni indriyāṇi bhavanti

original: sa kṣipram imaṃ yogam āpadyate,
analyzed: sa kṣipram imam yogam āpadyate

original: yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogam,
analyzed: yat uta prajñāpāramitā yogam

original: tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpy amī gambhīragambhīrā dharmā abhimukhībhavanti,
analyzed: tasya jāti vyativṛttasya api amī gambhīra gambhīrāḥ dharmāḥ abhimukhībhavanti

original: sa paścāt prajñāpāramitāyogaṃ samāpadyate,
analyzed: sa paścāt prajñāpāramitā yogam samāpadyate

original: yatra yatra buddhakṣetre upapadyate tatra tatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyati.
analyzed: yatra yatra buddhakṣetre upapadyate tatra tatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyati

original: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tuṣitebhyo devebhyaś cyutvā ihopapanno bhavati tasyāpi paṭutarāṇīndriyāṇi bhavanti,
analyzed: yaḥ punar śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tuṣitebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ cyutvā iha upapannaḥ bhavati tasya api paṭutarāṇi indriyāṇi bhavanti

original: avipramuṣitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ sarvadhāraṇīsamādhimukhāni cābhimukhībhavanti.
analyzed: a vipramuṣitāḥ ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ sarva dhāraṇī samādhi mukhāni ca abhimukhībhavanti

original: iti bodhisattvadharmānusārī
analyzed: iti bodhisattva dharma anusārī

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā vyāyacchantaḥ sattvaparipākāyopāyakauśalyabalena srotaāpattiphalaṃ
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām carantaḥ ghaṭamānāḥ vyāyacchantaḥ sattva paripākāya upāya kauśalya balena srotaāpatti phalam

original: na ca tena manyante.
analyzed: na ca tena manyante

original: iti srotaāpannaḥ
analyzed: iti srotaāpannaḥ

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anupāyakuśalā ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādayanti pāramitāsu ca caranti,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ an upāya kuśalāḥ ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādayanti pāramitāsu ca caranti

original: tena ca dhyānalābhena dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyante,
analyzed: tena ca dhyāna lābhena dīrgha āyuṣkeṣu deveṣu upapadyante

original: sacet tataś cyutvā manuṣyeṣu deveṣu copapadyante,
analyzed: saced tatas cyutvā manuṣyeṣu deveṣu ca upapadyante

original: buddhāṃś ca bhagavata ārāgayiṣyanti,
analyzed: buddhān ca bhagavataḥ ārāgayiṣyanti

original: teṣām api dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni.
analyzed: teṣām api dhanvāni indriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānāni ca samāpadyante prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca caranti,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ dhyānāni ca samāpadyante prajñāpāramitāyām ca caranti

original: te cānupāyakauśalyena dhyānāny utsṛjya kāmadhātāv upapadyante,
analyzed: te ca an upāya kauśalyena dhyānāni utsṛjya kāmadhātau upapadyante

original: teṣām api śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dhanvānīndriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni.
analyzed: teṣām api śāriputra bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām dhanvāni indriyāṇi bhavanti na tīkṣṇāni

original: iti dvitīyatṛtīyaphalapratipannakaḥ śraddhādhimuktaḥ
analyzed: iti dvitīya tṛtīya phala pratipannakaḥ śraddhā adhimuktaḥ

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpādya catvāry apramāṇāni samāpadyante,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ catvāri dhyānāni utpādya catvāri apramāṇāni samāpadyante

original: catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān samāpadyante,
analyzed: catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgān samāpadyante

original: mahākāruṇikā upāyakauśalyena copapadyante,
analyzed: mahā kāruṇikāḥ upāya kauśalyena ca upapadyante

original: na dhyānavaśena nāpramāṇavaśena nārūpyasamāpattivaśena tatra copapadyante yatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti,
analyzed: na dhyāna vaśena na apramāṇa vaśena na ārūpya samāpatti vaśena tatra ca upapadyante yatra tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti

original: te punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitā ihaiva bhadrakalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
analyzed: te punar prajñāpāramitā vihāreṇa avirahitāḥ iha eva bhadra kalpe anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante

original: iti dvitīyatṛtīyaphalapratipannako dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ
analyzed: iti dvitīya tṛtīya phala pratipannakaḥ dṛṣṭi prāptaḥ

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranta upāyakauśalyena catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ eka jāti pratibaddhāḥ ye prajñāpāramitāyām carantaḥ upāya kauśalyena catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante

original: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayanti,
analyzed: catvāri apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgān bhāvayanti

original: śūnyatāsamādhiṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: śūnyatā samādhim samāpadyante

original: ānimittasamādhiṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: ā nimitta samādhim samāpadyante

original: apraṇihitasamādhiṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: apraṇihita samādhim samāpadyante

original: na ca teṣāṃ vaśena gacchanti saṃmukhībhūtāṃś (PvsP1-1: 82)
analyzed: na ca teṣām vaśena gacchanti saṃmukhībhūtān

original: ca buddhān bhagavata ārāgayitvā tatra brahmacaryaṃ caritvā punar eva tuṣitānāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
analyzed: ca buddhān bhagavataḥ ārāgayitvā tatra brahmacaryam caritvā punar eva tuṣitānām sabhā gatāyai upapadyante

original: te tatra yāvad āyus tiṣṭhanti,
analyzed: te tatra yāvat āyuḥ tiṣṭhanti

original: te tatra yāvad āyuḥ sthitvā ahīnendriyāḥ smṛtimantaḥ saṃprajānānā anekair devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
analyzed: te tatra yāvat āyuḥ sthitvā ahīna indriyāḥ smṛtimantaḥ saṃprajānānāḥ anekaiḥ deva koṭī niyuta śata sahasraiḥ

original: parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtā ihopapattiṃ darśayitvā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
analyzed: parivṛtāḥ puraskṛtāḥ iha upapattim darśayitvā nānā buddhakṣetreṣu anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

original: iti sakṛdāgāmī
analyzed: iti sakṛdāgāmī

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhino ye na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau nārūpyadhātāv upapadyante,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām lābhinaḥ ye na kāmadhātau na rūpadhātau na ārūpya dhātau upapadyante

original: api tu buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti,
analyzed: api tu buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram saṃkrāmanti

original: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayantaḥ pūjayantaḥ.
analyzed: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvantaḥ gurukurvantaḥ mānayantaḥ pūjayantaḥ

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te tābhir abhijñābhir
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām lābhinaḥ te tābhiḥ abhijñābhiḥ

original: vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānasya
analyzed: vikrīḍantaḥ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram saṃkrāmanti yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha yānasya

original: prajñaptir apy asti.
analyzed: prajñaptiḥ api asti

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinas te tābhir abhijñābhir vikrīḍanto buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti  #
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām lābhinaḥ te tābhiḥ abhijñābhiḥ vikrīḍantaḥ buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram saṃkrāmanti

original: yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv amitam āyuḥ.
analyzed: yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu amitam āyuḥ

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ ye lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṇṇām abhijñānām lābhinaḥ ye lokadhātoḥ lokadhātum saṃkrāmanti

original: te tatropasaṃkramya yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdas tatrāvasthitāḥ buddhaśabdaṃ ca dharmaśabdaṃ saṃghaśabdaṃ ca sattvānāṃ
analyzed: te tatra upasaṃkramya yatra na buddha śabdaḥ na dharma śabdaḥ na saṃgha śabdaḥ tatra avasthitāḥ buddha śabdam ca dharma śabdam saṃgha śabdam ca sattvānām

original: trayāṇāṃ ca ratnānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
analyzed: trayāṇām ca ratnānām varṇam bhāṣante

original: te tena buddhaśabdena dharmaśabdena saṃghaśabdena tataś cyutā yatra yatra buddhā bhagavanto bhavanti te tatra tatropapadyante.
analyzed: te tena buddha śabdena dharma śabdena saṃgha śabdena tatas cyutāḥ yatra yatra buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ bhavanti te tatra tatra upapadyante

original: ity anāgāmī
analyzed: iti anāgāmī

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāny utpadya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ catvāri dhyānāni utpadya catvāri apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ

original: te copāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ samādhisamāpattibhyo nivṛtya kāmadhātāv upapadyante,
analyzed: te ca upāya kauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ samādhi samāpattibhyaḥ nivṛtya kāmadhātau upapadyante

original: kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu (PvsP1-1: 83)
analyzed: kṣatriya mahāśāla kuleṣu vā brāhmaṇa mahāśāla kuleṣu vā gṛhapati mahāśāla kuleṣu

original: vopapadyante sattvaparipākāya.
analyzed: vā upapadyante sattva paripākāya

original: ity ayaṃ manuṣyakulaṃkulaḥ
analyzed: iti ayam manuṣya kulaṃkulaḥ

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyante,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyante catvāri apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ samāpadyante

original: te 'py upāyakauśalyabalena dhyānasamādhisamāpattivaśena vā cāturmahārājakāyikānām api devānāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
analyzed: te pi upāya kauśalya balena dhyāna samādhi samāpatti vaśena vā cāturmahārājakāyikānām api devānām sabhā gatāyai upapadyante

original: trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ sabhāgatāyai upapadyante,
analyzed: trayastriṃśānām yāmānām tuṣitānām nirmāṇaratīnām paranirmitavaśavartinām sabhā gatāyai upapadyante

original: te tatra sthitvā sattvān paripācayanti,
analyzed: te tatra sthitvā sattvān paripācayanti

original: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayanti,
analyzed: buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayanti

original: buddhāṃś ca bhagavata ārāgayanti.
analyzed: buddhān ca bhagavataḥ ārāgayanti

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś catvāri dhyānāni utpadya catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ catvāri dhyānāni utpadya catvāri apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ

original: te tataś cyutāḥ santa upāyakauśalyena brahmaloke yāvad akaniṣṭhe upapadyante,
analyzed: te tatas cyutāḥ santaḥ upāya kauśalyena brahma loke yāvat akaniṣṭhe upapadyante

original: te tatra bhavanti brahmāṇo mahābrahmāṇas teṣu brahmabhavaneṣu tiṣṭhanti,
analyzed: te tatra bhavanti brahmāṇaḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ teṣu brahma bhavaneṣu tiṣṭhanti

original: te tatra sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti,
analyzed: te tatra sthitvā buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetram saṃkrāmanti

original: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tāṃs tathāgatān dharmacakrapravartanāyādhyeṣayanti.
analyzed: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tān tathāgatān dharma cakra pravartanāya adhyeṣayanti

original: iti devakulaṃkulaḥ
analyzed: iti devakulaṃkulaḥ

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhinas teṣāṃ cānubodhāya
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye caturṇām dhyānānām lābhinaḥ yāvat aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām lābhinaḥ teṣām ca anubodhāya

original: caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ lābhino na ca tāni pratividhyanti,
analyzed: caturṇām ārya satyānām lābhinaḥ na ca tāni pratividhyanti

original: te punar bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekajātipratibaddhā veditavyāḥ.
analyzed: te punar bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ eka jāti pratibaddhāḥ veditavyāḥ

original: ity ekavīcikaḥ
analyzed: iti ekavīcikaḥ

analyzed: caturṇām apramāṇānām lābhinaḥ bhavanti

analyzed: catasṛṇām ārūpya samāpattīnām lābhinaḥ bhavanti

analyzed: bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid āveṇika buddha dharmān pratilabhante

original: tatra cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ kurvanti.
analyzed: tatra ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām artham kurvanti

original: ity antarā parinirvāyī
analyzed: iti antarā parinirvāyī

original: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

original: dharmacakraṃ pravartayanty aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā nirūpadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti,
analyzed: dharmacakram pravartayanti aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām sattvānām ca artham kṛtvā nirūpadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvānti

analyzed: iti upapadya parinirvāyī

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭpāramitāsu caranto lokadhātor lokadhātuṃ saṃkrāmanti,
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye ṣaṣ pāramitāsu carantaḥ lokadhātoḥ lokadhātum saṃkrāmanti

analyzed: sarva buddha dharmān vā samudānayanti

original: ity anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carantaś cakravartino bhūtvā dānapāramitāṃ puraskṛtya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānāny
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carantaḥ cakravartinaḥ bhūtvā dāna pāramitām puraskṛtya sarva sattvānām sarva sukha upadhānāni

original: annam annārthikebhyaḥ pānaṃ pānārthikebhyaḥ,
analyzed: annam anna arthikebhyaḥ pānam pāna arthikebhyaḥ

analyzed: evam gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa dhūpa śayana āsana upāśraya gṛha dhana dhānya maṇi muktā suvarṇa rūpya pravāḍa ābharaṇāni jīvita upakaraṇāni upasaṃhariṣyanti

original: yāvad daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpya brahmakāyikeṣu yāvad akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣūpapadyamānā nānābuddhakṣetreṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
analyzed: yāvat daśa kuśala karma patheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpya brahmakāyikeṣu yāvat akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣu upapadyamānāḥ nānā buddhakṣetreṣu anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye catvāri dhyānāni niṣpādya dhyānebhyaḥ parihīṇāḥ prathamam dhyānam āsādya brahmakāyikeṣu deveṣu upapadyante

analyzed: te punar dhyānāni niṣpādya a kaniṣṭheṣu upapadya nānā buddhakṣetreṣu anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

original: iti plutaḥ
analyzed: iti plutaḥ

analyzed: te śuddhāvāsānām ekam vā dve vā sthāne vilaṅghya a kaniṣṭheṣu deveṣu upapadya nānā buddhakṣetreṣu anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

analyzed: eka jāti pratibaddhāḥ ca bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ tatra tatra buddhakṣetreṣu upapadya nānā buddhakṣetreṣu anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ āsādayantaḥ brahmakāyikeṣu yāvat śubhakṛtsneṣu deveṣu upapadyante

analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām lābhinaḥ te ākāśa ānantya āyatane yāvat bhava agre upapadyante

original: tato nānābuddhakṣetreṣūpapadyante.

original: iti rūpavītarāgaḥ

analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye ṣaṣ pāramitāsu carantaḥ dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇa alaṃkṛta mūrtayaḥ niruttaraiḥ pariśuddhaiḥ indriyaiḥ

original: samanvāgatā bhavanti,
analyzed: samanvāgatāḥ bhavanti

original: manaāpāś ca ye punaḥ sattvās tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān paśyanti,
analyzed: manaāpāḥ ca ye punar sattvāḥ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān paśyanti

original: te tenaiva cittaprasādenānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti,
analyzed: te tena eva citta prasādena anupūrveṇa tribhiḥ yānaiḥ parinirvānti

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kāyapariśuddhaye śikṣitavyaṃ vākpariśuddhaye śikṣitavyaṃ manaḥpariśuddhaye śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kāya pariśuddhaye śikṣitavyam vāc pariśuddhaye śikṣitavyam manaḥ pariśuddhaye śikṣitavyam

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caranta uttaptānīndriyāṇi pratilabhante,

original: te tair uttaptair indriyair nātmānam utkarṣayanti na parān paṃsayanti.
analyzed: te taiḥ uttaptaiḥ indriyaiḥ na ātmānam utkarṣayanti na parān paṃsayanti

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye prathama citta utpādam upādāya dāna pāramitāyām

original: śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā naivaṃ kadācid apāyadurgativinipāteṣūpapadyante yāvad avinivartanīyabhūmim anuprāpnuvanti.
analyzed: śīla pāramitāyām sthitvā na evam kadācid apāya durgati vinipāteṣu upapadyante yāvat a vinivartanīya bhūmim anuprāpnuvanti

original: yāvad avinivartanīyāṃ bhūmim anuprāpnuvanti.
analyzed: yāvat a vinivartanīyām bhūmim anuprāpnuvanti

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye dāna pāramitāyām śīla pāramitāyām sthitvā

original: rājānaś cakravartino bhūtvā dānaṃ sattvebhyo dattvā tān eva daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
analyzed: rājānaḥ cakravartinaḥ bhūtvā dānam sattvebhyaḥ dattvā tān eva daśa kuśala karma patheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti

analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye dāna pāramitāyām śīla pāramitāyām sthitvā anekāni cakravarti rājya śatāni parigṛhṇanti

analyzed: anekāni cakravarti rājya śata sahasrāṇi parigṛhṇanti

original: tatra sthitvā anekāni ca buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi ārāgayanti,

original: tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti,
analyzed: tān ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti

original: tato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.

original: iti dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyī
analyzed: iti dṛṣṭadharma parinirvāyī

original: santi śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaś caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ
analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ ye prajñāpāramitāyām carantaḥ caturṇām dhyānānām

analyzed: lābhinaḥ catasṛṇām ārūpya samāpattīnām lābhinaḥ te tābhiḥ vikrīḍantaḥ prathamam dhyānam samāpadyante

original: tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: tatas vyutthāya nirodha samāpattim samāpadyante

original: tato vyutthāya dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: tatas vyutthāya dvitīyam dhyānam samāpadyante

analyzed: tatas vyutthāya nirodha samāpattim samāpadyante

original: tato vyutthāya tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: tatas vyutthāya tṛtīyam dhyānam samāpadyante

original: tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: tatas vyutthāya nirodha samāpattim samāpadyante

original: tato vyutthāya caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: tatas vyutthāya caturtham dhyānam samāpadyante

original: tato vyutthāya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyante,
analyzed: tatas vyutthāya nirodha samāpattim samāpadyante

original: asya bodhisattvasya na māro bhaviṣyati. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuḥ.
analyzed: asya bodhisattvasya na māraḥ bhaviṣyati evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddham dharma cakṣuḥ

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhacakṣuḥ?
analyzed: katamat bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddham buddha cakṣuḥ

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: yac chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhicittānantaraṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadya ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
analyzed: yat śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bodhi citta anantaram vajra upamam samādhim samāpadya eka citta kṣaṇa samāyuktayā prajñayā sarva ākāra jña tām anuprāpnoti

original: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataḥ,
analyzed: daśabhiḥ tathāgata balaiḥ samanvāgataḥ

original: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgataḥ,
analyzed: caturbhiḥ vaiśāradyaiḥ catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ āveṇikaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ mahā maitryā mahā karuṇayā ca samanvāgataḥ

original: yena ca cakṣuṣā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāsti kiñcid adṛṣṭaṃ vāśrutaṃ (PvsP1-1: 98)
analyzed: yena ca cakṣuṣā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na asti kiñcid adṛṣṭam vā aśrutam

original: vāmataṃ vāvijñātaṃ vā sarvair ākāraiḥ. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddhaṃ buddhacakṣuḥ.
analyzed: vā amatam vā a vijñātam vā sarvaiḥ ākāraiḥ evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariśuddham buddha cakṣuḥ

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañcacakṣūṃṣi śodhayitukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pañca cakṣūṃṣi śodhayitu kāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi śāriputra ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarve kuśalā dharmā antargatāḥ sarvaśrāvakadharmāś ca sarvapratyekabuddhadharmāś ca bodhisattvadharmāś
analyzed: tathā hi śāriputra ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sarve kuśalāḥ dharmāḥ antargatāḥ sarva śrāvaka dharmāḥ ca sarva pratyekabuddha dharmāḥ ca bodhisattva dharmāḥ

original: yat khalu śāriputra samyag vadanto vadeyuḥ sarvakuśaladharmasaṃgraha iti prajñāpāramitāṃ khalu samyag vadantovadeyuḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yat khalu śāriputra samyak vadantaḥ vadeyuḥ sarva kuśala dharma saṃgrahaḥ iti prajñāpāramitām khalu samyak vadantaḥ vadeyuḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi śāriputra prajñāpāramitā janayitrī sarvāsāṃ pāramitānām,
analyzed: tathā hi śāriputra prajñāpāramitā janayitrī sarvāsām pāramitānām

original: eṣāṃ ca pañcānāṃ bodhisattvacakṣuṣām,
analyzed: eṣām ca pañcānām bodhisattva cakṣuṣām

original: eṣu ca śāriputra pañcasu bodhisattvacakṣuḥṣu śikṣitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
analyzed: eṣu ca śāriputra pañcasu bodhisattva cakṣuḥṣu śikṣitvā bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante

original: iti pañcacakṣur avavādaḥ
analyzed: iti pañcacakṣuḥ avavādaḥ

original: atra śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
analyzed: atra śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran abhijñāpāramitām bhāvayati

original: so 'nekavidham ṛddhividhiṃ pratyanubhavati,
analyzed: saḥ na ekavidham ṛddhi vidhim pratyanubhavati

original: pṛthivīm api kampayati,
analyzed: pṛthivīm api kampayati

original: eko 'pi bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati,
analyzed: ekaḥ pi bhūtvā bahudhā bhavati

original: bahudhāpi bhūtvā eko bhavati,
analyzed: bahudhā api bhūtvā ekaḥ bhavati

original: āvirbhāvaṃ tirobhāvam api pratyanubhavati,
analyzed: āvirbhāvam tirobhāvam api pratyanubhavati

original: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāraṃ tiraḥparvatam apy asakto gacchati tadyathāpi nāmākāśe 'pi krāmati tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ,
analyzed: tiras kuḍyam tiras prākāram tiras parvatam api asaktaḥ gacchati tat yathā api nāma ākāśe krāmati tat yathā api nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ

original: pṛthivyām apy unmajjanimajjaṃ karoti tadyathāpi nāmodake,
analyzed: pṛthivyām api unmajja nimajjam karoti tat yathā api nāma udake

original: udake 'bhidyamāno gacchati tadyathāpi nāma pṛthivyām,
analyzed: udake bhidyamānaḥ gacchati tat yathā api nāma pṛthivyām

original: dhūmāyaty api prajjalaty api tadyathāpi nāma mahān agniskandhaḥ,
analyzed: dhūmāyati api prajjalati api tat yathā api nāma mahān agni skandhaḥ

original: udakam api kāyāt pramuñcati tadyathāpi nāma mahāmeghaḥ,
analyzed: udakam api kāyāt pramuñcati tat yathā api nāma mahā meghaḥ

original: imāv api sūryācandramasāv evaṃ maharddhikau mahānubhāvau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi yāvad brahmalokād api kāyaṃ vaśena vartayati,
analyzed: imau api sūryācandramasau evam maharddhikau mahā anubhāvau pāṇinā parāmṛśati parimārṣṭi yāvat brahma lokāt api kāyam vaśena vartayati

original: tayā ca ṛddhyā na manyate,
analyzed: tayā ca ṛddhyā na manyate

original: tathā hi satām ṛddhiṃ nopalabhate yayā manyate tad api na manyate yenāpi manyate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
analyzed: tathā hi satām ṛddhim na upalabhate yayā manyate tat api na manyate yena api manyate svabhāva śūnyatām upādāya

analyzed: svabhāva vivikta tām upādāya

original: svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: svabhāva anupalabdhi tām upādāya

analyzed: sa na ṛddhi cetanām api utpādayati na ṛddhi abhinirhāra cetanām vā anyatra sarvajña tā

original: manasikārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ṛddhividhyabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam (PvsP1-1: 99)

original: abhinirharati.
analyzed: abhinirharati

original: ahaṃ śabdān śṛṇomi,
analyzed: aham śabdān śṛṇomi

analyzed: tathā hi sa taras api śabdam na upalabhate svabhāva śūnya tām upādāya svabhāva vivikta tām upādāya svabhāva anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: ekam api kalpaṃ kalpaśatam api,

analyzed: anekāni api kalpa śatāni anekāni api kalpa sahasrāṇi anekāni api kalpa śata sahasrāṇi anekāni api kalpa koṭi niyuta śata sahasrāṇi anusmarati yāvat

analyzed: evam āyuṣparyantaḥ

original: tataś cyuta ihāsmy upapanna iti,

original: tena ca pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyabhijñānena na manyate,

original: tathā hi tajjñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya,

original: so 'haṃ prajānāmīti na manyate,

analyzed: sa tat eva jñānam na upalabhate svabhāva śūnya tām upādāya svabhāva vivikta tām upādāya svabhāva anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: na pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyabhinirhāracetanāṃ vā anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. evaṃ
analyzed: na pūrva nivāsa anusmṛti abhinirhāra cetanām vā anyatra sarva ākāra jña tā manasikārāt evam

original: hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pūrvanivāsānusmṛtisākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
analyzed: hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran pūrva nivāsa anusmṛti sākṣātkriyā jñānam abhinirharati

original: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavamānān utpadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatau durgatau  #

analyzed: kāya su caritena samanvāgatāḥ vāc su caritena samanvāgatāḥ manaḥ su caritena samanvāgatāḥ

original: āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ tena kāyavāṅmanaḥsucaritena hetunā sugatau svargaloka upapadyante.
analyzed: āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyak dṛṣṭayaḥ tena kāya vāc manaḥ su caritena hetunā sugatau svarga loke upapadyante

original: ime punar bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
analyzed: ime punar bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāya duścaritena samanvāgatāḥ

original: vāgduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
analyzed: vāc duścaritena samanvāgatāḥ

original: manoduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
analyzed: manaḥ duścaritena samanvāgatāḥ

original: āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayas te mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante.
analyzed: āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ te mithyādṛṣṭi karma samādāna hetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt param maraṇāt apāya durgati vinipātam narakeṣu upapadyante

original: iti hi divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa daśadiśi loke sarvalokadhātuṣu
analyzed: iti hi divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena atikrānta mānuṣyakeṇa daśa diśi loke sarva lokadhātuṣu

original: dharmadhātuparame ākāśadhātuparyavasāne ṣaḍgatikānāṃ sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
analyzed: dharmadhātu parame ākāśa dhātu paryavasāne ṣaṣ gatikānām sattvānām cyuta upapādam yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: tena ca na manyate tathā hi tac cakṣur acakṣur acintyatām upādāya,
analyzed: tena ca na manyate tathā hi tat cakṣuḥ a cakṣuḥ a cintya tām upādāya

original: so 'haṃ paśyāmīti na manyate,
analyzed: saḥ ham paśyāmi iti na manyate

original: tad eva cakṣur nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya,
analyzed: tat eva cakṣuḥ na upalabhate svabhāva śūnyatām upādāya

original: svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya,
analyzed: svabhāva vivikta tām upādāya

original: svabhāvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: svabhāva anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: na sa divyacakṣuścetanām apy utpādayati,
analyzed: na sa divya cakṣuḥ cetanām api utpādayati

original: na divyacakṣurabhinirhāracetanāṃ vā anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt.
analyzed: na divya cakṣuḥ abhinirhāra cetanām vā anyatra sarva ākāra jña tā manasikārāt

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyacakṣurabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati,
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran divya cakṣuḥ abhijñā sākṣātkriyā jñānam abhinirharati

original: so 'nutpādasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānam abhinirharati,
analyzed: saḥ nu tpāda sākṣātkriyā abhijñā jñānam abhinirharati

original: na ca śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati,
analyzed: na ca śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau vā patati

original: nāpy anyaṃ kañcid dharmam āśaṃsati anyatrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyamīti,
analyzed: na api anyam kañcid dharmam āśaṃsati anyatra anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyami iti

original: sa tayā āsravakṣaya sākṣātkriyābhijñājñānābhinirhārakuśalatayā na manyate tathā hi taj jñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya,
analyzed: sa tayā āsrava kṣaya sākṣātkriyā abhijñā jñāna abhinirhāra kuśala tayā na manyate tathā hi tat jñānam ajñānam a cintya tām upādāya

original: so 'haṃ prajānāmīti na manyate,
analyzed: saḥ ham prajānāmi iti na manyate

analyzed: tat eva ca jñānam na upalabhate svabhāva śūnya tām upādāya svabhāva vivikta tām upādāya svabhāva anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: na sa āsravakṣayacetanām apy utpādayati nāsravakṣayābhijñābhinirhāracetanāṃ vānyatra

original: sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāt. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ

original: carann āsravakṣayābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati.
analyzed: caran āsrava kṣaya abhijñā sākṣātkriyā jñānam abhinirharati

analyzed: evam punar śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ ṣaṣ abhijñāḥ paripūryante pariśudhyante ca

analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām carantaḥ dāna pāramitāyām sthitvā sarva ākārajña tā panthānam śodhayanti

analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām carantaḥ vīrya pāramitāyām sthitvā sarva ākārajña tā panthānam śodhayanti

analyzed: santi śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām carantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitvā sarva ākārajña tā panthānam śodhayanti

analyzed: adhastāt diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamān lokadhātūn ābhayā avabhāsayāmāsuḥ

original: buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti sma:
analyzed: buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti sma

original: kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam eva prabhāvabhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate?
analyzed: kasya ayam bhagavan anubhāvaḥ yena ayam eva prabhā avabhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate

original: te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān evam āhuḥ:
analyzed: te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān evam āhuḥ

original: eṣa kulaputrāḥ paścime yāvad adho digbhāge sahāyāṃ lokadhātau śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddḥs tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
analyzed: eṣa kula putrāḥ paścime yāvat adhas digbhāge sahāyām lokadhātau śākyamuniḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddṛḥ tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati

original: tena jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadībālukopamā iokadhātavo (PvsP1-1: 108)
analyzed: tena jihvā indriyam nirṇamayya pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ

original: 'vabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtā yāvad ūrdhvaṃ diśi,
analyzed: vabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtāḥ yāvat ūrdhvam diśi

original: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadībālukopamā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya.
analyzed: evam daśasu dikṣu gaṅgā nadī bālukā upamāḥ lokadhātavaḥ vabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtāḥ yat uta bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya

original: te bodhisattvās tāṃs tathāgatān evam āhuḥ:
analyzed: te bodhisattvāḥ tān tathāgatān evam āhuḥ

original: gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
analyzed: gamiṣyāmaḥ vayam bhagavan tām sahā lokadhātum tam bhagavantam śākyamunim tathāgatam darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya

original: tāṃś ca daśadiksaṃnipatitān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāṃs tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ śravaṇāya.
analyzed: tān ca daśa diś saṃnipatitān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān tām ca prajñāpāramitām śravaṇāya

original: te buddhā bhagavanta āhuḥ:
analyzed: te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ āhuḥ

original: gacchata kulaputrā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyadhvam.
analyzed: gacchata kula putrāḥ yasya idānīm kālam manyadhvam

original: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā daśabhyo digbhyaḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantīr
analyzed: atha khalu te bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ daśabhyaḥ digbhyaḥ puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākā vaijayantīḥ

original: gṛhītvā nānāratnasuvarṇarūpyapuṣpapuṭāni ca gṛhītvā mahatyā tūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītyā
analyzed: gṛhītvā nānā ratna suvarṇa rūpya puṣpa puṭāni ca gṛhītvā mahatyā tūrya tāḍāva cara saṃgītyā

original: bhagavantaṃ śākyamunim upasaṃkrāntā abhūvan.
analyzed: bhagavantam śākyamunim upasaṃkrāntāḥ abhūvan

original: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśā devā yāmā devās tuṣitā devā nirmāṇaratayo
analyzed: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ devāḥ trayastriṃśāḥ devāḥ yāmāḥ devāḥ tuṣitāḥ devāḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ

original: devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devā brahmapurohitā devā mahābrahmāṇo devāḥ parīttābhā
analyzed: devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ devāḥ brahmapurohitāḥ devāḥ mahābrahmāṇaḥ devāḥ parīttābhā

original: devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā
analyzed: devāḥ apramāṇa ābhāḥ devāḥ ābhāsvarāḥ devāḥ parītta śubhāḥ devāḥ apramāṇa śubhāḥ devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā

original: devā anabhrakā devāḥ puṇyaprasavā devā bṛhatphalā devā asaṃjñisattvā devāḥ śuddhābhāsā
analyzed: devāḥ anabhrakāḥ devāḥ puṇyaprasavāḥ devāḥ bṛhatphalāḥ devāḥ asaṃjñisattvāḥ devāḥ śuddha ābhāsā

original: devā aspṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhāś ca devā divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākā
analyzed: devāḥ aspṛhāḥ devāḥ atapāḥ devāḥ sudṛśāḥ devāḥ sudarśanāḥ devāḥ akaniṣṭhāḥ ca devāḥ divya puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja patākā

original: utpalakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravakesaratamālapatrāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāman.
analyzed: utpala kumuda puṇḍarīka māndārava kesara tamāla patrāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāman

original: atha khalu te bodhisattvās te ca devās taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma.
analyzed: atha khalu te bodhisattvāḥ te ca devāḥ taiḥ puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepanaiḥ tathāgatam arhantam samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti sma

original: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi vaihāyasam abhyudgamyāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātor
analyzed: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi vaihāyasam abhyudgamya asya tri sāhasra mahā sāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ

original: upariṣṭāt puṣpakūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt catusthūṇaś caturasro bhāgataḥ suvibhakto ramaṇīyo manoramaḥ.
analyzed: upariṣṭāt puṣpa kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthitaḥ bhūt catur sthūṇaḥ catur asraḥ bhāgataḥ suvibhaktaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ manoramaḥ

original: atha khalu tataḥ parṣadaḥ prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasram utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ (PvsP1-1: 109)
analyzed: atha khalu tatas parṣadaḥ prāṇi koṭī niyuta śata sahasram utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇam jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām

original: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: vayaṃ bhagavann anāgate 'dhvani evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhavema yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
analyzed: vayam bhagavan anāgate dhvani evaṃrūpāṇām dharmāṇām lābhinaḥ bhavema yathā tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: evaṃ ca śrāvakagaṇaṃ parikarṣema evaṃ ca parṣadi dharmaṃ deśayema yac caitarhi tathāgato bhagavān dharmaṃ deśayati.
analyzed: evam ca śrāvaka gaṇam parikarṣema evam ca parṣadi dharmam deśayema yat ca etarhi tathāgataḥ bhagavān dharmam deśayati

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āsayaṃ viditvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ cānutpādāyānirodhāyānabhisaṃskārāyāprādurbhāvāya
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān teṣām kula putrāṇām āsayam viditvā sarva dharmāṇām ca an utpādāya a nirodhāya an abhisaṃskārāya a prādurbhāvāya

original: kṣāntiṃ viditvā smitam akarot. atha tato 'nekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārān
analyzed: kṣāntim viditvā smitam akarot atha tatas neka varṇāḥ raśmayaḥ bhagavataḥ mukha dvārān

original: niścaritās te sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar evāgatā bhagavato mūrdhany antardhīyante sma.
analyzed: niścaritāḥ te sarvāvantam lokam pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar eva āgatāḥ bhagavataḥ mūrdhani antardhīyante sma

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ janumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya  #
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān ānandaḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃsam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇam janu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya

original: bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya pradurbhāvāya?
analyzed: kaḥ bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya pradurbhāvāya

original: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etat avocat

original: etad ānanda prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasram aṣṭaṣaṣṭyā kalpakoṭībhir bodhyaṅgapuṣpanāmānas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka utpatsyante
analyzed: etat ānanda prāṇi koṭī niyuta śata sahasram aṣṭaṣaṣṭyā kalpa koṭībhiḥ bodhyaṅgapuṣpa nāmānaḥ tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ loke utpatsyante

original: iti ṣaḍabhijñāvavādaḥ
analyzed: iti ṣaḍabhijñāvavādaḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām āyuṣmantam subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa

original: pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām ārabhya yathā bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāyur iti.
analyzed: pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām ārabhya yathā bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām niryāyuḥ iti

original: atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat,
analyzed: atha khalu teṣām bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām teṣām ca mahāśrāvakāṇām teṣām ca deva putrāṇām etat abhavat

original: kiṃ nu khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty utāho buddhānubhāvena?
analyzed: kim nu khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ svakena prajñā pratibhāna bala ādhānena bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyati uta aho buddha anubhāvena

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāñ
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ buddha anubhāvena teṣām bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām teṣām

original: ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ
analyzed: ca mahāśrāvakāṇām teṣām ca deva putrāṇām cetasā eva cetaḥ parivitarkam ājñāya āyuṣmantam

original: śāriputram etad avocat:
analyzed: śāriputram etat avocat

original: yat kiñcid (PvsP1-1: 110)
analyzed: yat kiñcid

original: āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti sarvaḥ sa tathāgatasya puruṣakāro veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ bhāṣante deśayanti upadiśanti sarvaḥ sa tathāgatasya puruṣakāraḥ veditavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇās tāṃ dharmatāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ hi tathāgatena dharmaḥ deśitaḥ tasyām dharma deśanāyām śikṣamāṇāḥ tām dharmatām

original: sākṣātkurvanti tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtvā yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty upadiśanti
analyzed: sākṣātkurvanti tām dharmatām sākṣātkṛtvā yat yat eva bhāṣante deśayanti upadiśanti

original: sarvaṃ tad dharmatayā na virudhyate,
analyzed: sarvam tat dharmatayā na virudhyate

original: tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputra upāyayogena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyati,
analyzed: tathāgataḥ eva eṣa śāriputra upāya yogena bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyati

original: aviṣayo 'tra śāriputra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadeṣṭum.
analyzed: aviṣayaḥ tra śāriputra sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām upadeṣṭum

original: iti darśanamārgāvavādopakṣepaḥ
analyzed: iti darśana mārga avavāda upakṣepaḥ

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: bodhisattva iti bhagavann ucyate,
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ iti bhagavan ucyate

original: katamasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti?
analyzed: katamasya etat bhagavan dharmasya adhivacanam yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: nāhaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yad uta bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: na aham bhagavan dharmam samanupaśyāmi yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvam asamanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām apy anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vadiṣyāmi?
analyzed: saḥ ham bhagavan bodhisattvam a samanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām api an upalabhamānaḥ katamam bodhisattvam katamasyām prajñāpāramitāyām vadiṣyāmi

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad uta prajñāpāramitā iti bodhisattva iti ca,
analyzed: nāma mātram idam subhūte yat uta prajñāpāramitā iti bodhisattvaḥ iti ca

original: tad api ca bodhisattvanāma nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,
analyzed: tat api ca bodhisattva nāma na adhyātmam na bahirdhā na ubhayam antareṇa upalabhyate

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sattvaḥ sattva iti cocyate,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte sattvaḥ sattvaḥ iti ca ucyate

original: na ca kācit sattvopalabdhiḥ,
analyzed: na ca kācid sattva upalabdhiḥ

original: yac ca tannāma tat prajñaptimātraṃ prajñaptidharmaḥ prajñaptisat.
analyzed: yat ca tat nāma tat prajñapti mātram prajñapti dharmaḥ prajñapti sat

original: iti duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
analyzed: iti duḥkhe dharma jñāna kṣāntiḥ

original: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate,
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca dharma prajñapteḥ na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ nyatra nāma saṃketa mātreṇa vyavahriyate

original: evam ātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakāḥ sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva  #
analyzed: evam ātma sattva jīva poṣa puruṣa pudgala manuja mānava kāraka vedaka jānaka paśyakāḥ sarve ete prajñapti dharmāḥ sarve ete anutpādāḥ anirodhāḥ yāvat eva

original: nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyante.
analyzed: nāma mātreṇa vyavahriyante

original: evam eva subhūte yā ca prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: evam eva subhūte yā ca prajñāpāramitā

original: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
analyzed: yaḥ ca bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ

original: yac ca bodhisattvanāma sarva ete prajñaptidharmāḥ,
analyzed: yat ca bodhisattva nāma sarve ete prajñapti dharmāḥ

original: sarva ete anutpādā anirodhā yāvad eva nāmamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
analyzed: sarve ete anutpādāḥ anirodhāḥ yāvat eva nāma mātreṇa vyavahriyate

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte idam adhyātmikaṃ rūpam iti dharmaprajñaptimātraṃ (PvsP1-1: 111)
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte idam adhyātmikam rūpam iti dharma prajñapti mātram

original: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca dharma prajñapteḥ na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ nyatra nāma saṃketa mātreṇa vyavahriyate

original: vedaneti dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
analyzed: vedanā iti dharma prajñapti mātram etat

original: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca dharma prajñapteḥ na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ nyatra nāma saṃketa mātreṇa vyavahriyate

original: saṃjñeti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
analyzed: saṃjñā iti subhūte dharma prajñapti mātram etat

original: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca dharma prajñapteḥ na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ nyatra nāma saṃketa mātreṇa vyavahriyate

original: saṃskārā iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ iti subhūte dharma prajñapti mātram etat

original: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca dharma prajñapteḥ na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ nyatra nāma saṃketa mātreṇa vyavahriyate

original: vijñānam iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat,
analyzed: vijñānam iti subhūte dharma prajñapti mātram etat

original: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca dharma prajñapteḥ na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ nyatra nāma saṃketa mātreṇa vyavahriyate

original: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā ca bodhisattvaś ca bodhisattvanāma ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās
analyzed: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā ca bodhisattvaḥ ca bodhisattva nāma ca sarve ete prajñapti dharmāḥ

original: teṣāñ ca prajñaptidharmāṇāṃ notpādona nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate.
analyzed: teṣām ca prajñapti dharmāṇām na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ nyatra nāma saṃketa mātreṇa vyavahriyate

original: evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisattva iti bodhisattvanāmeti ca sarva ete prajñaptidharmās te ca nānānāmadheyair vyapadiśyante,

analyzed: atyanta tayā bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ na vidyate na upalabhyate

analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā evam śikṣitavyam yathā śikṣamāṇena rūpam jñātavyam na ca tena mantavyam

analyzed: catvāri vaiśāradyāni daśa tathāgata balāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ jñātavyāḥ na ca taiḥ mantavyam

analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā bodhi cittam nāma jñātavyam asama cittam nāma udāra cittam nāma jñātavyam

analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte yathaiva tac cittam avikāram avikalpaṃ tathaiva rūpam apy avikāram avikalpaṃ,
analyzed: kim punar āyuṣman subhūte yathā eva tat cittam avikāram avikalpam tathā eva rūpam api avikāram avikalpam

original: vedanāpy avikārā avikalpā saṃjñāpy avikārā avikalpā saṃskārā apy avikārā avikalpā vijñānam apy avikāram avikalpaṃ,
analyzed: vedanā api avikārā avikalpā saṃjñā api avikārā avikalpā saṃskārāḥ api avikārāḥ avikalpāḥ vijñānam api avikāram avikalpam

original: evam eva cakṣurdhātū rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ,
analyzed: evam eva cakṣuḥ dhātuḥ rūpa dhātuḥ cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātuḥ avikāraḥ vikalpaḥ

original: śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ,
analyzed: śrotra dhātuḥ śabda dhātuḥ śrotra vijñāna dhātuḥ avikāraḥ vikalpaḥ

original: ghrāṇadhātur gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ,
analyzed: ghrāṇa dhātuḥ gandha dhātuḥ ghrāṇa vijñāna dhātuḥ avikāraḥ vikalpaḥ

original: jihvādhātū rasadhātur jihvāvijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ,
analyzed: jihvā dhātuḥ rasa dhātuḥ jihvā vijñāna dhātuḥ avikāraḥ vikalpaḥ

original: kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ kāyavijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ,
analyzed: kāya dhātuḥ spraṣṭavya dhātuḥ kāya vijñāna dhātuḥ avikāraḥ vikalpaḥ

original: manodhātur dharmadhātur manovijñānadhātur avikāro 'vikalpaḥ. evam āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ dhātuḥ dharmadhātuḥ manaḥ vijñāna dhātuḥ avikāraḥ vikalpaḥ evam āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ

original: pāramitā abhijñāḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidbalāveṇikā
analyzed: pāramitāḥ abhijñāḥ smṛti upasthāna samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid bala āveṇikā

original: buddhadharmā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir avikārā avikalpā.
analyzed: buddha dharmāḥ yāvat anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ a vikārā a vikalpā

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathaiva cittam avikāram (PvsP1-1: 155)
analyzed: evam etat āyuṣman śāriputra yathā eva cittam avikāram

original: avikalpaṃ tathaiva skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābhijñābodhipakṣyā dharmā daśatathāgatabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā  #
analyzed: avikalpam tathā eva skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpāda pāramitā abhijñā bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ daśa tathāgata bala vaiśāradya aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ

original: yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
analyzed: yāvat anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte tadyathāpi nāma bhagavataḥ putra auraso mukhato jāto
analyzed: sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte tat yathā api nāma bhagavataḥ putraḥ aurasaḥ mukhataḥ jātaḥ

original: dharmajo dharmanirmito dharmadāyādo nāmiṣadāyādaḥ pratyakṣacakṣudharmeṣu kāyasākṣī
analyzed: dharma jaḥ dharma nirmitaḥ dharma dāyādaḥ na āmiṣa dāyādaḥ pratyakṣa cakṣu dharmeṣu kāya sākṣī

original: yathāpi nāmāgrāro 'raṇāvihāriṇāṃ bhagavatā agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭasyāyam upadeśaḥ.
analyzed: yathā api nāma agrāraḥ raṇa vihāriṇām bhagavatā agra tāyām nirdiṣṭasya ayam upadeśaḥ

original: evam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
analyzed: evam āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitavyam

original: ataś ca bodhisattvo mahasattvo 'vinivartanīya upaparīkṣitavyo 'virahitaś ca prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ.
analyzed: atas ca bodhisattvaḥ mahasattvaḥ vinivartanīyaḥ upaparīkṣitavyaḥ virahitaḥ ca prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ

original: iti mārgasatyādhikāreṇa mṛdūṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ
analyzed: iti mārga satya adhikāreṇa mṛdu ūṣma gatasya ālambana ākāra viśeṣaḥ

original: śrāvakabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva
analyzed: śrāvaka bhūmau api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitu kāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva

original: prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśas ca upaparīkṣitavyā

original: pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
analyzed: pratyekabuddha bhūmau api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitu kāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena

original: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā
analyzed: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā

original: yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
analyzed: yoniśas ca upaparīkṣitavyā

original: bodhisattvabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam
analyzed: bodhisattva bhūmau api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitu kāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam

original: eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
analyzed: eva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśas ca upaparīkṣitavyā

original: buddhabhūmāv api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva
analyzed: buddha bhūmau api āyuṣman subhūte śikṣitu kāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyam eva

original: prajñāpāramitā śrotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca upaparīkṣitavyā.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśas ca upaparīkṣitavyā

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā bodhisattvabhūmau  #
analyzed: tathā hi atra prajñāpāramitāyām trīṇi yānāni vistareṇa upadiṣṭāni yatra bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau vā bodhisattva bhūmau

original: vā śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: vā śikṣitavyam

original: iti sarveṣāṃ hetutvaviśeṣaḥ
analyzed: iti sarveṣām hetu tva viśeṣaḥ

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: yo 'haṃ bhagavan na bodhisattvaṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ vindāmi nopalabhe na (PvsP1-1: 156)
analyzed: yaḥ ham bhagavat na bodhisattvam na prajñāpāramitām vindāmi nā upalabhe na

original: samanupaśyāmi. tat katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
analyzed: samanupaśyāmi tat katamam bodhisattvam katamasyām prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi

original: etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
analyzed: etat eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyam syāt

original: yo 'haṃ vastu na vindāmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi so 'haṃ bhagavan vastv avindann anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamena dharmeṇa katamaṃ  #
analyzed: yaḥ ham vastu na vindāmi na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi saḥ ham bhagavan vastu a vindan an upalabhamānaḥ samanupaśyan katamena dharmeṇa katamam

original: dharmam avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
analyzed: dharmam avavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi

original: etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
analyzed: etat eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyam syāt

original: yo 'haṃ sarvadhharmān avindann anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇāyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ bodhisattva iti vā prajñāpāramiteti vā.
analyzed: yaḥ ham sarva dhharmān a vindan an upalabhamānaḥ samanupaśyan nāmadheya mātreṇa āya vyayam kuryām bodhisattvaḥ iti vā prajñāpāramitā iti vā

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan tat api nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvena tasya nāmadheyasya evam tam nāmadheyam na sthitam na a sthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam

original: rūpasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: rūpasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: vedanāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: vedanāyāḥ aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: saṃjñāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: saṃjñāyāḥ aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: saṃskārāṇām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ canopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: saṃskārāṇām aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam cana upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: vijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: vijñānasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: so 'haṃ bhagavan rūpādīnām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti?
analyzed: saḥ ham bhagavan rūpa ādīnām āyam ca vyayam ca an upalabhamānaḥ samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyam kariṣyāmi bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa tat api nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvāt tasya nāmadheyasya

original: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
analyzed: evam tam nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam

original: cakṣuṣo 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ ham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: śrotrasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: śrotrasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: ghrāṇasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: ghrāṇasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: jihvāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: jihvāyāḥ aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: kāyasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: kāyasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: manaso 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
analyzed: manasaḥ ham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yad api tad rūpaṃ nāma vedanā nāma saṃjñā nāma saṃskārā nāma vijñānaṃ nāma cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ (PvsP1-1: 157)
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yat api tat rūpam nāma vedanā nāma saṃjñā nāma saṃskārāḥ nāma vijñānam nāma cakṣuḥ śrotram ghrāṇam

original: jihvā kāyo mana iti nāma,
analyzed: jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ iti nāma

original: etāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni nāsthitāni na viṣṭitāni nāviṣṭitāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: etāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni na asthitāni na viṣṭitāni na a viṣṭitāni tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvena teṣāṃ nāmadheyānāṃ,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvena teṣām nāmadheyānām

original: evaṃ tāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni nāsthitāni na viṣṭitāni nāviṣṭitāni,
analyzed: evam tāni nāmadheyāni na sthitāni na asthitāni na viṣṭitāni na a viṣṭitāni

original: rūpasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe. evaṃ śabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi
analyzed: rūpasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe evam śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭavya dharmāṇām āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi

original: so 'haṃ bhagavan rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva
analyzed: saḥ ham bhagavan rūpa śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭavya dharmāṇām āyam ca vyayam ca an upalabhamānaḥ samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyam kariṣyāmi bodhisattva

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan tat api nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvena tasya nāmadheyasya

original: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
analyzed: evam tam nāmadheyam na sthitam na a sthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam

original: cakṣurvijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñānasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: evaṃ śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: evam śrotra vijñānasya ghrāṇa vijñānasya jihvā vijñānasya kāya vijñānasya manaḥ vijñānasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: so 'haṃ bhagavaṃś cakṣurvijñānasya śrotravijñānasya ghrāṇavijñānasya jihvāvijñānasya
analyzed: saḥ u ham bhagavan cakṣuḥ vijñānasya śrotra vijñānasya ghrāṇa vijñānasya jihvā vijñānasya

original: kāyavijñānasya manovijñānasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyann anupalambhamānaḥ kasya
analyzed: kāya vijñānasya manaḥ vijñānasya ayam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyan an upalambhamānaḥ kasya

original: nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva iti.
analyzed: nāmadheyam kariṣyāmi bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan tat api nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvena tasya nāmadheyasya

original: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
analyzed: evam tam nāmadheyam na sthitam na a sthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam

original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvac cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ saṃsparśasya aham bhagavan yāvat cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitasya ayam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: śrotrasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvac chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: śrotra saṃsparśasya aham bhagavan yāvat śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitasya ayam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvad ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: ghrāṇa saṃsparśasya aham bhagavan yāvat ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitasya ayam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: jihvāsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvad jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: jihvā saṃsparśasya aham bhagavan yāvat jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitasya ayam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: kāyasaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvat kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: kāya saṃsparśasya aham bhagavan yāvat kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitasya ayam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: manaḥsaṃsparśasyāhaṃ bhagavan yāvan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitasyāyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe, (PvsP1-1: 158)
analyzed: manaḥ saṃsparśasya aham bhagavan yāvat manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitasya ayam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: pṛthivīdhātor evam abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor ākāśadhātor vijñānadhātor āyañ ca vyayañ ca na sanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
analyzed: pṛthivī dhātoḥ evam ap dhātoḥ tejaḥ dhātoḥ vāyu dhātoḥ ākāśa dhātoḥ vijñāna dhātoḥ āyam ca vyayam ca na sanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: evam avidyā yāvaj jarāmaraṇasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: evam avidyā yāvat jarā maraṇasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: evam avidyānirodhasya yāvaj jarāmaraṇanirodhasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: evam avidyā nirodhasya yāvat jarā maraṇa nirodhasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

analyzed: skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādānām aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: rāgadveṣamohānām ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe,
analyzed: rāga dveṣa mohānām aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: paryutthānāvaraṇānuśayasaṃyojanadṛṣṭikṛtānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca na samanupaśyāmi nopalabhe.
analyzed: paryutthāna āvaraṇa anuśaya saṃyojana dṛṣṭi kṛtānām aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na samanupaśyāmi na upalabhe

original: dānapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: dāna pāramitāyāḥ aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: śīlapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: śīla pāramitāyāḥ aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: kṣāntipāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ cavyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: vīryapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavannāyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: vīrya pāramitāyāḥ aham bhagavan nāyam ca vyayam ca nā upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: dhyānapāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: prajñāpāramitāyā ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: ātmano 'haṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: evaṃ sattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi.
analyzed: evam sattva jīva poṣa puruṣa pudgala manuja mānava kāraka vedaka jānaka paśyakānām aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca nā upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: smṛtyupashānām ahaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: smṛti upashānām aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi
