analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipādena driya bala bodhyaṅga mārgasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: śūnyatāyā ānimittasyāpraṇihitasyāhaṃ bhagavann āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: śūnyatāyāḥ ā nimittasya a praṇihitasya aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

analyzed: caturṇām dhyānānām caturṇām apramāṇānām catasṛṇām ārūpya samāpattīnām aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: buddhānusmṛter dharmānusmṛteḥ saṃghānusmṛteḥ śīlānusmṛtes tyāgānusmṛter devatānusmṛter āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: buddha anusmṛteḥ dharma anusmṛteḥ saṃgha anusmṛteḥ śīla anusmṛteḥ tyāga anusmṛteḥ devatā anusmṛteḥ āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

analyzed: āna apāna anusmṛteḥ maraṇa anusmṛteḥ āyam ca

original: vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: vyayam ca nā upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: pañcānāṃ cakṣuṣām abhijñānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: pañcānām cakṣuṣām abhijñānām vaiśāradyānām daśānām tathāgata balānām āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

analyzed: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām aham bhagavan buddha dharmāṇām āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: so 'haṃ bhagavann aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām āyañ ca vyayañ cānupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi bodhisattva
analyzed: saḥ ham bhagavan aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām āyam ca vyayam ca an upalabhamānaḥ samanupaśyan kasya nāmadheyam kariṣyāmi bodhisattva

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan tat api nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvena tasya nāmadheyasya,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvena tasya nāmadheyasya

original: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
analyzed: evam tam nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam

original: svapnopamānām ahaṃ bhagavan pañcānām upādānaskandhānām āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
analyzed: svapna upamānām aham bhagavan pañcānām upādāna skandhānām āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: evaṃ māyopamānāṃ pratiśrutkopamānāṃ pratibhāsopamānāṃ pratibimbopāmānāṃ marīcyupamānāṃ
analyzed: evam māyā upamānām pratiśrutkā upamānām pratibhāsa upamānām pratibimba upāmānām marīci upamānām

original: udakacandropamānāṃ nirmitakopamānām ahaṃ bhagavan pañcānām upādānaskandhānām āyañ
analyzed: udaka candra upamānām nirmitaka upamānām aham bhagavan pañcānām upādāna skandhānām āyan

original: ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi. evaṃ viviktasya śāntasyānutpādasyānirodhasyāsaṃkleśasyāvyavadānasya

original: ahaṃ bhagavan āyañ ca vyayañ ca nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi. evaṃ dharmadhātos tathatāyā
analyzed: aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi evam dharmadhātoḥ tathatāyāḥ

analyzed: atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām dharmāṇām āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

analyzed: bhagavataḥ pi aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam cana upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhanām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām sa bodhisattva saṃghānām

analyzed: uttarasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu

original: adho diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣulokadhātuṣu,
analyzed: adhas diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu

analyzed: tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām sa śrāvaka saṃghānām sa bodhisattva saṃghānām aham bhagavan āyam ca vyayam ca na upalabhe na samanupaśyāmi

original: so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sabodhisattvasaṃghānāmāyañ

original: avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan tat api nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvāt tasya nāmadheyasya

original: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,

analyzed: saḥ ham bhagavan sarva dharma tathatāyām āyam ca vyayam ca an upalabhamānaḥ samanupaśyan katamam bodhisattvam katamasyām prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmi

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan tat api nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvāt tasya nāmadheyasya

original: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam.
analyzed: evam tam nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam

original: iti madhyoṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ
analyzed: iti madhya ūṣma gatasya ālambana ākāra viśeṣaḥ

original: yāpīyaṃ bhagavan dharmasāṃketikī dharmaprajñaptir yad uta bodhisattva iti,

analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bhagavan svapnaḥ na kenacid vacanīyaḥ pratiśrutkaḥ pratibhāsaḥ pratibimbam nirmitakam na kenacid vacanīyam

original: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pṛthivyāptejovāyvākāśaṃ nāma na kenacid (PvsP1-1: 161)
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma bhagavan pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśam nāma na kenacid

original: vacanīyam, tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan śīlam iti samādhir iti prajñeti vimuktir iti vimuktijñā anadarśanam iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
analyzed: vacanīyam tat yathā api nāma bhagavan śīlam iti samādhiḥ iti prajñā iti vimuktiḥ iti vimukti jñā anadarśanam iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyam

original: srotaāpanna iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,
analyzed: srotaāpannaḥ iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyam

original: sakṛdāgāmīti,
analyzed: sakṛt āgāmi iti

original: anāgāmīti,

original: arhann iti,
analyzed: arhan iti

original: pratyekabuddha iti,
analyzed: pratyekabuddhaḥ iti

original: yāvad bodhisattvadharma iti tathāgata iti buddha iti tathateti buddhadharma iti nāma na kenacid vacanīyaṃ,

analyzed: kuśalena vā akuśalena vā sāvadyena vā anavadyena vā sukhena vā duḥkhena vā ātmanā

original: vā anātmanā vā śāntena vā aśāntena vā viviktena vā aviviktenavā nimittena vā animittena
analyzed: vā anātmanā vā śāntena vā aśāntena vā viviktena vā aviviktena vā nimittena vā animittena

analyzed: vā bhāvena vā abhāvena vā imam api aham bhagavan artha vaśam pratītya evam vadāmi

original: etad eva me bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavaṃs tad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam,
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan tat api nāmadheyam na sthitam na asthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: avidyamānatvāt tasya nāmadheyasya,
analyzed: a vidyamāna tvāt tasya nāmadheyasya

original: evaṃ taṃ nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitaṃ,
analyzed: evam tam nāmadheyam na sthitam na a sthitam na viṣṭhitam na a viṣṭhitam

analyzed: saced bhagavan evam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām cittam na avalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati

original: mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate niyataṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartaṇīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito veditavyaḥ  #
analyzed: mānasam nā uttrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate niyatam bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vinivartaṇīyāyām bodhisattva bhūmau sthitaḥ veditavyaḥ  /

original: susthito 'sthānayogena.
analyzed: su sthitaḥ sthāna yogena

original: iti adhimātroṣmagatasyālambanākāraviśeṣaḥ
analyzed: iti adhimātra ūṣma gatasya ālambana ākāra viśeṣaḥ

analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā na rūpe

analyzed: sthātavyam na vedanāyām na saṃjñāyām na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne sthātavyam tena na

analyzed: cakṣuṣi sthātavyam na śrotre na ghrāṇe na jihvāyām na kāye na manasi sthātavyam

original: tena na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na śabde na gandhe na rase na spraṣṭavye na dharme sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: tena na rūpe sthātavyam na śabde na gandhe na rase na spraṣṭavye na dharme sthātavyam

original: tena na cakṣurvijñāne sthātavyan na śrotravijñāne na ghrāṇavijñāne na jihvāvijñāne na kāyavijñāne na manovijñāne sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: tena na cakṣuḥ vijñāne sthātavyam na śrotra vijñāne na ghrāṇa vijñāne na jihvā vijñāne na kāya vijñāne na manaḥ vijñāne sthātavyam

original: tena na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe sthātavyan na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: tena na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśe sthātavyam na cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayite sthātavyam

original: na śrotrasaṃsparśe na śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: na śrotra saṃsparśe na śrotra saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayite sthātavyam

analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśe

original: na ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayite sthātavyam

original: na jihvāsaṃsparśe na jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśe na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayite sthātavyam

analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśe na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayite sthātavyam

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśe na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayite sthātavyam. na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau nākāśadhātau  #
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśe na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayite sthātavyam na pṛthivī dhātau sthātavyam na ap dhātau na tejaḥ dhātau na vāyu dhātau na ākāśa dhātau

original: na vijñānadhātau sthātavyaṃ,
analyzed: na vijñāna dhātau sthātavyam

analyzed: tena na avidyāyām sthātavyam na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne na nāma rūpe na ṣaṣ āyatane na sparse

original: na vedanāyāṃ na tṛṣṇāyāṃ nopādāne na bhave na jātau na jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaumanasyopayāseṣu sthātavyam.
analyzed: na vedanāyām na tṛṣṇāyām na upādāne na bhave na jātau na jarā maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daumanasya upayāseṣu sthātavyam

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: tathā hi bhagavan rūpam rūpa tvena śūnyam

analyzed: vedanā vedanā tvena śūnyā

original: saṃjñā saṃjñātvena śūnyā,
analyzed: saṃjñā saṃjñā tvena śūnyā

original: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāratvena śūnyāḥ,
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāra tvena śūnyāḥ

original: vijñānaṃ vijñānatvena śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: vijñānam vijñāna tvena śūnyam

original: yā ca bhagavan rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ,
analyzed: yā ca bhagavan rūpasya śūnyatā na tat rūpam

original: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā rūpaṃ,
analyzed: na ca anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ rūpam

original: rūpam eva śūnyatāśūnyataiva rūpaṃ,
analyzed: rūpam eva śūnyatā a śūnyatā eva rūpam

analyzed: yā ca bhagavan vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā vedanā

analyzed: yā ca bhagavan saṃskārāṇām śūnyatā na te saṃskārāḥ

analyzed: na ca anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ saṃskārāḥ

original: saṃskārā eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ,
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ eva śūnyatā śūnyatā eva saṃskārāḥ

original: yā ca bhagavan vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ,
analyzed: yā ca bhagavan vijñānasya śūnyatā na tat vijñānam

original: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā vijñānaṃ,
analyzed: na ca anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ vijñānam

original: vijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva vijñānam.
analyzed: vijñānam eva śūnyatā śūnyatā eva vijñānam

original: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na
analyzed: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā na rūpe sthātavyam na vedanāyām na saṃjñāyām na saṃskāreṣu na

original: na pṛthivīdhātau sthātavyaṃ nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau nākāśadhātau na vijñānadhātau sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na pṛthivī dhātau sthātavyam na ap dhātau na tejaḥ dhātau na vāyu dhātau na ākāśa dhātau na vijñāna dhātau sthātavyam tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: yā ca vijñānadhātu śūnyatā na asau vijñānadhātuḥ na ca anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ vijñānadhātuḥ vijñānadhātuḥ eva śūnyatā

analyzed: caratā na pṛthivī dhātau sthātavyam na ap dhātau na tejaḥ dhātau na vāyu dhātau na ākāśa dhātau

analyzed: yā ca rūpe śūnyatā na tat rūpam

analyzed: dharmadhātuḥ eva śūnyatā śūnyatā eva dharmadhātuḥ tat anena api bhagavan paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā dharmadhātau

original: na sthātavyam.
analyzed: na sthātavyam

original: evaṃ dharmaniyāmatāyāṃ na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: yā ca bhagavan dharmaniyāmatā śūnyatā na sā dharmaniyamatā,

original: na cānyatra dharmaniyāmatāyāḥ śūnyatā,

original: na sthātavyam.
analyzed: na sthātavyam

original: evaṃ bhūtakoṭyāṃ na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

original: na sthātavyam.
analyzed: na sthātavyam

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu na sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

analyzed: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyam vijñāna svabhāvena tasya nā api jātiḥ nā api niryāṇam upalabhyate evam vistareṇa vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādeṣu

original: adhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte 'dhimucyate,
analyzed: adhitiṣṭhati saṃjānīte dhimucyate

original: sarvān buddhadharmān adhitiṣṭhan saṃjānāno 'dhimucyamānaḥ,
analyzed: sarvān buddha dharmān adhitiṣṭhan saṃjānānaḥ dhimucyamānaḥ

original: buddhadharmāṇām abhisaṃskāre carati,
analyzed: buddha dharmāṇām abhisaṃskāre carati

original: abhisaṃskāre carann aparimucyate,
analyzed: abhisaṃskāre caran a parimucyate

original: jātyā jarayā maraṇena ca śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair na parimucyate duḥkheneti vadāmi.
analyzed: jātyā jarayā maraṇena ca śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsaiḥ na parimucyate duḥkhena iti vadāmi

original: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhavyaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patituṃ kutaḥ so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim (PvsP1-1:
analyzed: sa khalu punar śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhavyaḥ śrāvaka bhūmim pratyekabuddha bhūmim vā patitum kutas saḥ nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim

original: abhisaṃbhotsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ.
analyzed: abhisaṃbhotsyate na idam sthānam vidyate evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran an upāya kuśalaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ?
analyzed: katham āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran upāya kuśalaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpam adhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
analyzed: yaḥ āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na rūpam adhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte na adhimucyate

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānam na adhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte na adhimucyate

original: evaṃ yāvad buddhadharmān nādhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte nādhimucyate,
analyzed: evam yāvat buddha dharmān na adhitiṣṭhati na saṃjānīte na adhimucyate

original: sa na rūpe carati na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati,
analyzed: sa na rūpe carati na vedanāyām na saṃjñāyām na saṃskāreṣu na vijñāne carati

analyzed: na rūpasya nimitte carati na vedanāyāḥ na saṃjñāyāḥ na saṃskārāṇām na vijñanasya nimitte carati

analyzed: na rūpam nityam iti na anityam iti carati

analyzed: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam nityam iti na anityam iti carati

analyzed: na rūpam sukham iti na duḥkham iti na ātmā iti na anātmā iti na śāntam iti na aśāntam iti carati

analyzed: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam sukham iti na duḥkham iti na ātmā iti na anātmā iti

original: na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti carati,
analyzed: na śāntam iti na a śāntam iti carati

original: na rūpaṃ śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti carati na nimittam iti nānimittam iti carati,
analyzed: na rūpam śūnyam iti na a śūnyam iti carati na nimittam iti na a nimittam iti carati

original: na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti carati na viviktam iti nāviviktam iti carati,
analyzed: na praṇihitam iti na apraṇihitam iti carati na viviktam iti na aviviktam iti carati

original: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti carati,
analyzed: evam na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ na vijñānam na śūnyam iti na a śūnyam iti carati

original: na nimittam iti nānimittam iti carati na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti carati,
analyzed: na nimittam iti na animittam iti carati na praṇihitam iti na apraṇihitam iti carati

original: na viviktam iti nāviviktam iti carati.
analyzed: na viviktam iti na a viviktam iti carati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tad rūpaṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra yā rūpasya śūnyatā na tat rūpam

original: na cānyatra śūnyatāyāḥ rūpaṃ,
analyzed: na ca anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ rūpam

original: nānyatra rūpāc chūnyatā,
analyzed: na anyatra rūpāt śūnyatā

analyzed: rūpam eva śūnyatā śūnyatā evam rūpam

analyzed: yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā saṃskārāṇām śūnyatā

original: yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na tad vijñānaṃ,
analyzed: yā vijñānasya śūnya tā na tat vijñānam

original: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā vijñānaṃ,
analyzed: na ca anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ vijñānam

original: nānyatra vijñānāc chūnyatā,
analyzed: na anyatra vijñānāt śūnyatā

original: śūnyataiva vijñānaṃ vijñānam eva śūnyatā.
analyzed: śūnyatā eva vijñānam vijñānam eva śūnyatā

original: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣeṣu
analyzed: evam vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādeṣu saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣeṣu

original: dharmeṣu pāramitāsv abhijñāsu apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu balavaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu
analyzed: dharmeṣu pāramitāsu abhijñāsu apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu bala vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsu

original: āveṇikeṣubuddhadharmeṣu,
analyzed: āveṇika iṣu buddha dharmeṣu

original: yāvad yā buddhadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā na te buddhadharmā,(PvsP1-1: 182)
analyzed: yāvat yā buddha dharmāṇām śūnyatā na te

original: na cānyatra śūnyatāyā buddhadharmāḥ,
analyzed: na ca anyatra śūnyatāyāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: nānyatra buddhadharmebhyaḥ śūnyatā,
analyzed: na anyatra buddha dharmebhyaḥ śūnyatā

original: śūnyataiva buddhadharmā buddhadharmā eva śūnyatā.
analyzed: śūnyatā eva buddha dharmāḥ buddha dharmāḥ eva śūnyatā

original: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran upāya kuśalaḥ veditavyaḥ

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran bhavyaḥ nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum

original: sa punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sacet kaṃcid dharmam upaiti na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
analyzed: sa punar prajñāpāramitāyām caran saced kaṃcid dharmam upaiti na carati prajñāpāramitāyām

analyzed: na upaiti na carati

analyzed: upaiti na upaiti ca na carati

analyzed: na eva upaiti na na upaiti ca na carati prajñāpāramitāyām

original: śāriputra āha:

original: subhūtir āha:

original: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ na upalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām carāmi iti nā upaiti

analyzed: na carāmi iti na upaiti

original: carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti,
analyzed: carāmi ca na carāmi ca iti na upaiti

original: tathā hi tena sarvadharmā abhāvasvabhāvā ity anugatā anupāttāḥ. saced evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ

analyzed: carataḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittam na avalīyate na saṃlīyate na uttrasyati na

analyzed: saṃtrāsam āpadyate veditavyam

analyzed: iti adhimātra kṣānteḥ ālambana ākāra viśeṣaḥ

analyzed: na jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayita śūnyatayā śūnyam jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam eva śūnyatā

original: śūnyataiva jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam,
analyzed: śūnya tā eva jihvā saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam

original: na kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ,
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayita śūnyatayā śūnyam kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyatā eva kāya saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam

original: na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitaśūnyatayā śūnyaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedayitam.
analyzed: na manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayita śūnyatayā śūnyam manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam eva śūnyatā śūnyatā eva manaḥ saṃsparśa pratyaya vedayitam

original: na smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatayā smṛtyupasthānāni śūnyāni smṛtyupasthānāny eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva smṛtyupasthānāni,
analyzed: na smṛti upasthāna śūnyatayā smṛti upasthānāni śūnyāni smṛti upasthānāni eva śūnyatā śūnyatā eva smṛti upasthānāni

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni,
analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅgāni

original: na mārgaśūnyatayā mārgaḥ śūnyo mārga eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva mārgaḥ,
analyzed: na mārga śūnyatayā mārgaḥ śūnyaḥ mārgaḥ eva śūnyatā śūnyatā eva mārgaḥ

analyzed: na bala vaiśāradya āveṇika buddha dharma śūnyatayā buddha dharmāḥ śūnyāḥ buddha dharmāḥ eva

analyzed: śūnyatā śūnyatā eva buddha dharmāḥ iyam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā

analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajnāpāramitāyām caran nā uttrasyati na saṃtrasyati

analyzed: na saṃtrāsam āpadyate

original: yā dharme 'bhiratir iyam ucyate dharmaratiḥ,
analyzed: yā dharme bhiratiḥ iyam ucyate dharma ratiḥ

original: tatra katamā dharmārāmatā?
analyzed: tatra katamā dharma ārāma tā

original: yā tasya dharmasya bhāvanā bahulīkaraṇatā,
analyzed: yā tasya dharmasya bhāvanā bahulīkaraṇa tā

original: iyam ucyate dharmārāmatā. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā  #
analyzed: iyam ucyate dharma ārāma tā evam hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā mahataḥ sattva rāśeḥ mahataḥ sattva nikāyasya agra tā  /

original: kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: kārayitavyāḥ anupalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā adhyātma śūnyatāyām

original: sthitvā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
analyzed: sthitvā bahirdhā śūnyatāyām sthitvā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyām sthitvā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyām

original: sthitvā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: sthitvā mahataḥ sattva rāśeḥ mahataḥ sattva nikāyasya agra tā kārayitavyā an upalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā saptatriṃśad
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā saptatriṃśat

original: bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisamvitsv aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu
analyzed: bodhi pakṣeṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā baleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisamvitsu aṣṭādaśa āveṇikeṣu

original: buddhadharmeṣu sthitvā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: buddha dharmeṣu sthitvā mahataḥ sattva rāśeḥ mahataḥ sattva nikāyasya agra tā kārayitavyā an upalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā vajropamasamādhau
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā vajra upama samādhau

original: sthitvā yāvad ākāśāsaṅgavimuktinirupalepasamādhau sthitvā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ
analyzed: sthitvā yāvat ākāśa āsaṅga vimukti nirupalepa samādhau sthitvā mahataḥ sattva rāśeḥ mahataḥ

original: sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā anupalambhayogena,
analyzed: sattva nikāyasya agra tā kārayitavyā anupalambha yogena

original: eteṣu subhūte dharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā mahataḥ sattvarāśer mahataḥ sattvanikāyasyāgratā kārayitavyā,
analyzed: eteṣu subhūte dharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām caratā mahataḥ sattva rāśeḥ mahataḥ sattva nikāyasya agra tā kārayitavyā

original: tenocyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
analyzed: tena ucyate bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ

original: iti sarvasattvāgratācittamahattvam
analyzed: iti sarva sattva agra tā citta mahattvam

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
analyzed: mama api bhagavan pratibhāti yena arthena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ iti ucyate

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: pratibhātu te śāriputra yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
analyzed: pratibhātu te śāriputra yena arthena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ iti ucyate

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: ātmadṛṣṭer bhagavan sattvadṛṣṭer jīvadṛṣṭer jantudṛṣṭer poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakadṛṣṭer (PvsP1-2: 31)
analyzed: ātma dṛṣṭeḥ bhagavan sattva dṛṣṭeḥ jīva dṛṣṭeḥ jantu dṛṣṭeḥ poṣa puruṣa pudgala manuja mānava kāraka vedaka jānaka paśyaka dṛṣṭeḥ

original: cchedadṛṣṭeḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭer astidṛṣṭer nāstidṛṣṭeḥ skandhadṛṣṭer dhātudṛṣṭer āyatanadṛṣṭeḥ
analyzed: cheda dṛṣṭeḥ śāśvata dṛṣṭeḥ asti dṛṣṭeḥ nāsti dṛṣṭeḥ skandha dṛṣṭeḥ dhātu dṛṣṭeḥ āyatana dṛṣṭeḥ

original: pratītyasamutpādadṛṣṭer bodhipakṣadharmadṛṣṭer balavaiśāradyadṛṣṭer āveṇikabuddhadharmadṛṣṭeḥ
analyzed: pratītyasamutpāda dṛṣṭeḥ bodhi pakṣa dharma dṛṣṭeḥ bala vaiśāradya dṛṣṭeḥ āveṇika buddha dharma dṛṣṭeḥ

original: sattvaparipācanadṛṣṭer buddhakṣetrapariśodhanadṛṣṭer bodhisattvadṛṣṭer buddhadṛṣṭer
analyzed: sattva paripācana dṛṣṭeḥ buddhakṣetra pariśodhana dṛṣṭeḥ bodhisattva dṛṣṭeḥ buddha dṛṣṭeḥ

original: dharmacakrapravartanadṛṣṭer iti,
analyzed: dharmacakra pravartana dṛṣṭeḥ iti

original: āsāṃ sarvāsāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayaty anupalambhayogena,
analyzed: āsām sarvāsām dṛṣṭīnām prahāṇāya dharmam deśayati anupalambha yogena

original: tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
analyzed: tena arthena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ iti ucyate

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpadṛṣṭir bhavati,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpa dṛṣṭiḥ bhavati

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānadṛṣṭir bhavati?
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñāna dṛṣṭiḥ bhavati

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: ihāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann anupāyakuśalo bhavati,
analyzed: iha āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran an upāya kuśalaḥ bhavati

original: sa rūpam upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena,
analyzed: sa rūpam upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayati upalambha yogena

original: evaṃ vistareṇa vyastasamastaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ yāvaj jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty
analyzed: evam vistareṇa vyasta samastam skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādam yāvat jarā maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayati

original: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitābhijñākṣarāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty
analyzed: evam smṛti upasthāna samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga pāramitā abhijñā akṣara apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayati

original: evaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayaty upalambhayogena.
analyzed: evam daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān upalabhya dṛṣṭim utpādayati upalambha yogena

original: iti prahāṇamahattvam
analyzed: iti prahāṇa mahat tvam

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
analyzed: mama api bhagavan pratibhāti yena arthena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ iti ucyate

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: pratibhātu te subhūte.
analyzed: pratibhātu te subhūte

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: yad api bhagavan bodhicittam asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ tatrāpi citte 'saktaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yat api bhagavan bodhi cittam asamasama cittam asādhāraṇa cittam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ tatra api citte saktaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi tat sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ traidhātuke tatrāpi citte 'saktas tena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
analyzed: tathā hi tat sarvajña tā cittam anāsravam a paryāpannam traidhātuke tatra api citte saktaḥ tena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ iti saṃkhyām gacchati

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: katamad āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ?
analyzed: katamat āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasama cittam asādhāraṇa cittam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya na kasyacid dharmasya utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
analyzed: iha āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prathama citta utpādam upādāya na kasyacid dharmasya utpādam vā nirodham vā samanupaśyati

original: na hāniṃ na vṛddhiṃ nāgatiṃ na gatiṃ na saṃkleśaṃ na vyavadānaṃ yatra cāyuṣman śāriputra na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na gatir nāgatir na hānir  #
analyzed: na hānim na vṛddhim na āgatim na gatim na saṃkleśam na vyavadānam yatra ca āyuṣman śāriputra na saṃkleśaḥ na vyavadānam na gatiḥ na agatiḥ na hāniḥ

original: na vṛddhir notpādo na nirodhaḥ,
analyzed: na vṛddhiḥ na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ

original: tac ca na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam,
analyzed: tat ca na śrāvaka cittam na pratyekabuddha cittam

original: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasamacittam asādhāraṇacittaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ.
analyzed: idam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asamasama cittam asādhāraṇa cittam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: yad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
analyzed: yat āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ evam āha

original: tatrāpi śrāvakapratyekabuddhacitte 'sakta iti,
analyzed: tatra api śrāvaka pratyekabuddha citte saktaḥ iti

original: nanv āyuṣman subhūte rūpam apy asaktaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
analyzed: nanu āyuṣman subhūte rūpam api asaktam prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaktam.
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam api asaktam

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam apy asaktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy asaktaṃ,
analyzed: evam etat āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam api asaktam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam api asaktam

original: yāvad vyastasamastāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā yāvaj jarāmaraṇam apy asaktaṃ,
analyzed: yāvat vyasta samastāḥ skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādāḥ yāvat jarā maraṇam api asaktam

original: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'py asaktāḥ,
analyzed: evam apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ pi asaktāḥ

original: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā apy asaktāḥ.
analyzed: yāvat saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ api asaktāḥ

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: yad apy āyuṣmān subhūtir idam āha,
analyzed: yat api āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ idam āha

original: yad api tat sarvajñatācittam anāsravam aparyāpannam iti,
analyzed: yat api tat sarvajña tā cittam anāsravam a paryāpannam iti

original: nanv āyuṣman subhūte bālapṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
analyzed: nanu āyuṣman subhūte bāla pṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam a paryāpannam prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya

original: nanu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.
analyzed: nanu sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha samyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam a paryāpannam prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra.
analyzed: evam etat āyuṣman śāriputra

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: rūpam api subhūte anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
analyzed: rūpam api subhūte anāsravam a paryāpannam prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam apy āyuṣman subhūte anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam api āyuṣman subhūte anāsravam a paryāpannam prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya

original: nanv āyuṣman subhūte saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri
analyzed: nanu āyuṣman subhūte saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri

original: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anāsravā aparyāpannāḥ
analyzed: vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ anāsravāḥ a paryāpannāḥ

original: prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.
analyzed: prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi bālapṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām (PvsP1-2: 33)
analyzed: evam etat āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi bāla pṛthagjanānām api cittam anāsravam a paryāpannam prakṛti śūnyatām

original: upādāya, yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam aparyāpannaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya,
analyzed: upādāya yāvat sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha samyaksaṃbuddhānām api cittam anāsravam a paryāpannam prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya

original: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣā dharmā daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anāsravā aparyāpannāḥ  #
analyzed: yāvat saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ anāsravāḥ a paryāpannāḥ

original: prakṛtiśūnyatām upādāya.
analyzed: prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: yad api tad āyuṣmān subhūtir evam āha,
analyzed: yat api tat āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ evam āha

original: acittatvāt tatrāpi citte asakta iti,
analyzed: acitta tvāt tatra api citte asakte iti

original: nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'rūpe 'pi rūpam asaktam avedanāyām api vedanā asaktāsaṃjñāyām api saṃjñā asaktāsaṃskāreṣv api saṃskārā asaktāvijñāne 'pi  #
analyzed: nanu āyuṣman subhūte rūpe pi rūpam asaktam a vedanāyām api vedanā asaktā a saṃjñāyām api saṃjñā asaktā a saṃskāreṣu api saṃskārāḥ asaktāḥ a vijñāne pi

original: vijñānam asaktam.
analyzed: vijñānam asaktam

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra.
analyzed: evam etat āyuṣman śāriputra

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: nanv āyuṣman subhūte 'smṛtyupasthāneṣv api smṛtyupasthānāny asaktāni,
analyzed: nanu āyuṣman subhūte smṛti upasthāneṣu api smṛti upasthānāni asaktāni

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgapāramitāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyabhijñābalavaiśāradyāni yāvad āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣv api  #
analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga pāramitā pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpatti abhijñā bala vaiśāradyāni yāvat āveṇika buddha dharmeṣu api

original: āveṇikabuddhadharmā asaktāḥ.
analyzed: āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ asaktāḥ

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi,
analyzed: evam etat āyuṣman śāriputra yathā vadasi

original: rūpe 'py āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam asaktaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñāne 'pi vijñānam asaktam,
analyzed: rūpe pi āyuṣman śāriputra rūpam asaktam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāne pi vijñānam asaktam

original: evaṃ vyastasamastā api skandhadhātava āyatanāni satyāni pratītyasamutpādo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
analyzed: evam vyasta samastāḥ api skandha dhātavaḥ āyatanāni satyāni pratītyasamutpādau pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: pāramitā abhijñā bodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ,
analyzed: pāramitāḥ abhijñāḥ bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv āveṇikā buddhadharmā asaktāḥ,
analyzed: āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ asaktāḥ

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tenāpi
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran tena api

original: bodhicittena asamasamacittena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair asādhāraṇacittena na manyate
analyzed: bodhi cittena asamasama cittena sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ asādhāraṇa cittena na manyate

original: nābhiniviśate sarvadharmānupalambhayogena.
analyzed: na abhiniviśate sarva dharma anupalambha yogena

original: ity adhigamamahattvam
analyzed: iti adhigama mahattvam

original: ity uktaḥ pratipattyuddeśaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ pratipatti uddeśaḥ

original: pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āha:
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ maitrāyaṇīputraḥ āha

original: mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate.
analyzed: mama api bhagavan pratibhāti yena arthena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ iti ucyate

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: pratibhātu te pūrṇa.
analyzed: pratibhātu te pūrṇa

original: pūrṇa āha: mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sa bhagavan sattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa sattvo mahāyānasamārūḍhaḥ sa sattvas tena bhagavan bodhisattvo  #
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ āha mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ sa bhagavan sattvaḥ mahāyāna saṃprasthitaḥ sa sattvaḥ mahāyāna samārūḍhaḥ sa sattvaḥ tena bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ

original: mahāsattva ity ucyate.
analyzed: mahāsattvaḥ iti ucyate

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: kiyatā ayuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahasattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate?
analyzed: kiyatā ayuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvaḥ mahasattvaḥ mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti ucyate

original: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti,
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ āha iha āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ na prādeśikānām sattvānām kṛtena bodhāya caran dāna pāramitāyām sthitvā dānam dadāti

original: api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānaṃ dadāti,
analyzed: api tu sarva sattvānām kṛtena dāna pāramitāyām sthitvā dānam dadāti

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtena bodhāya caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ  #
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām na prādeśikānām sattvānām kṛtena bodhāya caran prajñāpāramitāyām

original: sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
analyzed: sthitvā prajñāpāramitām bhāvayati

original: api tu sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
analyzed: api tu sarva sattvānām kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyām sthitvā prajñāpāramitām bhāvayati

original: na sattvaparicchedena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ saṃnahyate,
analyzed: na sattva paricchedena bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāham saṃnahyate

original: iyataḥ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi,
analyzed: iyataḥ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi

analyzed: iyataḥ sattvān bodhāya pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi

analyzed: iyataḥ sattvān bodhāya na pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iti

analyzed: api tu khalu punar sarva sattvānām kṛtena sannāham saṃnahyate

original: evaṃ cāsya bhavati,
analyzed: evam ca asya bhavati

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ,
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām

analyzed: ātmanā ca prajñāpāramitām paripūrayiṣyāmi

analyzed: evam apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ

analyzed: ātmanā ca bhāvayiṣyāmi sarva sattvān ca tāsu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iti

original: yāvat saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣv ātmanā ca sthāsyāmi sarvasattvāṃś ca teṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti,
analyzed: yāvat saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśa bala vaiśāradya aṣṭādaśa āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu ātmanā ca sthāsyāmi sarva sattvān ca teṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi iti

original: iyatāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
analyzed: iyatā āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti ucyate

original: iti pratipattisvarūpam
analyzed: iti pratipatti svarūpam

analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ dānam

original: dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair yā śrāvakapratyekabuddhamanasikārāṇāṃ parivarjanatā,

analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ dānam dadataḥ sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ yā teṣām

analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ dānam

original: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadato vīryapāramitāsannāhaḥ.
analyzed: ayam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ dānam dadataḥ vīrya pāramitā sanna ahaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ dānam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ dānam

analyzed: dadataḥ sarva ākārajña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ yā māyā kṛta saṃjñā upasthitā na eva

original: dāyakam upalabhate na pratigrāhakaṃ na deyaṃ,

original: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānaṃ dadataḥ prajñāpāramitāsannāhaḥ,

analyzed: manasikāraiḥ śīla pāramitāyām carataḥ yā śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bhūmi a spṛhaṇa tā prāk

analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīla pāramitāyām carataḥ sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ yā vīrya asraṃsana tā an avalīna tā

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carato vīryapāramitā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīla pāramitāyām carataḥ vīrya pāramitā

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair

analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīla pāramitāyām carataḥ sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ sarva dharmeṣu māyā kṛta saṃjñā pratyupasthitā

analyzed: manasikāraiḥ tat ca kuśala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye

original: pariṇāmayati, (PvsP1-2: 37)
analyzed: pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣānti pāramitāyām carataḥ dāna pāramitā

original: evaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
analyzed: evam kṣānti pāramitāyām carataḥ śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran sarvabuddhadharmasamudānayanatāyai
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ kṣānti pāramitāyām caran sarva buddha dharma samudānayana tāyai

original: sarvasattvaparipākāya ca prayujyate prajñayā sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair
analyzed: sarva sattva paripākāya ca prayujyate prajñayā sarva ākārajña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ

original: na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tac cakuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ
analyzed: na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ tat ca kuśala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam

original: kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣānti pāramitāyām carataḥ prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ kṣānti pāramitāyām caran ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti

original: tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
analyzed: tena mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti saṃkhyām gacchati

original: iti kṣāntipāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ tṛtīyam
analyzed: iti kṣānti pāramitā sannāha ṣaṭkam tṛtīyam

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vīrya pāramitāyām caran dānam

original: dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair
analyzed: dadāti sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktaiḥ

original: manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: manasikāraiḥ tat ca kuśala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīrya pāramitāyām carataḥ dāna pāramitā

original: evaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
analyzed: evam vīrya pāramitāyām carataḥ śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñām upasthāpayati,
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vīrya pāramitāyām caran prajñāpāramitām bhāvayan sarva dharmeṣu māyā kṛta saṃjñām upasthāpayati

original: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktaiḥ

original: manasikārais tac ca kusalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: manasikāraiḥ tat ca kusala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīrya pāramitāyām carataḥ prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vīrya pāramitāyām caran ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti

original: tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
analyzed: tena mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti saṃkhyām gacchati

original: iti vīryapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ caturtham
analyzed: iti vīrya pāramitā sannāha ṣaṭkam caturtham

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ (PvsP1-2: 38)
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dhyāna pāramitāyām

original: caran dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair
analyzed: caran dānam dadāti sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktaiḥ

original: manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: manasikāraiḥ tat ca kuśala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyāna pāramitāyām carataḥ dāna pāramitā

original: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
analyzed: evam dhyāna pāramitāyām carataḥ śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvadharmeṣu māyākṛtasaṃjñām upasthāpayati,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dhyāna pāramitāyām caran prajñāpāramitām bhāvayan sarva dharmeṣu māyā kṛta saṃjñām upasthāpayati

original: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktaiḥ

original: manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: manasikāraiḥ tat ca kuśala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyāna pāramitāyām carataḥ prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dhyāna pāramitāyām caran ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti

original: tena mahāsannāhasannaddha iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati.
analyzed: tena mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti saṃkhyām gacchati

original: iti dhyānapāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ pañcamam
analyzed: iti dhyāna pāramitā sannāha ṣaṭkam pañcamam

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran tri maṇḍala pariśuddham

original: dānaṃ dadāti sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair
analyzed: dānam dadāti sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktaiḥ

original: manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: manasikāraiḥ tat ca kuśala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā,
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ dāna pāramitā

original: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
analyzed: evam prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran prajñāpāramitām bhāvayati

original: tasya sarvapāramitāsu sarvadharmeṣu ca māyāsvapnapratibhāsapratiśrutkāpratibimbanirmāṇasaṃjñā
analyzed: tasya sarva pāramitāsu sarva dharmeṣu ca māyā svapna pratibhāsa pratiśrutkā pratibimba nirmāṇa saṃjñā

original: pratyupasthitā bhavati sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktair
analyzed: pratyupasthitā bhavati sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ na śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktaiḥ

original: manasikārais tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: manasikāraiḥ tat ca kuśala mūlam sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati,
analyzed: evam hi śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran prajñāpāramitām paripūrayati

original: yad āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittenaitāḥ ṣaṭ (PvsP1-2: 39)
analyzed: yat āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktena cittena etāḥ ṣaḍ

original: pāramitā na nimittīkaroti nopalabhate.
analyzed: pāramitāḥ na nimittīkaroti na upalabhate

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran mahāsannāhasannaddho bhavati,
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ ca punar āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekaikasyāṃ pāramitāyāṃ sthitvā ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati.
analyzed: evam ca punar āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ekaikasyām pāramitāyām sthitvā ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati

original: iti prajñāpāramitāsannāhaṣaṭkaṃ ṣaṣṭham
analyzed: iti prajñāpāramitā sannāha ṣaṭkam ṣaṣṭham

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate na ca dhyānāny āsvādayati na ca taiḥ saṃhriyate na ca teṣāṃ vaśenopapadyate,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dhyānāni ca samāpadyate na ca dhyānāni āsvādayati na ca taiḥ saṃhriyate na ca teṣām vaśena upapadyate

original: evam apramāṇāni cārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate na ca tā āsvādayati na ca tābhiḥ saṃhriyate na ca tāsāṃ vaśenopapadyate,
analyzed: evam apramāṇāni ca ārūpya samāpattīḥ ca samāpadyate na ca tāḥ āsvādayati na ca tābhiḥ saṃhriyate na ca tāsām vaśena upapadyate

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalagatā prajñāpāramitā veditavyā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upāya kauśala gatā prajñāpāramitā veditavyā

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu vivekadarśanena ca viharati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitadarśanena ca viharati  #
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu viveka darśanena ca viharati śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita darśanena ca viharati

original: na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
analyzed: na ca bhūtakoṭim sākṣātkaroti

original: ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata upāyakauśalasannāhaḥ.
analyzed: ayam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ upāya kauśala sannāhaḥ

original: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhas tenocyate bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti,
analyzed: evam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ tena ucyate bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ iti

original: evaṃ mahāsannāhasannaddhasyāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśasu
analyzed: evam mahā sannāha sannaddhasya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśasu

original: dikṣu buddhā bhagavanta udānam udānayanti varṇam udīrayanti nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānās
analyzed: dikṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ udānam udānayanti varṇam udīrayanti nāmadheyam parikīrtayamānāḥ

original: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śabdam anuśrāvayanti ghoṣam udīrayanti,
analyzed: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śabdam anuśrāvayanti ghoṣam udīrayanti

original: amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha iti sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
analyzed: amuṣmin lokadhātu prasare bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti sattvān ca paripācayati buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayati

original: iti sannāhaṣaṭkopasaṃhāraḥ
analyzed: iti sannāha ṣaṭka upasaṃhāraḥ

original: ity uktā sannāhapratipattiḥ
analyzed: iti uktā sannāha pratipattiḥ

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: kiyat āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati?
analyzed: kiyat āyuṣman pūrṇa bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahāyāna saṃprasthitaḥ mahāyāna samārūḍhaḥ bhavati

original: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran viviktaṃ
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ āha iha āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dāna pāramitāyām caran viviktam

original: kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ
analyzed: kāmaiḥ viviktam pāpakaiḥ akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ sa vitarka sa vicāram viveka jam prīti sukham

original: prathamaṃ dhyānam (PvsP1-2: 40)
analyzed: prathamam dhyānam

original: upasaṃpadya viharati,
analyzed: upasaṃpadya viharati

original: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ,
analyzed: evam dvitīyam tṛtīyam caturtham dhyānam

original: evam ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanam ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
analyzed: evam ākāśa ānantya āyatanam vijñāna ānantya āyatanam ākiñcanya āyatanam na eva saṃjñāna asaṃjñā āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati

original: imāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānārūpyāṇi yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś
analyzed: imāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyāna ārūpyāṇi yadā bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ etaiḥ

original: ca dhyānair etaiś cārūpyair dānapāramitāyāṃ carann ākāśākāraliṅganimittaiḥ samāpadyamāno
analyzed: ca dhyānaiḥ etaiḥ ca ārūpyaiḥ dāna pāramitāyām caran ākāśa ākāra liṅga nimittaiḥ samāpadyamānaḥ

original: vyuttiṣṭhamānaś ca tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai
analyzed: vyuttiṣṭhamānaḥ ca tāni ca kuśala mūlāni sarva sattva sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai

original: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā,
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dāna pāramitā

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vācyam.
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām vācyam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyate catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyate catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattīḥ samāpadyate

original: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair etābhiś cārūpyasamāpattibhir viharati,
analyzed: yadā bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ etaiḥ ca dhyānaiḥ etābhiḥ ca ārūpya samāpattibhiḥ viharati

original: sa etā dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś cākāśākāraliṅganimittāni manasikaroti,
analyzed: saḥ etāḥ dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ samāpadyamānaḥ vyuttiṣṭhamānaḥ ca ākāśa ākāra liṅga nimittāni manasikaroti

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anyāni ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai  #
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām caran tāni ca kuśala mūlāni anyāni ca sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ sarva sattva sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai

original: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāsu caran mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sattvāṃś ca paripācayati buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati.
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāsu caran mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ sattvān ca paripācayati buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayati

analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ yat sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktam manasikāram utpādya kleśānām dhvaṃsanāya sarva sattvānām dharmam

analyzed: yat bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ taiḥ eva sarva ākāra jña tā pratisaṃyuktaiḥ manasikāraiḥ prathamam dhyānam ākrāmati deśayati

original: tatra ca prathame dhyāne pratiṣṭhate na cānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ dadāti śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktānām iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya  #
analyzed: tatra ca prathame dhyāne pratiṣṭhate na ca anyeṣām citta utpādānām avakāśam dadāti śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktānām iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

analyzed: manasikāraiḥ dhyāna ārūpyaiḥ viharataḥ evam bhavati

original: pūrṇa āha: ihāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitām ārohati,
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ āha iha āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran dāna pāramitām ārohati

original: sa naiva dānapāramitām upalabhate na dāyakaṃ na pratigrāhakaṃ na dānam upalabhate anupalambhayogena,
analyzed: sa nā eva dāna pāramitām upalabhate na dāyakam na pratigrāhakam na dānam upalabhate anupalambha yogena

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvodānapāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate,
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ udāna pāramitā samārūḍhaḥ iti ucyate

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ kṣāntipāramitāsamārūḍho vīryapāramitāsamārūḍho dhyānapāramitāsamārūḍhaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitā samārūḍhaḥ kṣānti pāramitā samārūḍhaḥ vīrya pāramitā samārūḍhaḥ dhyāna pāramitā samārūḍhaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran prajñāpāramitām

original: sa naivaprajñāpāramitām upalabhate na bodhisattvaṃ na manasikāram upalabhate anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: sa na eva prajñāpāramitām upalabhate na bodhisattvam na manasikāram upalabhate an upalambha yogena

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāsamārūḍha ity ucyate.
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahasattvaḥ prajñāpāramitā samārūḍhaḥ iti ucyate

original: iti trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiprasthānam
analyzed: iti tri maṇḍala pariśuddhi prasthānam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vyavakīrṇena sarva ākāra jña tā citta utpādena

original: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena.
analyzed: saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣān dharmān bhāvayati bhāvanā vibhāvanā arthena tat ca anupalambha yogena

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahāyāna samārūḍhaḥ iti ucyate

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vyavakīrṇena sarva ākāra jña tā citta utpādena

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhīn bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena.
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita samādhīn bhāvayati bhāvanā vibhāvanā arthena tat ca anupalambha yogena

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahāyāna samārūḍhaḥ iti ucyate

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyavakīrṇena sarvākārajñatācittotpādena
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ vyavakīrṇena sarva ākāra jña tā citta utpādena

original: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
analyzed: daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān

original: bhāvayati bhāvanāvibhāvanārthena tac cānupalambhayogena. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra
analyzed: bhāvayati bhāvanā vibhāvanā arthena tat ca anupalambha yogena evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra

original: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahāyāna samārūḍhaḥ iti ucyate

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ evam saṃjānāti

original: vyavahāramātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: vyavahāra mātram idam yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti sattva anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: idam api nāmamātraṃ yad uta rūpaṃ rūpānupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: idam api nāma mātram yat uta rūpam rūpa anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta vijñānaṃ vijñānānupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta vijñānam vijñāna anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta cakṣuś cakṣuṣo (PvsP1-2: 45)
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta cakṣuḥ cakṣuṣaḥ

original: 'nupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: n upalabdhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta mano manaso 'nupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: evam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ nāma mātram idam yat uta manaḥ manasaḥ n upalabdhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ vyastasamastāḥ skandhā dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā
analyzed: evam vyasta samastāḥ skandhāḥ dhātavaḥ āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyāḥ dharmāḥ balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśā āveṇikā

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatānupalabdhitām
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta adhyātma śūnyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā anupalabdhi tām

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddhadharmābuddhadharmānupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta buddha dharma abuddha dharma anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta tathatā dharmadhātuś ca dharmaniyāmatā ca bhūtakoṭiś ca bhūtakoṭyanupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: nāma mātram idam yat uta tathatā dharmadhātuḥ ca dharma niyāma tā ca bhūtakoṭiḥ ca bhūtakoṭi anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: nāmamātraṃ yad uta bodhir buddhaś ca buddhānupalabdhitām upādāya. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasamārūḍha ity ucyate.
analyzed: nāma mātram yat uta bodhiḥ buddhaḥ ca buddha anupalabdhi tām upādāya evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahāyāna samārūḍhaḥ iti ucyate

original: ity uddeśaprasthānam
analyzed: iti uddeśaprasthānam

original: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad
analyzed: punar aparam śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prathama citta utpādam upādāya yāvat

original: bodhir atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhijñāparipūrṇatvāt sattvāṃś ca paripācayati
analyzed: bodhiḥ atrā antare bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ bhijñā paripūrṇa tvāt sattvān ca paripācayati

original: buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
analyzed: buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetram saṃkrāmati

analyzed: buddhakṣetre buddhakṣetre ca buddhān bhagavataḥ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati

original: yo yasya buddhasya aupayikapūjāsatkāravidhis tebhyaś ca buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
analyzed: yaḥ yasya buddhasya aupayika pūjā satkāra vidhiḥ tebhyaḥ ca buddhebhyaḥ bhagavadbhyaḥ dharmam śṛṇoti

original: yad uta idam eva mahāyānam,
analyzed: yat uta idam eva mahāyānam

original: sa tatra bodhisattvayāne abhiruhya buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāmati,
analyzed: sa tatra bodhisattva yāne abhiruhya buddhakṣetreṇa ca buddhakṣetram saṃkrāmati

original: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
analyzed: buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayati sattvān ca paripācayati

original: na cāsya buddhakṣetrasaṃjñā pravartate na sattvasaṃjñā pravartate,
analyzed: na ca asya buddhakṣetra saṃjñā pravartate na sattva saṃjñā pravartate

original: so 'dvayabhūmau sthitvā yādṛśenātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ śaknoty arthakaraṇāya tādṛśam ātmabhāvaṃ saṃcintya parigṛhṇāti,
analyzed: saḥ dvaya bhūmau sthitvā yādṛśena ātma bhāvena sattvānām śaknoti artha karaṇāya tādṛśam ātma bhāvam saṃcintya parigṛhṇāti

original: sa na jātu tena mahāyānena virahito bhavati,
analyzed: sa na jātu tena mahā yānena virahitaḥ bhavati

original: yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti.
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākāra jña tām anuprāpnoti

original: ity abhijñāprasthānam
analyzed: iti abhijñāprasthānam

original: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayati,
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tām anuprāpya dharmacakram pravartayati

original: apravartanīyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair devanāgayakṣagandhrvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāsureṇa lokena,
analyzed: a pravartanīyam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ deva nāga yakṣa gandhrva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga manuṣya a manuṣya asureṇa lokena

original: tasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya,
analyzed: tasya anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya

original: pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇaṃ bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti (PvsP1-2: 46)
analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ varṇam bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti  /

original: yaśaḥ prakāśayanti,
analyzed: yaśaḥ prakāśayanti

original: eṣā amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare 'mukena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāyānam abhiruhya sarvākārajñatānuprāptā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ
analyzed: eṣā amuṣmin lokadhātu prasare mukena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāyānam abhiruhya sarva ākāra jña tā anuprāptā sarva ākāra jña tām anuprāpya dharmacakram

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttara pūrvasyām pūrva dakṣiṇasyām dakṣiṇa paścimāyām

analyzed: paścima uttarasyām adhas ūrdhva diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ

original: varṇaṃ bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti yaśaḥ prakāśayanti,
analyzed: varṇam bhāṣante ghoṣam udīrayanti yaśaḥ prakāśayanti

original: eṣāmuṣmin lokadhātuprasare 'mukena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatānuprāptā
analyzed: eṣā amuṣmin lokadhātu prasare mukena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarva ākāra jña tā anuprāptā

original: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartitam. evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tām anuprāpya dharma cakram pravartitam evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ

analyzed: mahāsattvaḥ mahāyāna samārūḍhaḥ iti ucyate

original: iti sarvākārajñatāprasthānam

original: mahāsannāhasannaddho mahāsannāhasannaddha iti bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ity ucyate,

analyzed: mahāsattva

original: evaṃ śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namas tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti,

analyzed: te tena eva sukha saumanasyena tebhyaḥ nirayebhyaḥ vyutthāya tatra lokadhātau upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti deva manuṣya upapattim

original: ca parigṛhṇanti,
analyzed: ca parigṛhṇanti

original: evaṃ tiryagyonito yamalokato vyutthāya tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti ca devamanuṣyopapattiṃ ca
analyzed: evam tiryagyonitaḥ yama lokataḥ vyutthāya tatra lokadhātau upapadyante yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti ca deva manuṣya upapattim ca

original: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ

analyzed: dakṣiṇa paścimāyām paścima uttarasyām adhas ūrdhva diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upamān lokadhātūn

original: avabhāsena spharati ca ṣaḍ vikāraṃ kampayati ca sarveṣu nairayika bhavaneṣu ca tam
analyzed: avabhāsena spharati ca ṣaṣ vikāram kampayati ca sarveṣu nairayika bhavaneṣu ca tam

analyzed: vijñāya bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ evam śabdam udīrayati ghoṣam anuśrāvayati namaḥ tathāgatāya arhate

original: samyaksaṃbuddhāyeti,
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhāya iti

original: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvās taṃ buddhaghoṣaṃ śrutvā sukhaṃ pratilabhante,
analyzed: tatas te nairayikāḥ sattvāḥ tam buddha ghoṣam śrutvā sukham pratilabhante

original: te tenaiva sukhasaumanasyena tebhyo nirayabhyo vyutthāya tatra tatra lokadhātāv upapadyante yatra yatra budhhān bhagavataḥ paśyanty ārāgayanti  #

analyzed: yatra buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti ārāgayanti deva manuṣya upapattim ca parigṛhṇanti
