analyzed: katham ca subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dhyāna pāramitāyām sthitvā sarva sattvān dhyāna pāramitāyām samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samatāyāṃ sthitvā na kasyacid dharmasya vikṣepaṃ vā avikṣepaṃ vā samanupaśyati,
analyzed: iha subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sarva dharmāṇām samatāyām sthitvā na kasyacid dharmasya vikṣepam vā avikṣepam vā samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati,
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dhyāna pāramitāyām sthitaḥ bhavati

original: sa tathaiva sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: sa tathā eva sarva sattvān dhyāna pāramitāyām samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: te ca samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavanti,
analyzed: te ca samādāpitāḥ niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ bhavanti

original: na jātu virahitā bhavanti dhyānapāramitayā yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti.
analyzed: na jātu virahitāḥ bhavanti dhyāna pāramitayā yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ iti

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā (PvsP1-2: 51)
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte dakṣaḥ māyākāraḥ māyākāra antevāsī vā

original: caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya taṃ janakāyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
analyzed: catur mahāpathe mahataḥ jana kāyasya puratas mahāntam jana kāyam abhinirmāya tam jana kāyam dhyāna pāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekaḥ sattvo 'pi dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
analyzed: tena tān tāvataḥ sattvān dhyāna pāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekaḥ dhyāna pāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ bhavati

original: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati.  #
analyzed: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarva sattvān dhyāna pāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid sattvaḥ dhyāna pāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ bhavati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
analyzed: dharmatā eṣā subhūte dharmāṇām māyā dharma tām upādāya evam hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti ucyate

original: iti dhyānasaṃbhāraḥ
analyzed: iti dhyāna saṃbhāraḥ

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitvā sarva sattvān prajñāpāramitāyām samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati?
analyzed: katham ca subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitvā sarva sattvān prajñāpāramitāyām samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kasyacid dharmasyāpāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā upalabhate,
analyzed: yatas subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na kasyacid dharmasya apāram vā pāram vā upalabhate

original: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati,
analyzed: evam bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām sthitaḥ bhavati

original: sa tathaiva sarvasattvān api tatra samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
analyzed: sa tathā eva sarva sattvān api tatra samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte dakṣaḥ māyākāraḥ māyākāra antevāsī vā catur mahāpathe mahataḥ jana kāyasya

original: purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: puratas mahāntam jana kāyam abhinirmāya prajñāpāramitāyām samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: tena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid ekasattvo 'pi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati,
analyzed: tena tān tāvataḥ sattvān prajñāpāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid eka sattvaḥ pi prajñāpāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ bhavati

original: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ prajñā apāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpito  #
analyzed: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarva sattvān prajñāpāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid sattvaḥ prajñā apāramitāyām

original: bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
analyzed: dharmatā eṣā subhūte dharmāṇām māyā dharma tām upādāya evam hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti ucyate

original: iti prajñāsaṃbhāraḥ
analyzed: iti prajñā saṃbhāraḥ

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ pūrvasyām diśi

original: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās tān sarvān yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāḥ tān sarvān yathā eva ātmanā dāna pāramitāyām

original: sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: sthitaḥ tathā dāna pāramitāyām samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām prajñāpāramitāyām samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: dharmaṃ ca (PvsP1-2: 52)
analyzed: dharmam ca

original: deśayati, yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktam,
analyzed: deśayati yat uta imam eva ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktam

original: te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti,
analyzed: te ca tam śrutvā na jātu bhūyas virahitāḥ bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ iti

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām uttara pūrvasyām pūrva dakṣiṇasyām dakṣiṇa paścimāyām

original: paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvadiśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvās
analyzed: paścima uttarasyām adhas ūrdhva diśi gaṅgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu yāvantaḥ sattvāḥ

original: tān sarvān yathaivātmanā dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitas tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati
analyzed: tān sarvān yathā eva ātmanā dāna pāramitāyām sthitaḥ tathā dāna pāramitāyām samādāpayati

original: niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām prajñāpāramitāyām samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati

original: dharmaṃ ca deśayati,
analyzed: dharmam ca deśayati

original: yad uta imam eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ,
analyzed: yat uta imam eva ṣaṣ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktam

original: te ca taṃ śrutvā na jātu bhūyo virahitā bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā iti.
analyzed: te ca tam śrutvā na jātu bhūyas virahitāḥ bhavanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ iti

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahato janakāyasya
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte dakṣaḥ māyākāraḥ māyākāra antevāsī vā catur mahāpathe mahataḥ jana kāyasya

original: purato mahāntaṃ janakāyam abhinirmāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat kiṃ manyase?
analyzed: puratas mahāntam jana kāyam abhinirmāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati tat kim manyase

original: subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākārāntevāsinā vā kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpito bhavati,
analyzed: subhūte api nu tena māyākāreṇa māyākāra antevāsinā vā kaścid sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu samādāpitaḥ bhavati

original: niveśito vā pratiṣṭhāpito vā bhavet.
analyzed: niveśitaḥ vā pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ vā bhavet

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: no bhagavan.
analyzed: naḥ bhagavan

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpito  #
analyzed: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tān tāvataḥ sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu

original: bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhasannaddha ity ucyate.
analyzed: dharmatā eṣā subhūte dharmāṇām māyā dharma tām upādāya evam hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāha sannaddhaḥ iti ucyate

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsannāhaṃ sannahya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktena cittena viharan nānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahā sannāham sannahya sarva ākārajña tā pratisaṃyuktena cittena viharan na anyeṣām citta utpādānām avakāśam

original: iyanto mayā sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti,
analyzed: iyantaḥ mayā sattvāḥ dāna pāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iti

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyām iyanto mayā sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na  #
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitāyām kṣānti pāramitāyām vīrya pāramitāyām dhyāna pāramitāyām iyantaḥ mayā sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ na

original: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti,
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iti

original: iyantaḥ sattvāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā,
analyzed: iyantaḥ sattvāḥ saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

original: yāvad iyantaḥ sattvā aṣṭādaśasv (PvsP1-2: 53)
analyzed: yāvat iyantaḥ sattvāḥ aṣṭādaśasu

original: āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ,
analyzed: āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpatti phale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale iyantaḥ sattvā arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmi phale anāgāmi phale iyantaḥ sattvāḥ arhat tve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ

original: na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto
analyzed: na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ sattvāḥ pratyekabuddha tve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ

original: na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyantaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iyanto na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā iti.
analyzed: na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iyantaḥ na pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ iti

original: api tu khalu punar asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ,
analyzed: api tu khalu punar asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

original: evaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv
analyzed: evam saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣeṣu dharmeṣu daśasu tathāgata baleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu

original: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale
analyzed: aṣṭādaśasu āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ srotaāpatti phale sakṛdāgāmi phale

original: anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabuddhatve asaṃkhyeyā aprameyāḥ sattvā buddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ.
analyzed: anāgāmi phale arhat tve pratyekabuddha tve asaṃkhyeyāḥ aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ buddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ

original: iti śamathasaṃbhāraḥ
analyzed: iti śamatha saṃbhāraḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyaṃ nirmāya taṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte dakṣaḥ māyākāraḥ māyākāra antevāsī vā catur mahāpathe mahāntam jana kāyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam nirmāya tam ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu

original: yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayed evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākāra vara upete sarvajña jñāne pratiṣṭhāpayet evam eva subhūte bodhisattvena

original: mahāsattvena tāṃs tāvataḥ sattvān asaṃkhyeyān aprameyān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya
analyzed: mahāsattvena tān tāvataḥ sattvān asaṃkhyeyān aprameyān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu pratiṣṭhāpya

original: yāvat sarvākāravaropete sarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścit sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākāra vara upete sarvajña jñāne pratiṣṭhāpya na kaścid sattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu

original: pratiṣṭhāpito bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ yad imāṃ māyādharmatām upādāya.
analyzed: dharma tā eṣā subhūte dharmāṇām yat imām māyā dharma tām upādāya

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā asannāhasannaddho batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya.  #
analyzed: yathā aham bhagavan bhagavataḥ bhāṣitasya artham ājānāmi tathā a sannāha sannaddhaḥ bata ayam bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ veditavyaḥ sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām upādāya

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi bhagavan rūpam rūpeṇa śūnyam

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam vijñānena śūnyam

original: cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ cakṣuṣā śūnyam

original: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano manasā śūnyam,
analyzed: evam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ manasā śūnyam

original: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: rūpam rūpeṇa śūnyam

original: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
analyzed: evam śabdaḥ gandhaḥ rasaḥ spraṣṭavyam dharmāḥ dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ

analyzed: evam vīrya samādhi citta samādhi mīmāṃsā samādhi prahāṇa saṃskāra samanvāgatam ṛddhipādam

original: bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargaparigataṃ tac cānupalambhayogena.
analyzed: bhāvayati viveka niśritam virāga niśritam nirodha niśritam vyavasarga parigatam tat ca anupalambha yogena

original: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
analyzed: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcendriyāṇi. katamāni pañca?
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yat uta pañca indriyāṇi katamāni pañca

original: śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ (PvsP1-2: 81)
analyzed: śraddhā indriyam vīrya indriyam

original: smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
analyzed: smṛti indriyam samādhi indriyam prajñā indriyam tat ca anupalambha yogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta pañcabalāni. katamāni pañca?
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yat uta pañca balāni katamāni pañca

original: śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ smṛtibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ prajñābalaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
analyzed: śraddhā balam vīrya balam smṛti balam samādhi balam prajñā balam tat ca anupalambha yogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta saptabodhyaṅgāni. katamāni sapta?
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yat uta sapta bodhyaṅgāni katamāni sapta

original: smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ dharmapravicayasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ
analyzed: smṛti saṃbodhi aṅgam dharma pravicaya saṃbodhi aṅgam vīrya saṃbodhi aṅgam prīti saṃbodhi aṅgam

original: praśrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgam upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam. tatra katamat smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ
analyzed: praśrabdhi saṃbodhi aṅgam samādhi saṃbodhi aṅgam upekṣā saṃbodhi aṅgam tatra katamat smṛti saṃbodhi aṅgam

original: yāvad upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam?
analyzed: yāvat upekṣā saṃbodhi aṅgam

original: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ yāvad
analyzed: iha subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran smṛti saṃbodhi aṅgam yāvat

original: upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargaparigataṃ
analyzed: upekṣā saṃbodhi aṅgam bhāvayati viveka niśritam virāga niśritam nirodha niśritam vyavasarga parigatam

original: tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
analyzed: tat ca anupalambha yogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ. katama āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ?
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yat uta ārya aṣṭāṅga mārgaḥ katamaḥ ārya aṣṭāṅgaḥ mārgaḥ

original: yad uta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ
analyzed: yat uta samyak dṛṣṭiḥ samyak saṃkalpaḥ samyak vāc samyak karmāntaḥ samyak ājīvaḥ samyak vyāyāmaḥ

original: samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya
analyzed: samyak smṛtiḥ samyak samādhiḥ tat ca anupalambha yogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya

original: mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
analyzed: mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta trayaḥ samādhayaḥ. katame trayaḥ samādhayaḥ?
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam yat uta trayaḥ samādhayaḥ katame trayaḥ samādhayaḥ

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ,
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitam

original: tatra katamaḥ śūnyatāsamādhiḥ?
analyzed: tatra katamaḥ śūnyatā samādhiḥ

original: svalakṣaṇena śūnyān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitiḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukhamayam ucyate śūnyatāsamādhiḥ,
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇena śūnyān sarva dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitiḥ śūnyatā vimokṣa mukham ayam ucyate śūnyatā samādhiḥ

original: ānimittān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitir ānimittaṃ vimokṣamukham ayam ucyate ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ,
analyzed: ānimittān sarva dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitiḥ ānimittam vimokṣa mukham ayam ucyate ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ

original: apraṇihitān sarvadharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitir apraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukham ayam ucyate apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ,
analyzed: apraṇihitān sarva dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇasya yā cittasya sthitiḥ apraṇihitam vimokṣa mukham ayam ucyate apraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ

original: imāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni trayaḥ samādhayaḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam. eteṣu triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu śikṣitavyam.
analyzed: imāni trīṇi vimokṣa mukhāni trayaḥ samādhayaḥ idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam eteṣu triṣu vimokṣa mukheṣu śikṣitavyam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ (PvsP1-2: 82)
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: yad uta duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānaṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādajñānaṃ
analyzed: yat uta duḥkha jñānam samudaya jñānam nirodha jñānam mārga jñānam kṣaya jñānam anutpāda jñānam

original: dharmajñānam anvayajñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ parijayajñānaṃ yathārutajñānam. tatra katamad duḥkhajñānam?
analyzed: dharma jñānam anvaya jñānam saṃvṛti jñānam parijaya jñānam yathāruta jñānam tatra katamat duḥkha jñānam

original: yad duḥkhasyānutpādajñānam idaṃ duḥkhajñānam. tatra katamat samudayajñānam?
analyzed: yat duḥkhasya anutpāda jñānam idam duḥkha jñānam tatra katamat samudaya jñānam

original: yat samudayasya prahāṇajñānam. tatra kataman nirodhajñānam?
analyzed: yat samudayasya prahāṇa jñānam tatra katamat nirodha jñānam

original: yad duḥkhanirodhajñānam. tatra kataman mārgajñānam?
analyzed: yat duḥkha nirodha jñānam tatra katamat mārga jñānam

original: yan nirodhasākṣātkaraṇajñānam. tatra katamat kṣayajñānam?
analyzed: yat nirodha sākṣātkaraṇa jñānam tatra katamat kṣaya jñānam

original: yad rāgadoṣamohakṣayajñānam. tatra katamad anutpādajñānam?
analyzed: yat rāga doṣa moha kṣaya jñānam tatra katamat anutpāda jñānam

original: yad anutpāde anutpādajñānam. tatra katamad dharmajñānam?
analyzed: yat anutpāde anutpāda jñānam tatra katamat dharma jñānam

original: yat pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ dharmopacchedajñānam. tatra katamad anvayajñānam?
analyzed: yat pañcānām skandhānām dharma upaccheda jñānam tatra katamat anvaya jñānam

original: cakṣur anityaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'nityaṃ,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ anityam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ nityam

original: evaṃ yāvad vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu ca jñānam. tatra katamat saṃvṛtijñānam?
analyzed: evam yāvat vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādeṣu ca jñānam tatra katamat saṃvṛti jñānam

original: yat parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cetaso jñānam. tatra katamat parijayajñānam?
analyzed: yat para sattvānām para pudgalānām cetasā eva cetasaḥ jñānam tatra katamat parijaya jñānam

original: yat pratipat parijayajñānam. tatra katamad yathārutajñānam?
analyzed: yat pratipad parijaya jñānam tatra katamat yathāruta jñānam

original: yat tat tathāgatasya sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ tac cānupalambhayogena. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
analyzed: yat tat tathāgatasya sarva ākāra jña tā jñānam tat ca anupalambha yogena idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: yad idaṃ trīṇīndriyāni. katamāni trīṇi?
analyzed: yat idam trīṇi indriyāni katamāni trīṇi

original: anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātāvīndriyam.
analyzed: an ājñātam ājñāsyāmi indriyam ājñā indriyam ājñātāvi indriyam

original: tat katamad anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam?
analyzed: tat katamat an ājñātam ājñāsyāmi indriyam

original: yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām anabhisamitānām anavabhāsaṃ yad avinayaṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam  #
analyzed: yat śaikṣāṇām pudgalānām anabhisamitānām anavabhāsam yat avinayam śraddhā indriyam vīrya indriyam smṛti indriyam samādhi indriyam prajñā indriyam idam

original: ucyate anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam.
analyzed: ucyate an ājñātam ājñāsyāmi indriyam

original: tatra katamad ājñendriyam?
analyzed: tatra katamat ājñā indriyam

original: yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām ājñātavatāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyamidam ucyate ājñendriyam.
analyzed: yat śaikṣāṇām pudgalānām ājñātavatām śraddhā indriyam vīrya indriyam smṛti indriyam samādhi indriyam prajñā indriyam idam ucyate ājñā indriyam

original: tatra katamad ājñātāvīndriyam?
analyzed: tatra katamat ājñātāvi indriyam

original: yad utāśaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ
analyzed: yat uta a śaikṣāṇām pudgalānām arhatām pratyekabuddhānām bodhisattvānām tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām śraddhā indriyam vīrya indriyam smṛti indriyam

original: idam ucyate ājñātāvīndriyam. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya (PvsP1-2: 83)
analyzed: idam ucyate ājñātāvi indriyam idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya

original: mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: yad uta savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir avitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhir avitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ. tatra katamaḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ?
analyzed: yat uta sa vitarkaḥ sa vicāraḥ samādhiḥ a vitarkaḥ vicāra mātraḥ samādhiḥ a vitarkaḥ vicāraḥ samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ sa vitarkaḥ sa vicāraḥ samādhiḥ

original: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ  #
analyzed: iha subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ viviktam kāmaiḥ viviktam pāpakaiḥ akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ sa vitarkam sa vicāram viveka jam prīti sukham prathamam

original: dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
analyzed: dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati

original: ayam ucyate savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ. tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ?
analyzed: ayam ucyate sa vitarkaḥ sa vicāraḥ samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ vitarkaḥ vicāra mātraḥ samādhiḥ

original: yaḥ prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya dhyānasyāntariko yam ucyate 'vitarko 'vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ. tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ?
analyzed: yaḥ prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya dhyānasya āntarikaḥ yam ucyate vitarkaḥ vicāra mātraḥ samādhiḥ tatra katamaḥ vitarkaḥ vicāraḥ samādhiḥ

original: yad dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir
analyzed: yat dvitīyam dhyānam vistareṇa kartavyam yāvat na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatana samāpattiḥ

original: ayam ucyate 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
analyzed: ayam ucyate vitarkaḥ vicāraḥ samādhiḥ idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: mahāyānam anupalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: yad uta daśānusmṛtayaḥ. katamā daśa?
analyzed: yat uta daśa anusmṛtayaḥ katamāḥ daśa

original: yad uta buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ saṃghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtis tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtir,
analyzed: yat uta buddha anusmṛtiḥ dharma anusmṛtiḥ saṃgha anusmṛtiḥ śīla anusmṛtiḥ tyāga anusmṛtiḥ devatā anusmṛtiḥ

original: udvegānusmṛtir maraṇānusmṛtiḥ kāyānusmṛtir ānāpānānusmṛtiḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: udvega anusmṛtiḥ maraṇa anusmṛtiḥ kāya anusmṛtiḥ āna apāna anusmṛtiḥ idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam anupalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: yad uta catvāri dhyānāni,
analyzed: yat uta catvāri dhyānāni

original: catvāry apramāṇāni,
analyzed: catvāri apramāṇāni

original: catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭau vimokṣā,
analyzed: catasraḥ ārūpya samāpattayaḥ ṣṭau vimokṣā

original: navānupūrvavihārasmāpattayaḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam.
analyzed: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: daśa tathāgatabalāni. katamāni daśa?
analyzed: daśa tathāgata balāni katamāni daśa

original: yad uta iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthānañ ca sthānato 'sthānañ cāsthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
analyzed: yat uta iha bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sthānam ca sthānataḥ sthānam ca asthānataḥ yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ karmasamādānānāṃ ca sthānato hetuto vipākañ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
analyzed: atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām ca karmaṇām karma samādānānām ca sthānataḥ hetutaḥ vipākam ca yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: nānādhātukaṃ lokam anekadhātukaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
analyzed: nānā dhātukam lokam aneka dhātukam yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ nānādhimuktikatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
analyzed: para sattvānām para pudgalānām nānā adhimuktika tām yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānām indriyaparāparajnānatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
analyzed: para sattvānām para pudgalānām indriya para apara jnāna tām yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: sarvatragāminīṃ (PvsP1-2: 84)
analyzed: sarvatragāminīm

original: pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
analyzed: pratipadam yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisaṃkleśavyavadānavyutthānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
analyzed: para sattvānām para pudgalānām dhyāna vimokṣa samādhi samāpatti saṃkleśa vyavadāna vyutthānam yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: so 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati,
analyzed: saḥ na ekavidham pūrva nivāsam anusmarati

original: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
analyzed: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānām cyuta upapādam yathābhūtam prajānāti

original: sa āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya viharati,
analyzed: saḥ āsravāṇām kṣayāt anāsravām cetaḥ vimuktim prajñā vimuktim dṛṣṭe eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya viharati

original: kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamithyātvam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya  #
analyzed: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ uṣitam brahmacaryam kṛtam karaṇīyam na apara mithyātvam iti yathābhūtam prajānāti idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: mahāyānam anupalambhayogena.
analyzed: mahāyānam anupalambha yogena

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

original: yad uta catvāri vaiśāradyāni. katamāni catvāri?
analyzed: yat uta catvāri vaiśāradyāni katamāni catvāri

original: yad uta samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me pratijānataḥ,
analyzed: yat uta samyaksaṃbuddhasya bata me pratijānataḥ

original: ime dharmā abhisaṃbuddhā iti,
analyzed: ime dharmāḥ abhisaṃbuddhāḥ iti

analyzed: imān anuśaṃsān pratilapsyate iti idam api subhūte dhāraṇī mukham akṣara mukham akāra mukham bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānam

analyzed: na hi sa kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ āgacchati vā gacchati vā saṃkrāmati vā upasaṃkrāmati vā

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena catvāro dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ. katame catvāraḥ?
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aṣṭamyām bhūmau vartamānena catvāraḥ dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ katame catvāraḥ

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena navamyāṃ bhūmau vartamānena dvādaśa dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ. katame dvādaśa?
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena navamyām bhūmau vartamānena dvādaśa dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ katame dvādaśa

original: yad uta anantapraṇidhānaparigrahaḥ,

analyzed: yaḥ kāma cittasya anutpādaḥ

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāmaguṇajugupsanatā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāma guṇa jugupsana tā

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nirvitsahagataś cittotpādaḥ?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nirvid sahagataḥ citta utpādaḥ

original: yaḥ sarvadharmāṇām anabhisaṃskāro 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nirvitsahagataś cittotpādaḥ.
analyzed: yaḥ sarva dharmāṇām an abhisaṃskāraḥ yam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nirvid sahagataḥ citta utpādaḥ

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāstiparityāgitā?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarva asti parityāgi tā

original: yā adhyātmikabāhyānāṃ dharmāṇām agrahaṇatā,
analyzed: yā adhyātmika bāhyānām dharmāṇām a grahaṇa tā

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāstiparityāgitā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarva astiparityāgi tā

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anavalīnacittatā?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anavalīna citta tā

original: yā yad vijñānasthitiṣv asya cittaṃ nāvalīyate,
analyzed: yāḥ yat vijñāna sthitiṣu asya cittam na avalīyate

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anavalīnacittatā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anavalīna citta tā

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvavastunirapekṣatā?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarva vastu nirapekṣa tā

original: yā sarvavastūnām amanasikāratā,
analyzed: yā sarva vastūnām a manasikāra tā

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvavastunirapekṣatā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarva vastu nirapekṣa tā

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhisaṃstavaparivarjanatā?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhi saṃstava parivarjana tā

original: yā buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramaṇatā upapādukatā pratilābhamuṇḍakāṣāyaprāvaraṇatā,
analyzed: yā buddhakṣetrāt buddhakṣetram saṃkramaṇa tā upapāduka tā pratilābha muṇḍa kāṣāya prāvaraṇa tā

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhisaṃstavaparivarjanatā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhi saṃstava parivarjana tā

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhikṣubhikṣuṇīsaṃstavaparivarjanatā?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī saṃstava parivarjana tā

original: yad bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇyā vā saha acchaṭikāsaṃghātamātram api na tiṣṭhati na ca tair vinā paritasanācittam utpādayati,
analyzed: yat bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇyā vā saha acchaṭikā saṃghāta mātram api na tiṣṭhati na ca taiḥ vinā paritasanā cittam utpādayati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhikṣubhikṣuṇīsaṃstavaparivarjanatā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhikṣu bhikṣuṇī saṃstava parivarjana tā

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kulamātsaryaṃ parivarjayitavyam?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kula mātsaryam parivarjayitavyam

original: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
analyzed: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evam cittam utpādayitavyam

original: yan mayā sattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ kartavyaṃ ta ete sattvāḥ svapuṇyair eva sukhitā nātra mayā mātsaryacittam utpādayitavyam,
analyzed: yat mayā sattvānām sarva sukha upadhānam kartavyam te ete sattvāḥ sva puṇyaiḥ eva sukhitāḥ na atra mayā mātsarya cittam utpādayitavyam

original: idaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kulamātsaryaṃ parivarjayitavyam.
analyzed: idam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kula mātsaryam parivarjayitavyam

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃgaṇikāsthānaṃ parivarjayitavyam?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃgaṇikā sthānam parivarjayitavyam

original: yatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃgaṇikāsthānasthitasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktā
analyzed: yatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃgaṇikā sthāna sthitasya śrāvaka pratyekabuddha pratisaṃyuktā

original: kathā syāt tat pratisaṃyuktaṃ vā cittotpādam utpādayen na tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam,
analyzed: kathā syāt tat pratisaṃyuktam vā citta utpādam utpādayet na tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃgaṇikāsthānaparivarjanatā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃgaṇikā sthāna parivarjana tā

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātmotkarṣaṇā parivarjayitavyā?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātma utkarṣaṇā parivarjayitavyā

original: yā ādhyātmikānāṃ dharmāṇām asamanupaśyanā iyaṃ (PvsP1-2: 96)
analyzed: yā ādhyātmikānām dharmāṇām a samanupaśyanā iyam

original: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ātmotkarṣaṇaparivarjanatā.
analyzed: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ātma utkarṣaṇa parivarjana tā

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parapaṃsanāparivarjanatā?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parapaṃsanā parivarjana tā

original: yad uta bāhyānāṃ dharmāṇām asamanupaśyanā,
analyzed: yat uta bāhyānām dharmāṇām a samanupaśyanā

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parapaṃsanāparivarjanatā.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parapaṃsanā parivarjana tā

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśā kuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ

original: tathā hy ete āryamārgasyāntarāyakarāḥ sugater vā prāg eva saṃbodheḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi ete ārya mārgasya antarāya karāḥ sugateḥ vā prāk eva saṃbodheḥ

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ.
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena daśā kuśalāḥ karma pathāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhimānaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhimānaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ

original: tathā hi sa na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi sa na kañcid dharmam samanupaśyati

original: kutaḥ punar adhikaṃ yenādhimaṃsyate,
analyzed: kutas punar adhikam yena adhimaṃsyate

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhimānaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhimānaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena stambhaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena stambhaḥ parivarjayitavyaḥ

original: tathā hi tad vastu na samanupaśyati yatra stambham utpādayed evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena stambho notpādayitavyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi tat vastu na samanupaśyati yatra stambham utpādayet evam hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena stambhaḥ na utpādayitavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena viparyāsāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena viparyāsāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ

original: sarvavastūnām anupalabdhitām upādāya,
analyzed: sarva vastūnām anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena viparyāsāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ.
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena viparyāsāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vicikitsā parivarjayitavyā?
analyzed: tatra katham subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vicikitsā parivarjayitavyā

original: tathā hi saṃdehāpagatāt sarvadharmān samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi saṃdeha apagatāt sarva dharmān samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vicikitsā parivarjayitavyā.
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vicikitsā parivarjayitavyā

original: tatra kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rāgadveṣamohānām adhivāsanā parivarjayitavyā?
analyzed: tatra katham subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rāga dveṣa mohānām adhivāsanā parivarjayitavyā

original: tathā hi rāgadveṣamohānāṃ vastu na samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi rāga dveṣa mohānām vastu na samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rāgadveṣamohāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ.
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena rāga dveṣa mohāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaḍ dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭ dharmāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ

original: yad uta ṣaṭ pāramitā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: yat uta ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ dāna pāramitā śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitāḥ vīrya pāramitāḥ dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā

original: imāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ.
analyzed: imāḥ ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaḍ dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭ dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ

original: yad uta śrāvakacittaṃ parivarjayitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā (PvsP1-2: 97)
analyzed: yat uta śrāvaka cittam parivarjayitavyam tat kasya hetoḥ tathā

original: hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye,
analyzed: hi nā eṣa mārgaḥ bodhaye

original: pratyekabuddhacittaṃ parivarjayitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: pratyekabuddha cittam parivarjayitavyam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye,
analyzed: tathā hi nā eṣa mārgaḥ bodhaye

original: paritasanācittaṃ na kartavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: paritasanā cittam na kartavyam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye,
analyzed: tathā hi nā eṣa mārgaḥ bodhaye

original: yācanakaṃ dṛṣṭvā nāvalīnacittam utpādayitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yācanakam dṛṣṭvā na avalīna cittam utpādayitavyam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye,
analyzed: tathā hi nā eṣa mārgaḥ bodhaye

original: sarvasvam api parityajya na durmanasko bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: sarva svam api parityajya na durmanaskaḥ bhavati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye,
analyzed: tathā hi nā eṣa mārgaḥ bodhaye

original: yācanakavikṣepo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yācanaka vikṣepaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi naiṣa mārgo bodhaye.
analyzed: tathā hi nā eṣa mārgaḥ bodhaye

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātmagrāho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātma grāhaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy atyantatayā ātmā na saṃvidyate evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātmagrāho na kartavyaḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi atyanta tayā ātmā na saṃvidyate evam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ātma grāhaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: evaṃ sattvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam sattva grāhaḥ jīva grāhaḥ pudgala grāhaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy ete atyantatayā na saṃvidyante,
analyzed: tathā hi ete atyanta tayā na saṃvidyante

original: evaṃ sattvajīvapudgalagrāho na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam sattva jīva pudgala grāhaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ucchedagrāho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena uccheda grāhaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi na kaścid dharma ucchidyate,
analyzed: tathā hi na kaścid dharmaḥ ucchidyate

original: atyantatayānutpannatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ nocchedeḥ,
analyzed: atyanta tayā anutpanna tvāt sarva dharmāṇām

original: evam ucchedagrāho na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam uccheda grāhaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śāsvatagrāho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śāsvata grāhaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi yo dharmo notpadyate sa na śāśvatī bhavati,
analyzed: tathā hi yaḥ dharmaḥ na utpadyate sa na śāśvatī bhavati

original: evaṃ śāśvatagrāho na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam śāśvata grāhaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nimittasaṃjñā notpādayitavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nimitta saṃjñā na utpādayitavyā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy atyantatayā saṃkleśo na saṃvidyate,
analyzed: tathā hi atyanta tayā saṃkleśaḥ na saṃvidyate

original: evaṃ nimittasaṃjñā notpādayitavyā.
analyzed: evam nimitta saṃjñā na utpādayitavyā

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena hetudṛṣṭir na kartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena hetu dṛṣṭiḥ na kartavyā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na samanupaśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi sa tām dṛṣṭim na samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ hetudṛṣṭir na kartavyā,
analyzed: evam hetu dṛṣṭiḥ na kartavyā

original: evaṃ skandheṣu dhātuṣv āyataneṣv abhiniveśo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam skandheṣu dhātuṣu āyataneṣu abhiniveśaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi te dharmāḥ svabhāvena na saṃvidyante,
analyzed: tathā hi te dharmāḥ svabhāvena na saṃvidyante

original: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyataneṣv abhiniveśo na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam skandha dhātu āyataneṣu abhiniveśaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvana traidhātuke 'bhiniveśo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvana traidhātuke bhiniveśaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi traidhātukasvabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
analyzed: tathā hi traidhātuka svabhāvaḥ na saṃvidyate

original: evaṃ traidhātuke 'bhiniveśo na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam traidhātuke bhiniveśaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena traidhātuke 'dhyavasānaṃ na kartavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena traidhātuke dhī avasānam na kartavyam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi tad vastu nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi tat vastu na upalabhyate

original: evaṃ traidhātuke 'dhyavasānaṃ na kartavyam.
analyzed: evam traidhātuke dhī avasānam na kartavyam

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena traidhātuke ālayo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena traidhātuke ālayaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi niḥsvabhāvatvād evaṃ traidhātuke ālayo na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi niḥsvabhāva tvāt evam traidhātuke ālayaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhadharmasaṃghaniśrayo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddha dharma saṃgha niśrayaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi na buddhadharmasaṃghadṛṣṭiniśrayād buddhadharmasaṃghadarśanaṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi na buddha dharma saṃgha dṛṣṭi niśrayāt buddha dharma saṃgha darśanam

original: evaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghadṛṣṭiniśrayo na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam buddha dharma saṃgha dṛṣṭi niśrayaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīladṛṣṭiniśrayo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīla dṛṣṭi niśrayaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi na śīladṛṣṭiniśrayāc chīlapariśuddhir bhavaty evaṃ śīladṛṣṭiniśrayo na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi na śīla dṛṣṭi niśrayāt śīla pariśuddhiḥ bhavati evam śīla dṛṣṭi niśrayaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatāyāṃ vivādo na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatāyām vivādaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyā na śūnyatayā,
analyzed: tathā hi sarva dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ na śūnyatayā

original: evaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ vivādo na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam śūnyatāyām vivādaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatāvirodho na kartavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā virodhaḥ na kartavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā na śūnyatā śūnyatāṃ virodhayati,
analyzed: tathā hi sarva dharmāḥ śūnyāḥ na śūnyatā śūnyatām virodhayati

original: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatāvirodho na kartavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā virodhaḥ na kartavyaḥ

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā paripūrayitavyā?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā paripūrayitavyā

original: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya,
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇa śūnyatām upādāya

original: paripūrir bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śūnyatā paripūrir,
analyzed: paripūriḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śūnyatā paripūriḥ

original: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā paripūrayitavyā.
analyzed: evam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā paripūrayitavyā

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ānimittasākṣātkriyā?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ā nimitta sākṣātkriyā

original: yad uta sarvanimittānām amanasikāratā,
analyzed: yat uta sarva nimittānām a manasikāra tā

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānimittasākṣātkriyā.

original: sarvaratnamayāḥ śākhāḥ patrāṇi sarvaratnamayāni tasya vṛkṣasya puṣpāṅ gandho 'vabhāsaś cānantān lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphurati,
analyzed: sarva ratna mayāḥ śākhāḥ patrāṇi sarva ratna mayāni tasya vṛkṣasya puṣpa aṅ gandhaḥ vabhāsaḥ ca anantān lokadhātūn avabhāsena sphurati

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhivṛkṣavyūhasaṃpat.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhivṛkṣa vyūha saṃpad

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvaguṇaparipūrisaṃpat?
analyzed: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarva guṇa paripūri saṃpad

original: yā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sattvaparipākena buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir,
analyzed: yā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sattva paripākena buddhakṣetra pariśuddhiḥ

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvaguṇaparipūrisaṃpat.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarva guṇa paripūri saṃpad

original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ saṃstathāgata eveti vaktavyaḥ?
analyzed: tatra katham bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ daśamyām bhūmau sthitaḥ san tathāgataḥ eva iti vaktavyaḥ

original: yadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśapāramitāḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti,
analyzed: yadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśa pāramitāḥ paripūrṇāḥ bhavanti

original: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti,
analyzed: yāvat aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ paripūrṇāḥ bhavanti

original: sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ ca sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tā jñānam ca sarva vāsanā anusaṃdhi kleśa prahāṇam bhavati

original: mahākaruṇā ca sarvabuddhadharmāḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti,
analyzed: mahā karuṇā ca sarva buddha dharmāḥ paripūrṇāḥ bhavanti

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśamyāḥ punar bodhisattvabhūmeḥ paraṃ tathāgata eveti vaktavyaḥ.
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ daśamyāḥ punar bodhisattva bhūmeḥ param tathāgataḥ eva iti vaktavyaḥ

original: tatra katamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśa bhūmayaḥ?
analyzed: tatra katamāḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśa bhūmayaḥ

original: yad bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena sarvāsu pāramitāsu caran saptatriṃśad
analyzed: yat bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ upāya kauśalyena sarvāsu pāramitāsu caran saptatriṃśat

original: bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣito 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu caran daśatathāgatabalapratisaṃvitsv
analyzed: bodhi pakṣeṣu dharmeṣu pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu caran daśa tathāgata bala pratisaṃvitsu

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu (PvsP1-2: 103)
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu

original: caran gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ tanūbhūmiṃ vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvībhūmiṃ
analyzed: caran gotra bhūmim aṣṭamaka bhūmim darśana bhūmim tanū bhūmim vīta rāga bhūmim kṛtāvī bhūmim

original: śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tikramya
analyzed: śrāvaka bhūmim pratyekabuddha bhūmim bodhisattva bhūmim bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ atikramya

original: etā navabhūmīr atikramya buddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhate,
analyzed: etāḥ nava bhūmīḥ atikramya buddha bhūmau pratiṣṭhate

original: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśamī bhūmiḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃprasthito bhavati.
analyzed: iyam bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya daśamī bhūmiḥ evam hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ mahāyāna saṃprasthitaḥ bhavati

original: iti bhūmisaṃbhāraḥ
analyzed: iti bhūmi saṃbhāraḥ

original: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha,
analyzed: yat punar subhūtiḥ evam āha

original: kutas tad yānaṃ niryāsyatīti traidhātukān niryāsyati yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyati tat punar advayayogena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: kutas tat yānam niryāsyati iti traidhātukāt niryāsyati yena sarva ākāra jña tā tena sthāsyati tat punar advaya yogena tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi yac ca mahāyānaṃ yā ca sarvākārajñatā ubhāv etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau anidarśanau apratighau ekalakṣaṇau yad  #
analyzed: tathā hi yat ca mahāyānam yā ca sarva ākārajña tā ubhau etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau a nidarśanau apratighau eka lakṣaṇau yat

original: utālakṣaṇau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: uta alakṣaṇau tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi subhūte 'lakṣaṇau dharmau niryātau vā niryāto vā niryāsyato vā dharmadhātoḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet,
analyzed: na hi subhūte lakṣaṇau dharmau niryātau vā niryātaḥ vā niryāsyataḥ vā dharmadhātoḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet

original: tathatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icched,
analyzed: tathatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet

original: evaṃ bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor ākāśadhātoḥ prahāṇadhātor virāgakoṭer anutpādasyānirodhasyābhāvasyasa niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ  #
analyzed: evam bhūtakoṭeḥ acintya dhātoḥ ākāśa dhātoḥ prahāṇa dhātoḥ virāga koṭeḥ anutpādasya anirodhasya abhāvasya sa niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām

original: niryāṇam icchet.
analyzed: niryāṇam icchet

original: rūpaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
analyzed: rūpa śūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet

original: evaṃ vedanāśūnyatāyāḥ saṃjñāśūnyatāyāḥ saṃskāraśūnyatāyāḥ vijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet.  #
analyzed: evam vedanā śūnyatāyāḥ saṃjñā śūnyatāyāḥ saṃskāra śūnyatāyāḥ vijñāna śūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet  /

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi subhūte rūpaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
analyzed: na hi subhūte rūpa śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati

original: na vedanāśūnyatā na saṃjñāśūnyatā na saṃskāraśūnyatā na vijñānaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na vedanā śūnyatā na saṃjñā śūnyatā na saṃskāra śūnyatā na vijñāna śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākārajñatāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte rūpam rūpeṇa śūnyam vedanā vedanayā śūnyā saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyā vijñānam vijñānena śūnyam

original: cakṣuḥśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ śūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet

original: evaṃ śrotraśūnyatāyā ghrāṇaśūnyatāyā jihvāśūnyatāyāḥ kāyaśūnyatāyā manaḥśūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchedyo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam
analyzed: evam śrotra śūnyatāyāḥ ghrāṇa śūnyatāyāḥ jihvā śūnyatāyāḥ kāya śūnyatāyāḥ manaḥ śūnyatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam

original: evaṃ rūpaśūnyatāyāḥ śabdaśūnyatāyā gandhaśūnyatāyā rasaśūnyatāyāḥ sparśaśūnyatāyā dharmaśūnyatāyāḥ,
analyzed: evam rūpa śūnyatāyāḥ śabda śūnyatāyāḥ gandha śūnyatāyāḥ rasa śūnyatāyāḥ sparśa śūnyatāyāḥ dharma śūnyatāyāḥ

original: cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ śrotravijñānaśūnyatāyā ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatāyā jihvāvijñānaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyavijñānaśūnyatāyā manovijñānaśūnyatāyāś
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñāna śūnyatāyāḥ śrotra vijñāna śūnyatāyāḥ ghrāṇa vijñāna śūnyatāyāḥ jihvā vijñāna śūnyatāyāḥ kāya vijñāna śūnyatāyāḥ manaḥ vijñāna śūnyatāyāḥ

original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatāyā manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatāyāś
analyzed: cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa śūnyatāyāḥ śrotra saṃsparśa śūnyatāyāḥ ghrāṇa saṃsparśa śūnyatāyāḥ jihvā saṃsparśa śūnyatāyāḥ kāya saṃsparśa śūnyatāyāḥ manaḥ saṃsparśa śūnyatāyāḥ

original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatāyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatāyā
analyzed: cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatāyāḥ śrotra saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatāyāḥ ghrāṇa saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatāyāḥ

original: jihvāsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatāyā manaḥsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatāyāḥ
analyzed: jihvā saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatāyāḥ kāya saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatāyāḥ manaḥ saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatāyāḥ

original: sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
analyzed: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥ śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākārajña tāyām sthāsyati

original: evaṃ na śrotraśūnyatā na ghrāṇaśūnyatā na jihvāśūnyatā na kāyaśūnyatā na manaḥśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
analyzed: evam na śrotra śūnyatā na ghrāṇa śūnyatā na jihvā śūnyatā na kāya śūnyatā na manaḥ śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākārajñatāyām sthāsyati

original: na hi subhūte rūpaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
analyzed: na hi subhūte rūpa śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati

original: evaṃ na śabdaśūnyatā na gandhaśūnyatā na rasaśūnyatā na sparśaśūnyatā na dharmaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
analyzed: evam na śabda śūnyatā na gandha śūnyatā na rasa śūnyatā na sparśa śūnyatā na dharma śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jñatāyām sthāsyati

original: na hi subhūte cakṣurvijñānaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati
analyzed: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥ vijñāna śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākārajña tāyām sthāsyati

original: na śrotravijñānaśūnyatā na ghrāṇavijñānaśūnyatā na jihvāvijñānaśūnyatā na kāyavijñānaśūnyatā
analyzed: na śrotra vijñāna śūnyatā na ghrāṇa vijñāna śūnyatā na jihvā vijñāna śūnyatā na kāya vijñāna śūnyatā

original: na manovijñānaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākārajña tāyām sthāsyati

original: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
analyzed: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākārajña tāyām sthāsyati

original: evaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na ghrāṇasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na jihvāsaṃsparśaśūnyatā
analyzed: evam na śrotra saṃsparśa śūnyatā na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa śūnyatā na jihvā saṃsparśa śūnyatā

original: na kāyasaṃsparśaśūnyatā na manaḥsaṃsparśaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
analyzed: na kāya saṃsparśa śūnyatā na manaḥ saṃsparśa śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati

original: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati,
analyzed: na hi subhūte cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati

original: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
analyzed: na sarva ākārajña tāyām sthāsyati

original: evaṃ na śrotrasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā na ghrāṇasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā na jihvāsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā na kāyasaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā  #
analyzed: evam na śrotra saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatā na ghrāṇa saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatā na jihvā saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatā na kāya saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatā

original: na (PvsP1-2: 105)
analyzed: na

original: manaḥsaṃsparśajavedayitaśūnyatā traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: manaḥ saṃsparśa ja vedayita śūnyatā traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākārajña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyaṃ śrotraṃ śrotreṇa śūnyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇena śūnyaṃ jihvā jihvayā śūnyā kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyo mano manasā śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte cakṣuḥ cakṣuṣā śūnyam śrotram śrotreṇa śūnyam ghrāṇam ghrāṇena śūnyam jihvā jihvayā śūnyā kāyaḥ kāyena śūnyaḥ manaḥ manasā śūnyam

original: evaṃ rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyo gandho gandhena śūnyo raso rasena śūnyaḥ sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyo dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ,
analyzed: evam rūpam rūpeṇa śūnyam śabdaḥ śabdena śūnyaḥ gandhaḥ gandhena śūnyaḥ rasaḥ rasena śūnyaḥ sparśaḥ sparśena śūnyaḥ dharmāḥ dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ

original: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānena śūnyaṃ śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñānena śūnyaṃ ghrāṇavijñānaṃ
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñānam cakṣuḥ vijñānena śūnyam śrotra vijñānam śrotra vijñānena śūnyam ghrāṇa vijñānam

original: ghrāṇavijñānena śūnyaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānena śūnyaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñānena
analyzed: ghrāṇa vijñānena śūnyam jihvā vijñānam jihvā vijñānena śūnyam kāya vijñānam kāya vijñānena

original: śūnyaṃ manovijñānaṃ manovijñānena śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: śūnyam manaḥ vijñānam manaḥ vijñānena śūnyam

original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśena śūnyo
analyzed: cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ cakṣuḥ saṃsparśena śūnyaḥ śrotra saṃsparśaḥ śrotra saṃsparśena śūnyaḥ

original: ghrāṇasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśena śūnyo jihvāsaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ
analyzed: ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ ghrāṇa saṃsparśena śūnyaḥ jihvā saṃsparśaḥ jihvā saṃsparśena śūnyaḥ kāya saṃsparśaḥ

original: kāyasaṃsparśena śūnyo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ,
analyzed: kāya saṃsparśena śūnyaḥ manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ manaḥ saṃsparśena śūnyaḥ

original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa jā vedanā cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa jayā vedanayā śūnyā

original: śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā,
analyzed: śrotra saṃsparśa jā vedanā śrotra saṃsparśa jayā vedanayā śūnyā

original: ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā,
analyzed: ghrāṇa saṃsparśa jā vedanā ghrāṇa saṃsparśa jayā vedanayā śūnyā

original: jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā,
analyzed: jihvā saṃsparśa jā vedanā jihvā saṃsparśa jayā vedanayā śūnyā

original: kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā,
analyzed: kāya saṃsparśa jā vedanā kāya saṃsparśa jayā vedanayā śūnyā

original: manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajayā vedanayā śūnyā.
analyzed: manaḥ saṃsparśa jā vedanā manaḥ saṃsparśa jayā vedanayā śūnyā

original: svapnasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,

original: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmasvabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharma svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte buddhadharmā buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte buddha dharmāḥ buddha dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ

original: iti darśanamārge dvitīyagrāhyavikalpapratipakṣaḥ
analyzed: iti darśana mārge dvitīya grāhya vikalpa pratipakṣaḥ

original: arhataḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: arhataḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yo 'rhataḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ rhataḥ svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte arhatsvabhāvo 'rhataḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte arhat svabhāvaḥ rhataḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: pratyekabuddhasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: pratyekabuddhasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ pratyekabuddhasvabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ (PvsP1-2: 109)
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ pratyekabuddha svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākārajña tāyām

original: sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte pratyekabuddhasvabhāvaḥ pratyekabuddhasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte pratyekabuddha svabhāvaḥ pratyekabuddha svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: bodhisattvasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bodhisattvasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasvabhāvo bodhisattvasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattva svabhāvaḥ bodhisattva svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yas tathāgatasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ tathāgatasya svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte tathāgatasvabhāvas tathāgatasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte tathāgata svabhāvaḥ tathāgata svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: srotaāpattiphalasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
analyzed: srotaāpatti phalasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalasya anāgāmiphalasya arhattvasya pratyekabodher mārgajñatāyāḥ
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmi phalasya anāgāmi phalasya arhat tvasya pratyeka bodheḥ mārga jña tāyāḥ

original: sarvākārajñatāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ srotaāpatti phalasya svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi srotaāpattiphalasvabhāvaḥ srotaāpattiphalasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi srotaāpatti phala svabhāvaḥ srotaāpatti phala svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalasya yaḥ svabhāvo 'nāgāmiphalasya yaḥ svabhāvo 'rhattvasya yaḥ
analyzed: evam sakṛdāgāmi phalasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ nāgāmi phalasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ rhat tvasya yaḥ

original: svabhāvaḥ pratyekabuddhatvasya yaḥ svabhāvo mārgajñatāyāyaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ pratyekabuddha tvasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ mārga jña tāyāḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarva ākāra jña tāyāḥ

original: yaḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvākārajñatāsvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ sarva ākārajña tā svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: iti darśanamārge prathamagrāhakavikalpapratipakṣaḥ
analyzed: iti darśana mārge prathama grāhaka vikalpa pratipakṣaḥ

original: nāmnaḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet,
analyzed: nāmnaḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet

original: evaṃ nimittasya saṃketasya vyavahārasya prajñapteḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam nimittasya saṃketasya vyavahārasya prajñapteḥ sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yo nāmnaḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ nāmnaḥ svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte nāmasvabhāvo nāmasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ. evaṃ saṃketasyayaḥ svabhāvo
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte nāma svabhāvaḥ nāma svabhāvena śūnyaḥ evam svabhāvaḥ

original: vyavahārasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ prajñapter yaḥ svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati
analyzed: vyavahārasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ prajñapteḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati

original: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ? (PvsP1-2: 110)
analyzed: na sarva ākārajña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi prajñaptisvabhāvaḥ prajñaptisvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi prajñapti svabhāvaḥ prajñapti svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: anutpādasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: anutpādasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yo 'nutpādasya svabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ nutpādasya svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi anutpādasvabhāvo 'nutpādasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi anutpāda svabhāvaḥ nutpāda svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: evam anirodhasyāsaṃkleśasyāvyavadānasyānabhisaṃskārasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icched yo 'lakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam a nirodhasya a saṃkleśasya a vyavadānasya an abhisaṃskārasya sa subhūte niryāṇam icchet yaḥ lakṣaṇānām dharmāṇām niryāṇam icchet tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yo 'nabhisaṃskārasvabhāvo na sa traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yaḥ na abhisaṃskāra svabhāvaḥ na sa traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi anabhisaṃskārasvabhāvo 'nabhisaṃskārasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi an abhisaṃskāra svabhāvaḥ na abhisaṃskāra svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: evaṃ hi subhūte na mahāyānaṃ traidhātukān niryāsyati na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
analyzed: evam hi subhūte na mahāyānam traidhātukāt niryāsyati na sarva ākāra jña tāyām sthāsyati

original: acalitaṃ tad yānam.
analyzed: acalitam tat yānam

original: iti darśanamārge dvitīyagrāhakavikalpapratipakṣaḥ
analyzed: iti darśana mārge dvitīya grāhaka vikalpa pratipakṣaḥ

original: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha,
analyzed: yat punar subhūtiḥ evam āha

original: kva tad yānaṃ sthāsyatīti,
analyzed: kva tat yānam sthāsyati iti

original: na tad yānaṃ kvacit sthāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na tat yānam kvacid sthāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte asthitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte asthitāḥ sarva dharmāḥ

original: api tu subhūte asthānaṃ na sthānayogena tad yānaṃ sthāsyati,
analyzed: api tu subhūte asthānam na sthāna yogena tat yānam sthāsyati

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte dharmadhātur na sthito nāsthitaḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte dharmadhātuḥ na sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ

original: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyānaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ,
analyzed: evam eva subhūte tat mahāyānam na sthitam na asthitam

original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte 'nutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam anabhisaṃskāro na sthito nāsthitaḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma subhūte saṃkleśaḥ vyavadānam an abhisaṃskāraḥ na sthitaḥ na asthitaḥ

original: evam eva subhūte tan mahāyanaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ,
analyzed: evam eva subhūte tat mahāyanam na sthitam na asthitam

original: tathā hi subhūte dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte dharmadhātuḥ dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi subhūte dharmadhātusvabhāvaḥ sthito vā asthito va. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi subhūte dharmadhātu svabhāvaḥ sthitaḥ vā asthitaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte dharmadhātusvabhāvo dharmadhātusvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte dharmadhātu svabhāvaḥ dharmadhātu svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: evam anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam abhisaṃskāro 'nabhisaṃskāreṇa śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam anutpādaḥ saṃkleśaḥ vyavadānam abhisaṃskāraḥ na abhisaṃskāreṇa śūnyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi subhūte 'nabhisaṃskārasvabhāvaḥ sthito vā asthito vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi subhūte na abhisaṃskāra svabhāvaḥ sthitaḥ vā asthitaḥ vā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte anabhisaṃskārasvabhāvo 'nabhisaṃskārasvabhāvena śūnyaḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte an abhisaṃskāra svabhāvaḥ na abhisaṃskāra svabhāvena śūnyaḥ

original: evaṃ hi subhūte tad yānaṃ na kvacit sthāsyati,
analyzed: evam hi subhūte tat yānam na kvacid sthāsyati

original: asthitam asthānayogena acālyayogena.
analyzed: asthitam asthāna yogena a cālya yogena

original: iti bhāvanāmārge prathamagrāhyavikalpapratipakṣaḥ
analyzed: iti bhāvanā mārge prathama grāhya vikalpa pratipakṣaḥ

original: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha,
analyzed: yat punar subhūtiḥ evam āha

original: kas tena yānena niryāsyatīti,
analyzed: kaḥ tena yānena niryāsyati iti

original: na kaścit tena yānena niryāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na kaścid tena yānena niryāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte yac ca tad yānaṃ yena ca niryāsyati yaś ca niryāsyati yataś ca niryāsyati sarva ete (PvsP1-2: 111)
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte yat ca tat yānam yena ca niryāsyati yaḥ ca niryāsyati yatas ca niryāsyati sarve ete

original: dharmā na saṃvidyante,
analyzed: dharmāḥ na saṃvidyante

original: evam asaṃvidyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam a saṃvidyamānānām sarva dharmāṇām katamaḥ dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte nātmā upalabhyate na sattvo na jīvo na poṣo na puruṣo na pudgalo na manujo na mānavo na kārako na vedako na jānako na paśyaka
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte na ātmā upalabhyate na sattvaḥ na jīvaḥ na poṣaḥ na puruṣaḥ na pudgalaḥ na manujaḥ na mānavaḥ na kārakaḥ na vedakaḥ na jānakaḥ na paśyaka

original: ātmano 'tyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ tyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ yāvat paśyakasyātyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: evam yāvat paśyakasya atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: dharmadhātur nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: dharmadhātuḥ na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: evam anutpādo 'nirodho 'saṃkleśo 'vyavadānam anabhisaṃskāro nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: evam anutpādaḥ nirodhaḥ saṃkleśaḥ vyavadānam an abhisaṃskāraḥ na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: skandha dhātu āyatanāni na upalabhyante atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: pratītyasamutpādo nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: pratītyasamutpādaḥ na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: dānapāramitā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: dāna pāramitā nā upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya. adhyātmaśūnyatā nopalabhyate  #
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya adhyātma śūnyatā na upalabhyate

original: atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: bahirdhāśūnyatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: bahirdhā śūnyatā na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya. smṛtyupasthānāni nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: evam yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā nā upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya smṛti upasthānāni nā upalabhyante atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgāḥ na upalabhyante atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ na upalabhyante atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ daśa tathāgatabalāni nopalabhyante catvāri vaiśāradyāni nopalabhyante catasraḥ pratisaṃvido nopalabhyante aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā  #
analyzed: evam daśa tathāgata balāni na upalabhyante catvāri vaiśāradyāni na upalabhyante catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ na upalabhyante aṣṭādaśā āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: nopalabhyante atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: na upalabhyante atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: srotaāpanno nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: srotaāpannaḥ na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: sakṛdāgāmī nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: sakṛdāgāmī na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: anāgāmī nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: anāgāmī na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: arhan nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: arhan na upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: pratyekabuddho nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
analyzed: pratyekabuddhaḥ nā upalabhyate atyanta viśuddhi tām upādāya

original: bodhisattvo nopalabhyate atyantaviśuddhitām upādāya,
