analyzed: punar aparam subhūte pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu smṛti upasthānāni na upalabhyante tri adhva samatāyām smṛti upasthānāni na upalabhyante

original: na subhūte samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpanno 'dhvā nopalabhyante,
analyzed: na subhūte samatāyām atīta anāgata pratyutpannaḥ dhvā na upalabhyante

original: samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: samatā eva tāvat samatāyām na upalabhyate

original: kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannāni smṛtyupasthānāni upalapsyante,
analyzed: kutas punar samatāyām atīta anāgata pratyutpannāni smṛti upasthānāni upalapsyante

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇābni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇa abni pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: ṛddhipādāḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: ṛddhipādāḥ pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: indriyāṇi pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: indriyāṇi pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: balāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: balāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: bodhyaṅgāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: bodhyaṅgāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: ārya aṣṭāṅga mārgaḥ pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: daśa tathāgatabalāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: daśa tathāgata balāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: catvāri vaiśāradyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: catvāri vaiśāradyāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu nopalabhyante,
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu na upalabhyante

original: tryadhvasamatayā āveṇikabuddhadharmā nopalabhyante,
analyzed: tri adhva sama tayā āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ na upalabhyante

original: na subhūte samatāyāṃ (PvsP1-2: 135)
analyzed: na subhūte sama tāyām

original: atītānāgatapratyutpannādhvā upalabhyante samataiva tāvat samatāyāṃ nopalabhyate,
analyzed: atīta anāgata pratyutpanna adhvā upalabhyante samatā eva tāvat samatāyām na upalabhyate

original: kutaḥ punaḥ samatāyām atītānāgatapratyutpannā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā upalapsyante.
analyzed: kutas punar samatāyām atīta anāgata pratyutpannāḥ aṣṭādaśā āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ upalapsyante

original: punar aparaṃ subhūte pūrvāntataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate,
analyzed: punar aparam subhūte pūrva antataḥ pṛthagjanaḥ na upalabhyate

original: aparāntataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate,
analyzed: apara antataḥ pṛthagjanaḥ na upalabhyate

original: pratyutpannataḥ pṛthagjano nopalabhyate,
analyzed: pratyutpannataḥ pṛthagjanaḥ na upalabhyate

original: tryadhvasamatayā pṛthagjano nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tri adhva sama tayā pṛthagjanaḥ na upalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya.
analyzed: sattva anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvāḥ pūrvāntatas tathāgato nopalabhyate,
analyzed: evam śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bodhisattvāḥ pūrva antataḥ tathāgataḥ na upalabhyate

original: aparāntatas tathāgato nopalabhyate,
analyzed: apara antatas tathāgataḥ na upalabhyate

original: madhyatas tathāgato nopalabhyate,
analyzed: madhyatas tathāgataḥ na upalabhyate

original: tryadhvasamatayā tathāgato nopalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tri adhva sama tayā tathāgataḥ na upalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sattvānupalabdhitām upādāya.
analyzed: sattva anupalabdhi tām upādāya

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā triṣv adhvasu
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām sthitvā triṣu adhvasu

original: śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā. idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
analyzed: śikṣitvā sarva ākāra jña tā paripūrayitavyā idam subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya

original: tryadhvasamatayā mahāyānaṃ,
analyzed: tri adhva sama tayā mahāyānam

original: atra sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhavan sarvākārajñatāyāṃ niryāsyati.
analyzed: atra sthitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ sa deva mānuṣa asuram lokam abhibhavan sarva ākārajña tāyām niryāsyati

original: ity antaniryāṇam
analyzed: iti anta niryāṇam

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: sādhu sādhu bhagavan subhāṣitam idaṃ bhagavato bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahāyānam,
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bhagavan su bhāṣitam idam bhagavataḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām mahāyānam

original: atra bhagavan mahāyāne śikṣamāṇair atīte 'dhvani bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā,
analyzed: atra bhagavat mahāyāne śikṣamāṇaiḥ atīte dhvani bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ sarva ākārajña tā anuprāptā

original: anāgatā api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā atra mahāyāne śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
analyzed: anāgatāḥ api bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ atra mahāyāne śikṣamāṇāḥ sarva ākāra jña tām anuprāpsyanti

original: ye 'pi bhagavan daśadiśi loke 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pratyutpannās te 'py atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām
analyzed: ye pi bhagavan daśa diśi loke saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ pratyutpannāḥ te pi atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā sarva ākāra jña tām

original: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan mahāyānam idaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta tryadhvasamatānām,
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi bhagavat mahāyānam idam bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām yat uta tri adhva samatānām

original: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam subhūtim etat avocat

original: evam etat subhūte evam etat,
analyzed: evam etat subhūte evam etat

original: atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptā anuprāpsyanti anuprāpnuvanti ca.
analyzed: atra mahāyāne śikṣitvā atīta anāgata pratyutpannāḥ bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ sarva ākāra jña tām anuprāptāḥ anuprāpsyanti anuprāpnuvanti ca

original: atha khalu pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu pūrṇaḥ maitrāyaṇīputraḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānam upadeṣṭavyaṃ manyeta.
analyzed: ayam bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ dhīṣṭaḥ mahāyānam upadeṣṭavyam manyeta

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: mā haivāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānam upadiśāmi.
analyzed: mā ha eva aham bhagavan prajñāpāramitām vyatikramya mahāyānam upadiśāmi

original: bhagavan āha:
analyzed: bhagavan āha

original: na hi subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānam upadiśasi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na hi subhūte anuloma tvam prajñāpāramitāyām mahāyānam upadiśasi tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi subhūte ye kecit kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā
analyzed: tathā hi subhūte ye kecid kuśalāḥ bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ śrāvaka dharmāḥ vā pratyekabuddha dharmāḥ

original: vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: vā bodhisattva dharmāḥ vā buddha dharmāḥ vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāyām saṃgraham samavasaraṇam gacchanti

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: katame bhagavan kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ  #
analyzed: katame bhagavan kuśalāḥ bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ śrāvaka dharmāḥ pratyekabuddha dharmāḥ bodhisattva dharmāḥ buddha dharmāḥ ca ye prajñāpāramitāyām saṃgraham

original: samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti?
analyzed: samavasaraṇam gacchanti

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā catvāri smṛti upasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāraḥ ṛddhipādāḥ pañca indriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭāṅga mārgaḥ

original: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaṃ catvāry apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasra
analyzed: śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita vimokṣa mukham catvāri apramāṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catasraḥ

original: ārūpyasamāpattayo dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: ārūpya samāpattayaḥ dāna pāramitā śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā

original: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā asaṃpramuṣitadharmatā sadopekṣāvihāritā,
analyzed: daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ mahā maitrī mahā karuṇāḥ aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ asaṃpramuṣita dharma tā sadā upekṣā vihāri tā

original: ime subhūte kuśalā bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāś ca ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃgrahaṃ  #
analyzed: ime subhūte kuśalāḥ bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ śrāvaka dharmāḥ pratyekabuddha dharmāḥ bodhisattva dharmāḥ buddha dharmāḥ ca ye prajñāpāramitāyām saṃgraham

original: samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: samavasaraṇam gacchanti

original: yac ca subhūte mahāyānaṃ yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca vīryapāramitāyā ca kṣāntipāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca dānapāramitā,
analyzed: yat ca subhūte mahāyānam yā ca dhyāna pāramitā yā ca vīrya pāramitāyāḥ ca kṣānti pāramitā yā ca śīla pāramitā yā ca dāna pāramitā

original: yac ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ,
analyzed: yat ca rūpam yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārāḥ yat ca vijñānam

original: yac ca cakṣur yac ca śrotraṃ yac ca ghrāṇaṃ yā ca jihvā yaś ca kāyo yac ca mano yac
analyzed: yat ca cakṣuḥ yat ca śrotram yat ca ghrāṇam yā ca jihvā yaḥ ca kāyaḥ yat ca manaḥ yat

original: ca rūpaṃ yaś ca śabdo yaś ca gandho yaś ca raso yaś ca sparśo ye ca dharmā yac ca
analyzed: ca rūpam yaḥ ca śabdaḥ yaḥ ca gandhaḥ yaḥ ca rasaḥ yaḥ ca sparśaḥ ye ca dharmāḥ yat ca

original: cakṣurvijñānaṃ yac ca śrotravijñānaṃ yac ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ yac ca jihvāvijñānaṃ yac
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñānam yat ca śrotra vijñānam yat ca ghrāṇa vijñānam yat ca jihvā vijñānam yat

original: ca kāyavijñānaṃ yac ca manovijñānaṃ yaś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo yaś ca śrotrasaṃsparśo
analyzed: ca kāya vijñānam yat ca manaḥ vijñānam yaḥ ca cakṣuḥ saṃsparśaḥ yaḥ ca śrotra saṃsparśaḥ

original: yaś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśo yaś ca jihvāsaṃsparśo yaś ca kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo
analyzed: yaḥ ca ghrāṇa saṃsparśaḥ yaḥ ca jihvā saṃsparśaḥ yaḥ ca kāya saṃsparśaḥ yaḥ ca manaḥ saṃsparśaḥ

original: yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanā yā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā
analyzed: yā ca cakṣuḥ saṃsparśa jā vedanā yā ca śrotra saṃsparśa jā vedanā yā ca ghrāṇa saṃsparśa jā

original: vedanā yā ca jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanāyā ca kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca manaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā,
analyzed: vedanā yā ca jihvā saṃsparśa jā vedanāyāḥ ca kāya saṃsparśa jā vedanā yā ca manaḥ saṃsparśa jā vedanā

original: yāni ca catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāni ca samyakprahāṇāni ye ca ṛddhipādā yāni cendriyāni
analyzed: yāni ca catvāri smṛti upasthānāni yāni ca samyakprahāṇāni ye ca ṛddhipādāḥ yāni ca indriyāni

original: yāni ca balāni yāni ca bodhyaṅgāni yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo yāni cāpramāṇāni yāni ca
analyzed: yāni ca balāni yāni ca bodhyaṅgāni yaḥ ca ārya aṣṭāṅgaḥ mārgaḥ yāni ca apramāṇāni yāni ca

original: dhyānāni yāś cārūpyasamāpattayo yāni ca tathāgatabalāni yāni ca vaiśāradyāni yāś
analyzed: dhyānāni yāḥ ca ārūpya samāpattayaḥ yāni ca tathāgata balāni yāni ca vaiśāradyāni yāḥ

original: ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni ye cāsaṃskṛtā dharmā yac
analyzed: ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ yāni ca śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihitāni ye ca asaṃskṛtāḥ dharmāḥ yat

original: ca duḥkhaṃ yaś ca samudayo yaś ca nirodho yaś ca mārgo yaś ca kāmadhātur yaś ca rūpadhātur
analyzed: ca duḥkham yaḥ ca samudayaḥ yaḥ ca nirodhaḥ yaḥ ca mārgaḥ yaḥ ca kāmadhātuḥ yaḥ ca rūpadhātuḥ

original: yaś cārūpyadhātur yā cādhyātmaśūnyatāyā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
analyzed: yaḥ ca ārūpya dhātuḥ yā ca adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ ca bahirdhā śūnyatā yā ca adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā

original: yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ye ca samādhayo yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni ye ca yāvad
analyzed: yā ca yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā ye ca samādhayaḥ yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni ye ca yāvat

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: yaś ca tathāgatapravedito dharmavinayoyaś ca dharmadhātur yā ca tathatā yā ca bhūtakoṭir yaś cācintyadhātur yac ca nirvāṇaṃ,
analyzed: yaḥ ca tathāgata praveditaḥ dharma vinayaḥ yaḥ ca dharmadhātuḥ yā ca tathatā yā ca bhūtakoṭiḥ yaḥ ca acintya dhātuḥ yat ca nirvāṇam

original: sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.
analyzed: sarve ete dharmāḥ na saṃyuktāḥ na visaṃyuktāḥ arūpiṇaḥ nidarśanāḥ apratighāḥ eka lakṣaṇāḥ yat uta alakṣaṇāḥ

original: anena paryāyeṇa subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: anena paryāyeṇa subhūte anuloma tvam prajñāpāramitāyām mahāyānam vyapadiśasi tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyā prajñāpāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā dānapāramitā,
analyzed: na hi subhūte anyat mahāyānam anyā prajñāpāramitā anyā dhyāna pāramitā anyā vīrya pāramitā anyā kṣānti pāramitā anyā śīla pāramitā anyā dāna pāramitā

original: iti hi mahāyānañ ca prajñāpāramitā dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
analyzed: iti hi mahāyānam ca prajñāpāramitā dhyāna vīrya kṣānti śīla dāna pāramitā ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: na subhūte anyan mahāyānam anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni iti hi mahāyānaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
analyzed: na subhūte anyat mahāyānam anyāni smṛti upasthānāni iti hi mahāyānam smṛti upasthānāni ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: evaṃ nānyan mahāyānam anye samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāś  #
analyzed: evam na anyat mahāyānam anye samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgāḥ iti hi mahāyānam ca samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārgāḥ

original: cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
analyzed: ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyan mahāyānaṃ anyā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya iti hi mahāyānaṃ cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
analyzed: na anyat mahāyānam anyāḥ apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ iti hi mahāyānam ca apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: nānyan mahāyānam anye daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi mahāyānaṃ ca buddhadharmāś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
analyzed: na anyat mahāyānam anye daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ iti hi mahāyānam ca buddha dharmāḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: anena kāraṇena subhūte anulomatvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mahāyānaṃ vyapadiśasi.
analyzed: anena kāraṇena subhūte anuloma tvam prajñāpāramitāyām mahāyānam vyapadiśasi

original: iti prāptiniryāṇam
analyzed: iti prāpti niryāṇam

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavan pūrva antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: aparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: apara antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: madhyatas bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā,
analyzed: rūpa aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tā veditavyā

original: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatatā veditavyā, rūpaṃ (PvsP1-2: 138)
analyzed: evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tatā veditavyā rūpam

original: bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: evam api na vidyate na upalabhyate

original: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: evam api na vidyate na upalabhyate

original: evaṃ hi bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām  #
analyzed: evam hi bhagavan sarveṇa sarvam sarvathā sarvam bodhisattvam an upalabhamānaḥ samanupaśyan katamam bodhisattvam katamasyām prajñāpāramitāyām

original: avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
analyzed: avavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi

original: api tu khalu punar bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: api tu khalu punar bhagavat nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā,
analyzed: yathā ātmā ātmā iti ca ucyate atyanta tayā ca anabhinivṛttaḥ ātmā

original: evam asvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttam,
analyzed: evam asvabhāvānām dharmāṇām katamat rūpam yat an abhinivṛttam

original: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ,
analyzed: evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tat vijñānam yat an abhinivṛttam

original: na tad rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ tat kim anabhinivṛttim anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitayām avavadiṣyāmy
analyzed: na tat rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ yat ca an abhinivṛttam na tat vijñānam tat kim an abhinivṛttim an abhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitayām avavadiṣyāmi

original: na cānyatrānabhinivṛtter bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret,
analyzed: na ca anyatra anabhinivṛtteḥ bodhisattvaḥ upalabhyate yaḥ bodhāya caret

original: saced evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
analyzed: saced evam nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittam na avalīyate na saṃlīyate

original: na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati
analyzed: na vipratisārī bhavati mānasam na uttrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati

analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām

analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

analyzed: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte evam vadasi

analyzed: pūrva antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

analyzed: apara antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

analyzed: madhyataḥ

original: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte evam vadasi

analyzed: rūpa aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tā veditavyā

analyzed: evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tā veditavyā

original: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte evam vadasi

analyzed: rūpam bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: evam api na vidyate na upalabhyate

original: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānam bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: evam api na vidyate na upalabhyate

original: evam ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvam anupalabhamānaḥ,
analyzed: evam aham bodhisattvam mahāsattvam sarveṇa sarvam sarvathā sarvam an upalabhamānaḥ

original: asamanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
analyzed: a samanupaśyan katamam bodhisattvam katamasyām prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi

original: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte evam vadasi

original: yāvad eva nāmadheyamātram etat,
analyzed: yāvat eva nāmadheya mātram etat

original: yad uta bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: yathā ātmā ātmeti cocyate atyantatayā cānabhinivṛtta ātmā,
analyzed: yathā ātmā ātmā iti ca ucyate atyanta tayā ca anabhinivṛttaḥ ātmā

original: evam abhāvasvabhāvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ katamad rūpaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ katame te vedanā
analyzed: evam abhāva svabhāvānām dharmāṇām katamat rūpam yat an abhinivṛttam katame te vedanā

original: saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tad vijñānaṃ yad anabhinivṛttaṃ yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad
analyzed: saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ katamat tat vijñānam yat an abhinivṛttam yat ca an abhinivṛttam na tat

original: rūpaṃ ye (PvsP1-2: 139)
analyzed: rūpam ye

original: cānabhinivṛttā na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yac cānabhinivṛttaṃ na tad vijñānaṃ,
analyzed: ca an abhinivṛttā na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ yat ca an abhinivṛttam na tat vijñānam

original: tat kim anabhinivṛttam anabhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi?
analyzed: tat kim an abhinivṛttam an abhinivṛttau prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi

original: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte evam vadasi

original: na cānyatrānabhinivṛtte bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret?
analyzed: na ca anyatra anabhinivṛtte bodhisattvaḥ upalabhyate yaḥ bodhāya caret

original: kena kāraṇenāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte evam vadasi

original: saced evam upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
analyzed: saced evam upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittam na avalīyate na saṃlīyate

original: na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati
analyzed: na vipratisārī bhavati mānasam na uttrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati

original: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām iti?
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām iti

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: sattvāsattayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: sattva asattayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrva antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: sattvaśūnyatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: sattva śūnyatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrva antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: sattvaviviktatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: sattva vivikta tayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrva antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: sattvāsvabhāvatayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: sattva asvabhāva tayā āyuṣman śāriputra pūrva antataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: evam aparāntato madhyataś ca vaktavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam apara antataḥ madhyataḥ ca vaktavyam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sattvāsattayā śūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatā pūrvāntādīnām anupalabdheḥ,
analyzed: sattva asat tayā śūnyatā vivikta tā svabhāva tā pūrva anta ādīnām anupalabdheḥ

original: na cānyatra sattvāsattāśūnyatāviviktatāsvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyat pūrvāntādi iti hi yā ca sattvāsattā yāvad yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad
analyzed: na ca anyatra sattva asattā śūnyatā vivikta tā svabhāva tā anyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ pūrva anta ādi iti hi yā ca sattva asattā yāvat yat ca madhyam sarvam etat

original: rūpāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: rūpa asattayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaviviktatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: rūpa śūnya tayā rūpa vivikta tayā rūpa asvabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: evam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna asattayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: vijñāna śūnya tayā vijñāna vivikta tayā vijñāna asvabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: evam āyataneṣu dhātuṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaitīti vaktavyam.
analyzed: evam āyataneṣu dhātuṣu pratītyasamutpāda aṅgeṣu ca pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti iti vaktavyam

original: dānapāramitāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: dāna pāramitā sattayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: dānapāramitāśūnyatayā dānapāramitāviviktatayā dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: dāna pāramitā śūnya tayā dāna pāramitā vivikta tayā dāna pāramitā svabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāsattayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā sattayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti

original: prajñāpāramitāśūnyatayā prajñāpāramitāviviktatayā prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā śūnya tayā prajñāpāramitā vivikta tayā prajñāpāramitā svabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām (PvsP1-2: 140)
analyzed: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra dāna śīla kṣānti vīrya dhyāna prajñāpāramitā sattāyām śūnyatāyām vivikta tāyām

original: asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante,
analyzed: asvabhāva tāyām pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni upalabhyante

original: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvaḥ,
analyzed: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā vivikta tā anyā asvabhāva tā anyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ

original: anyā dānapāramitā anyā śīlapāramitā anyā kṣāntipāramitā anyā vīryapāramitā anyā dhyānapāramitā anyā prajñāpāramitā anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
analyzed: anyā dāna pāramitā anyā śīla pāramitā anyā kṣānti pāramitā anyā vīrya pāramitā anyā dhyāna pāramitā anyā prajñāpāramitā anyāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni

original: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cāsattā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvatā yāś ca ṣaṭ pāramitā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad
analyzed: iti hi āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca asat tā yāvat abhāva svabhāva tā yāḥ ca ṣaḍ pāramitāḥ yaḥ ca bodhisattvaḥ yāni ca pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni sarvam etat

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: adhyātmaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: adhyātma śūnyatā sattayā śūnyatayā vivikta tayā asvabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā sattayā śūnyatayā vivikta tayā asvabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyataḥ bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ
analyzed: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātma śūnyatā sattāyām śūnyatāyām vivikta tāyām asvabhāva tāyām

original: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante,
analyzed: yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā sattāyām śūnyatāyām vivikta tāyām asvabhāva tāyām pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni upalabhyante

original: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo 'nyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
analyzed: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā vivikta tā anyā asvabhāva tā anyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ nyāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni

original: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā
analyzed: iti hi āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca adhyātma śūnyatā asat tā śūnyatā vivikta tā asvabhāva tā

original: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
analyzed: yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā asat tā śūnyatā vivikta tā asvabhāva tā yaḥ ca bodhisattvaḥ

original: yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra
analyzed: yāni ca pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni sarvam etat a dvaidhīkāram anena āyuṣman śāriputra

original: paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
analyzed: paryāyeṇa pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthanāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra smṛti upasthanā sattayā śūnya tayā vivikta tayā asvabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā
analyzed: daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharma asattayā śūnyatayā vivikta tayā

original: asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: asvabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra smṛtyupasthānāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ
analyzed: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra smṛti upasthāna asat tāyām śūnyatāyām vivikta tāyām asvabhāva tāyām

original: yāvad aṣṭādaśaveṇikabuddhadharmāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni upalabhyante,
analyzed: yāvat aṣṭādaśa veṇika buddha dharma asattāyām śūnyatāyām viviktāyām asvabhāva tāyām pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni upalabhyante

original: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā anyāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
analyzed: na ca śāriputra anyā asat tā śūnyatā vivikta tā asvabhāva tā anyāni smṛti upasthānāni

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattayo (PvsP1-2: 141)
analyzed: evam samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga apramāṇa ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido 'nye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
analyzed: daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ nye ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ anyāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni

original: iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsattā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāvatā yāvad
analyzed: iti hi āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca smṛti upasthāna asat tā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāva tā yāvat

original: yo ca aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmāsattā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
analyzed: yā u ca aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharma asattā śūnyatā viviktā asvabhāva tā yaḥ ca bodhisattvaḥ

original: yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra
analyzed: yāni ca pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni sarvam etat a dvaidhīkāram anena āyuṣman śāriputra

original: paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
analyzed: paryāyeṇa pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra sarvasamādhyasattayā sarvadhāraṇīmukhāsattayā dharmadhātvasattayā
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra sarva samādhi asattayā sarva dhāraṇī mukha asattayā dharmadhātu asattayā

original: tathatāsattayā bhūtakoṭyasattayā bhūtakoṭiśūnyatayā bhūtakoṭiviviktatayā bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatayā
analyzed: tathatā sattayā bhūta koṭi asattayā bhūta koṭi śūnyatayā bhūta koṭi vivikta tayā bhūta koṭi asvabhāva tayā

original: pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra samādhyasattāyāṃ yāvad bhūtakoṭyasattāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiśūnyatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiviviktatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny
analyzed: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra samādhi asattāyām yāvat bhūtakoṭi asattāyām bhūtakoṭi śūnyatāyām bhūtakoṭi vivikta tāyām bhūtakoṭi asvabhāva tāyām pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni

original: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyo bodhisattvo
analyzed: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā vivikta tā anyā asvabhāva tā anyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ

original: 'nyaḥ samādhir anyad dhāraṇīmukham anyo dharmadhātur anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭir
analyzed: nyaḥ samādhiḥ anyat dhāraṇīmukham anyaḥ dharmadhātuḥ anyā tathatā anyā bhūtakoṭiḥ

original: anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni. iti hy āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca samādhyasattā yāvad
analyzed: anyāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni iti hi āyuṣman śāriputra yā ca samādhi asattā yāvat

original: yā ca bhūtakoṭyasattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni,
analyzed: yā ca bhūta koṭi asattā śūnyatā vivikta tā asvabhāva tā yaḥ ca bodhisattvaḥ yāni ca pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni

original: sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
analyzed: sarvam etat a dvaidhīkāram anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvakāsattayā śūnyatayā viviktatayā asvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti,
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvaka asattayā śūnya tayā vivikta tayā asvabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: pratyekabuddhāsattayā bodhisattvāsattayā sarvajñāsattayā sarvajñaśūnyatayā sarvajñaviviktatayā sarvajñāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu  #
analyzed: pratyekabuddha asattayā bodhisattva asattayā sarvajña asattayā sarvajña śūnyatayā sarvajña vivikta tayā sarvajña asvabhāva tayā pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu

original: bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ nā upaiti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvakāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ yāvat sarvajñāsattāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ viviktatāyām asvabhāvatāyāṃ  #
analyzed: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra śrāvaka asattāyām śūnyatāyām vivikta tāyām asvabhāva tāyām yāvat sarvajña asattāyām śūnyatāyām vivikta tāyām asvabhāva tāyām

original: pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāny upalabhyante,
analyzed: pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni upalabhyante

original: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā viviktatā anyā asvabhāvatā anyaḥ śrāvako 'nyaḥ pratyekabuddho 'nyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ sarvajñaḥ,
analyzed: na ca śāriputra anyā asattā anyā śūnyatā anyā vivikta tā anyā asvabhāva tā anyaḥ śrāvakaḥ nyaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ nyaḥ bodhisattvaḥ nyaḥ sarvajñaḥ

original: anyāni pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni. iti hy āyuṣman śāriputrayā ca śrāvakāsattā śūnyatā
analyzed: anyāni pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni iti hi āyuṣman śāriputrayā ca śrāvaka asattā śūnyatā

original: viviktatā asvabhāvatā yāvad yā ca sarvajñāsattā śūnyatā viviktatā asvabhāvatā yaś
analyzed: vivikta tā asvabhāva tā yāvat yā ca sarvajña asattā śūnyatā vivikta tā asvabhāva tā

original: ca bodhisattvo yāni ca pūrvāntāparāntamadhyāni (PvsP1-2: 142)
analyzed: ca bodhisattvaḥ yāni ca pūrva anta apara anta madhyāni

original: sarvam etad advaidhīkāram. anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntāparāntamadhyeṣu bodhisattvo nopaiti.
analyzed: sarvam etat a dvaidhīkāram anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa pūrva anta apara anta madhyeṣu bodhisattvaḥ na upaiti

original: iti prāptiniryāṇe prāpyapratiṣedhaḥ
analyzed: iti prāpti niryāṇe prāpya pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam vadasi

original: kena kāraṇena rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena rūpa aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tā veditavyā

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

original: vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
analyzed: vijñāna aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tā veditavyā iti

original: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamaṃ,
analyzed: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśa samam

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā ākāśasamā,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ ākāśa samā

original: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśa samam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣman śāriputra yathā ākāśasya na pūrvanta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma āyuṣman śāriputra yathā ākāśasya na pūrva antaḥ upalabhyate na apara antaḥ upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate

original: anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate.
analyzed: ananta aparyanta tayā ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate

original: evam evāyuṣman śāriputra rūpasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhya upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam eva āyuṣman śāriputra rūpasya na eva pūrva antaḥ upalabhyate na apara antaḥ upalabhyate na madhyaḥ upalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: rūpaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate,
analyzed: rūpa śūnyatām upādāya na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrva antaḥ vā apara antaḥ vā madhyam vā upalabhyate

original: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
analyzed: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām

original: vijñānasya naivapūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: vijñānasya na eva pūrva antaḥ upalabhyate na apara antaḥ upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate tat kasya hetoḥ

original: vijñānaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate,
analyzed: vijñāna śūnyatām upādāya na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrva antaḥ vā apara antaḥ vā madhyam vā upalabhyate

original: śūnyateti ca vyavahriyate.
analyzed: śūnyatā iti ca vyavahriyate

original: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā,
analyzed: anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpa aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tā veditavyā

original: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāra vijñāna aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tā veditavyā

original: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratityasamutpādeṣu yāvaj jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāseṣu,
analyzed: evam vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratitya samutpādeṣu yāvat jarā maraṇa śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāseṣu

original: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsv
analyzed: smṛti upasthāna samyakprahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpatti daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvitsu

original: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśa samāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasya naivādir nānto na madhyam upalabhyate anantāparyantatayā
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma āyuṣman śāriputra ākāśasya na eva ādiḥ na antaḥ na madhyam upalabhyate ananta aparyanta tayā

original: ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate. evam evāyuṣman śāriputra buddhadharmāṇāṃ nādir nānto
analyzed: ākāśam iti ca vyavahriyate evam eva āyuṣman śāriputra buddha dharmāṇām na ādiḥ na antaḥ

original: na madhyam upalabhyate buddhadharmaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrvānto vā
analyzed: na madhyam upalabhyate buddha dharma śūnyatām upādāya na ca śūnyatāyāḥ pūrva antaḥ vā

original: aparānto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
analyzed: apara antaḥ vā madhyam vā upalabhyate

original: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa buddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
analyzed: anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa buddha dharma aparyanta tayā bodhisattva aparyanta tā veditavyā

original: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam vadasi

original: kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: kena kāraṇena rūpam bodhisattvaḥ iti evam api na vidyate na upalabhyate

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

original: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate iti?
analyzed: vijñānam bodhisattvaḥ iti evam api na vidyate na upalabhyate iti

original: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
analyzed: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra rūpeṇa śūnyam

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

original: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: vijñānam āyuṣman śāriputra vijñānena śūnyam tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hy āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate nāpi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyate,
analyzed: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra śūnyatāyām rūpam saṃvidyate na api śūnyatāyām bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyate

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

original: na śūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate,
analyzed: na śūnyatāyām vijñānam saṃvidyate

original: nāpi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyate.

original: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpam bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: evam api na vidyate na upalabhyate

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

original: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: vijñānam bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: evam api na vidyate nopalabhyate.
analyzed: evam api na vidyate na upalabhyate

analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra dāna pāramitā dāna pāramitayā śūnyā

original: śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā śūnyā,

original: vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitayā śūnyā,
analyzed: vīrya pāramitā vīrya pāramitayā śūnyā

original: prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate,
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām dāna pāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyām bodhisattvaḥ vidyate

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,

original: na śunyatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate. adhyātamaśūnyatā āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā,
analyzed: na śunyatāyām prajñāpāramitā vidyate na śūnyatāyām bodhisattvaḥ vidyate adhyātama śūnyatā āyuṣman śāriputra adhyātma śūnyatayā śūnyā

original: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā.
analyzed: evam yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatayā śūnyā

original: smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni,
analyzed: smṛti upasthānāni smṛti upasthānaiḥ śūnyāni

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādā indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni mārgo 'pramāṇāni dhyānāny

analyzed: ārūpya samāpattayaḥ ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ

original: pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā,
analyzed: pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ aṣṭādaśa āveṇikaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ śūnyā

original: dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ samādhiḥ samādhinā śūnyo dhāraṇimukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ
analyzed: dharmadhātuḥ dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ samādhiḥ samādhinā śūnyaḥ dhāraṇimukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ

original: śūnyāni sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā śūnyā mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā sarvākārajñatā
analyzed: śūnyāni sarvajña tā sarvajña tayā śūnyā mārga ākāra jña tā mārga ākāra jña tayā śūnyā sarva ākāra jña tā

original: sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena
analyzed: sarva ākāra jña tayā śūnyā śrāvakayānam śrāvakayānena śūnyam pratyekabuddha yānam pratyekabuddha yānena

original: śūnyaṃ buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyaṃ śrāvakatvena śrāvakaḥ śūnyaḥ pratyekabuddhatvena
analyzed: śūnyam buddha yānam buddha yānena śūnyam śrāvaka tvena śrāvakaḥ śūnyaḥ pratyekabuddha tvena

original: pratyekabuddhaḥ śūnyas tathāgatatvena tathāgataḥ śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: pratyekabuddhaḥ śūnyaḥ tathāgata tvena tathāgataḥ śūnyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgato vidyate śūnyatāyāṃ bodhisattvo vidyate.
analyzed: na hi śūnyatāyām tathāgataḥ vidyate śūnyatāyām bodhisattvaḥ vidyate

original: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva iti, evam api (PvsP1-2: 144)
analyzed: anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa rūpam bodhisattvaḥ iti evam api

original: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣipta yad uta bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: āgantukam etat nāmadheyam yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
analyzed: nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta adhyātma śūnyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā

original: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni adhyātmaśūnyatā
analyzed: yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā na ca adhyātma śūnyatāyām nāma na ca nāmni adhyātma śūnyatā

original: bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
analyzed: bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sarva ete na saṃvidyante
analyzed: tathā hi yat ca nāma yā ca adhyātma śūnyatā yā ca bahirdhā śūnyatā yā ca adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yā ca yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā sarve ete na saṃvidyante

original: anenāyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
analyzed: anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa nāmadheya mātram etat yat uta bodhisattvaḥ iti

original: āgantukam etac chāriputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta smṛtyupasthānānīti,
analyzed: āgantukam etat śāriputra nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta smṛti upasthānāni iti

original: na ca smṛtyupasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni smṛtyupasthānāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na ca smṛti upasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni smṛti upasthānāni tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāni ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi yat ca nāma yāni ca smṛti upasthānāni ubhayam etat na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo
analyzed: evam samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāḥ pañca indriyāni pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭāṅga

original: mārgo 'pramāṇāni dhyānāni ārūpyasamāpattayo daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni
analyzed: pramāṇāni dhyānāni ārūpya samāpattayaḥ daśa tathāgata balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni

original: catasraḥ pratisaṃvida āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā
analyzed: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ āgantukam etat nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta aṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: iti na ca buddhadharmeṣu nāma nāmni buddhadharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: iti na ca buddha dharmeṣu nāma nāmni buddha dharmāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi yac ca nāma ye ca buddhadharmā ubhayam etad na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
analyzed: tathā hi yat ca nāma ye ca buddha dharmāḥ ubhayam etat na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate

original: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta samādhir iti,
analyzed: āgantukam etat nāmadheyam prakṣiptam yat uta samādhiḥ iti

analyzed: ca sarvajña tāyām nāma na ca nāmni sarvajña tā tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvajñatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
analyzed: tathā hi yat ca nāma yā ca sarvajña tā ubhayam etat na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate

analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam vadasi

analyzed: kena kāraṇena ucyate yathā ātmā ātmā iti ca ucyate

analyzed: ātmā śāriputra atyanta tayā na saṃvidyate na upalabhyate

analyzed: kutas punar asya abhinivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati

analyzed: na asti sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān dharmān upaparīkṣate

original: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati rūpam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye rūpam na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati rūpam etat iti

original: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān dharmān upaparīkṣate

original: tasmin samaye vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati vijñānam etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye vedanām saṃjñām saṃskārān vijñānam na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati vijñānam etat iti

original: tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati cakṣur etad iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥ na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati cakṣuḥ etat iti

original: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mana etad (PvsP1-2: 154) iti.
analyzed: evam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvām kāyam manaḥ na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati manaḥ etat iti

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān dharmān upaparīkṣate

original: tasmin samaye dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati
analyzed: tasmin samaye dāna pāramitām na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati

original: dānapāramiteyam iti. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: dāna pāramitā iyam iti evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā

original: tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati prajñāpāramiteyam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitām na upaiti nā upādadāti nā adhitiṣṭhati nā abhiniviśate na prajñapayati prajñāpāramitā iyam iti

original: tasmin samaye adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty adhyātmaśūnyateyam iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye adhyātma śūnyatām na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati adhyātma śūnyatā iyam iti

original: tasmin samaye bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ
analyzed: tasmin samaye bahirdhā śūnyatām adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatām yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatām

original: nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyam iti.
analyzed: na upaiti nā upādadāti nā adhitiṣṭhati nā abhiniviśate na prajñapayati yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iyam iti

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān dharmān upaparīkṣate

original: tasmin samaye smṛtyupasthanāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānānīmānīti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye smṛti upasthanāni na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati smṛti upasthānāni imāni iti

original: tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati  #
analyzed: tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādāni indriyāni balāni bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭāṅga mārgam na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati  /

original: mārgo 'yam iti,
analyzed: mārgaḥ yam iti

original: tasmin samaye apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samāpattaya imā iti,
analyzed: tasmin samaye apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīḥ na upaiti nā upādadāti nā adhitiṣṭhati nā abhiniviśate na prajñapayati samāpattayaḥ imāḥ iti

original: tasmin samaye daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān
analyzed: tasmin samaye daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikān

original: buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati buddhadharmā ime iti.
analyzed: buddha dharmān na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati buddha dharmāḥ ime iti

original: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: punar aparam bhagavan yasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān dharmān upaparīkṣate

original: tasmin samaye sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādadāti nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhidhāraṇīmukhānīmāni. tat kasya
analyzed: tasmin samaye sarva samādhi dhāraṇī mukhāni na upaiti na upādadāti na adhitiṣṭhati na abhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhi dhāraṇī mukhāni imāni tat kasya

original: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad vyastasamastāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran rūpam na samanupaśyati yāvat vyasta samastāni skandha dhātu āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādam

original: na samanupaśyati,
analyzed: na samanupaśyati

original: saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān na samanupaśyati pāramitā na samanupaśyati apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattidaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān
analyzed: saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣān dharmān na samanupaśyati pāramitāḥ na samanupaśyati a pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpatti daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvid aṣṭādaśa āveṇika buddha dharmān

original: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ na samanupaśyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yāvat sarva ākāra jña tām na samanupaśyati tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ (PvsP1-2: 155)
analyzed: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ rūpasya anutpādaḥ na tat rūpam yaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ

original: saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam
analyzed: saṃskārāṇām yaḥ vijñānasya anutpādaḥ na tat vijñānam iti hi vijñānam ca anutpādaḥ ca advayam

original: etad advaidhīkaram. yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣur yaḥ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya
analyzed: etat a dvaidhīkaram yaḥ bhagavan cakṣuṣaḥ na utpādaḥ na tat cakṣuḥ yaḥ śrotrasya ghrāṇasya

original: jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manaso 'nutpādo na tan mana iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: jihvāyāḥ kāyasya manasaḥ nutpādaḥ na tat manaḥ iti hi manaḥ ca anutpādaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan dāna pāramitāyāḥ anutpādaḥ na sā dāna pāramitā

original: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā,
analyzed: yaḥ śīla pāramitāyāḥ kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ vīrya pāramitāyāḥ dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ

original: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ anutpādaḥ na sā prajñāpāramitā

original: iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca anutpādaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ anutpādaḥ na sā adhyātma śūnyatā

original: yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
analyzed: yaḥ bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ anutpādaḥ na sā bahirdhā śūnyatā

original: yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
analyzed: yaḥ dhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ anutpādaḥ na sā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā

original: yo yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
analyzed: yaḥ yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ anutpādaḥ na sā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

original: iti hi abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
analyzed: iti hi abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā ca anutpādaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram

original: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan smṛti upasthānānām anutpādaḥ na tāni smṛti upasthānāni

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattyabhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido,
analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇa ṛddhipāda indriya bala bodhyaṅga mārga apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpatti abhijñā daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na te 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi buddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām anutpādaḥ na te ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ iti hi buddha dharmāḥ ca anutpādaḥ ca advayam etat

original: yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan dharmadhātoḥ anutpādaḥ na sa dharmadhātuḥ

original: yas tathatāyā ākāśadhātor bhūtakoṭer acintyadhātor bodher yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo
analyzed: yaḥ tathatāyāḥ ākāśa dhātoḥ bhūtakoṭeḥ acintya dhātoḥ bodheḥ yaḥ sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ anutpādaḥ

original: na sā sarvākārajñateti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: na sā sarva ākāra jña tā iti hi sarva ākāra jña tā ca anutpādaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy anutpādo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
analyzed: tathā hi anutpādaḥ na ekaḥ na dvau na bahavaḥ na pṛthak tasmāt yaḥ sarva ākārajña tāyāḥ anutpādaḥ na sā sarva ākārajña tā

original: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan rūpasya vyayaḥ na tat rūpam

original: yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
analyzed: yaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām yaḥ vijñānasya vyayaḥ na tat vijñānam

original: iti hi skandhāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: iti hi skandhāḥ ca vyayaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ vyayo na te pañca skandhāḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi vyayaḥ na ekaḥ na dvau na bahavaḥ na pṛthak tasmāt yaḥ pañcānām skandhānām vyayaḥ na te pañca skandhāḥ

original: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā, evaṃ (PvsP1-2: 156)
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan dāna pāramitāyāḥ vyayaḥ na sā dāna pāramitā evam

original: yaḥ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyā,
analyzed: yaḥ śīla pāramitāyāḥ kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ vīrya pāramitāyāḥ dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ

original: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vyayo na sā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ vyayaḥ na sā prajñāpāramitā iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca vyayaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ pāramitānāṃ vyāyo natāḥ pāramitā.
analyzed: tathā hi vyayaḥ nā ekaḥ na dvau na bahavaḥ na pṛthak tasmāt yaḥ pāramitānām vyāyaḥ natāḥ pāramitā

original: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan adhyātma śūnyatāyāḥ vyayaḥ na sā adhyātma śūnyatā

original: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: iti hi adhyātma śūnyatā ca vyayaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatayā vyayo na sā adhyātmaśūnyatā evaṃ yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na  #
analyzed: tathā hi vyayaḥ na ekaḥ na dvau na bahavaḥ na pṛthak tasmāt yaḥ dhyātma śūnyatayā vyayaḥ na sā adhyātma śūnyatā evam yaḥ bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ vyayaḥ na

original: sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
analyzed: sā bahirdhā śūnyatā

original: yo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā
analyzed: yaḥ dhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatāyāḥ vyayaḥ na sā dhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat yaḥ bhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ

original: vyayo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam
analyzed: vyayaḥ na sā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā iti hi abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā ca vyayaḥ ca advayam

original: etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: etat a dvaidhīkāram tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
analyzed: tathā hi vyayaḥ nā ekaḥ na dvau na bahavaḥ na pṛthak tasmāt yaḥ bhāva svabhāva śūnyatāyāḥ vyayaḥ na sā abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā

original: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
analyzed: yaḥ bhagavan smṛti upasthānānām vyayaḥ na tāni smṛti upasthānāni

original: iti hi smṛtyupasthānāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkaram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: iti hi smṛti upasthānāni ca vyayaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkaram tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ vyayo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
analyzed: tathā hi vyayaḥ na ekaḥ na dvau na bahavaḥ na pṛthak tasmāt yaḥ smṛti upasthānānām vyayaḥ na tāni smṛti upasthānāni

original: evaṃ yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇāṃ balānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgasya
analyzed: evam yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām ṛddhipādānām indriyāṇām balānām bodhyaṅgānām yaḥ ca ārya aṣṭāṅgasya

original: mārgasya vyayo na sa mārga iti hi mārgaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: mārgasya vyayaḥ na sa mārgaḥ iti hi mārgaḥ ca vyayaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo mārgasya vyayo na sa mārgaḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi vyayaḥ na ekaḥ na dvau na bahavaḥ na pṛthak tasmāt yaḥ mārgasya vyayaḥ na sa mārgaḥ

original: evaṃ yo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām abhijñānāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ daśānāṃ
analyzed: evam pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām abhijñānām pratisaṃvidām vaiśāradyānām daśānām

original: tathāgatabalānāṃ yo 'ṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te buddhadharmā
analyzed: tathāgata balānām yaḥ ṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām vyayaḥ na te buddha dharmāḥ

original: iti hi buddhadharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: iti hi buddha dharmāḥ ca vyayaḥ ca advayam etat a dvaidhīkāram tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi vyayo naiko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak tasmād yo buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te buddhadharmāḥ.
analyzed: tathā hi vyayaḥ na ekaḥ na dvau na bahavaḥ na pṛthak tasmāt yaḥ buddha dharmāṇām vyayaḥ na te buddha dharmāḥ

original: yat punar bhagavann ucyate,
analyzed: yat punar bhagavan ucyate

original: rūpam ity advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā,
analyzed: rūpam iti advayasya eṣā gaṇanā kṛtā

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā,

analyzed: evam vyasta samastānām skandha dhātu āyatanānām pratītyasamutpādasya saptatriṃśat bodhi pakṣānām dharmāṇām ākārām jānāti na ca atra abhiniviśate

analyzed: evam apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattīnām pāramitānām balānām vaiśāradyānām pratisaṃvidām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām ākārām jānāti na ca atra abhiniviśate

analyzed: smṛti upasthānebhyaḥ āratā āramitā

analyzed: apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattibhyaḥ āratā āramitā

analyzed: yāvat sarvajña tāyāḥ āra tā āramitā

original: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃ vadasi,
analyzed: yat punar āyuṣman śāriputra evam vadasi

analyzed: katamā upaparīkṣaṇā iti

analyzed: na viviktam iti na a viviktam iti upaparīkṣate

analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñām na saṃskārān

analyzed: na vijñānam nityam iti upaparīkṣate

analyzed: na anityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti na ātmā iti na anātmā iti na śāntam iti na aśāntam

original: iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: iti na śūnyam iti na a śūnyam iti na nimittam iti na a nimittam iti na praṇihitam iti na a praṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate

original: na viviktam iti nāviviktamity upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: na viviktam iti na a viviktam iti upaparīkṣate

original: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvāṃ kāyaṃ mano na nityam iti upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: evam cakṣuḥ śrotram ghrāṇam jihvām kāyam manaḥ na nityam iti upaparīkṣate

original: nānityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti śāntam iti nāśāntam iti
analyzed: na anityam iti na sukham iti na duḥkham iti na ātmā iti na anātmā iti śāntam iti na aśāntam iti

original: na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: na śūnyam iti na a śūnyam iti na nimittam iti na animittam iti na praṇihitam iti na apraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate

original: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: na viviktam iti na a viviktam iti upaparīkṣate

original: evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmān na nityā iti nānityā iti upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: evam rūpa śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭavya dharmān na nityāḥ iti na anityāḥ iti upaparīkṣate

original: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti nātmāna iti nānātmāna iti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti na śūnyā iti nāśūnyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā  #
analyzed: na sukhāḥ iti na duḥkhāḥ iti na ātmānaḥ iti na anātmānaḥ iti na śāntāḥ iti na aśāntāḥ iti na śūnyāḥ iti na aśūnyāḥ iti na nimittāḥ iti na animittāḥ iti na praṇihitāḥ

original: iti nāpraṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: iti na apraṇihitāḥ iti upaparīkṣate

analyzed: na viviktāḥ iti na aviviktāḥ iti upaparīkṣate

analyzed: evam cakṣuḥ vijñānam śrotra vijñānam ghrāṇa vijñānam jihvā vijñānam kāya vijñānam manaḥ vijñānam na nityam na anityam iti upaparīkṣate

original: na sukham iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti na śūnyam iti nāśūnyam iti na nimittam iti nānimittam iti na praṇihitam  #
analyzed: na sukham iti na duḥkham iti na ātmā iti na anātmā iti na śāntam iti na aśāntam iti na śūnyam iti na aśūnyam iti na nimittam iti na animittam iti na praṇihitam

original: iti nāpraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: iti na apraṇihitam iti upaparīkṣate

original: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: na viviktam iti na a viviktam iti upaparīkṣate

original: evaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ kāyasaṃsparśaṃ manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ na nitya iti nānitya ity upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: evam cakṣuḥ saṃsparśam śrotra saṃsparśam ghrāṇa saṃsparśam jihvā saṃsparśam kāya saṃsparśam manaḥ saṃsparśam na nityaḥ iti na anityaḥ iti upaparīkṣate

original: na sukha iti na duḥkha iti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānta iti (PvsP1-2: 159)
analyzed: na sukhaḥ iti na duḥkhaḥ iti na ātmā iti na anātmā iti na śāntaḥ iti

original: nāśānta iti na śūnya iti nāśūnya iti na nimitta iti nānimitta iti na praṇihita iti nāpraṇihita iti upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: na aśāntaḥ iti na śūnyaḥ iti na aśūnyaḥ iti na nimittaḥ iti na animittaḥ iti na praṇihitaḥ iti na apraṇihitaḥ iti upaparīkṣate

original: na viviktam iti nāviviktam ity upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: na viviktam iti na a viviktam iti upaparīkṣate

original: evaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayā

analyzed: vedanā jihvā saṃsparśa pratyayā vedanā kāya saṃsparśa pratyayā vedanā manaḥ saṃsparśa pṛtatyayā

original: vedanā na nityā iti nānityā ity upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: vedanāḥ na nityāḥ iti na anityāḥ iti upaparīkṣate

original: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti nātmā iti nānātmā iti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti na śūnyā iti nāśūnyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā  #
analyzed: na sukhāḥ iti na duḥkhāḥ iti na ātmāḥ iti na anātmāḥ iti na śāntāḥ iti na aśāntāḥ iti na śūnyāḥ iti na aśūnyāḥ iti na nimittāḥ iti na animittāḥ iti na praṇihitāḥ

original: iti nāpraṇihitā iti upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: iti na apraṇihitāḥ iti upaparīkṣate

original: na viviktā iti nāviviktā ity upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: na viviktāḥ iti na a viviktāḥ iti upaparīkṣate

original: evaṃ dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: evam dāna pāramitā śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā na nityā iti na anityā iti upaparīkṣate

original: na sukheti na duḥkheti na ātmeti nānātmeti na śāntā iti nāśāntā iti,
analyzed: na sukha iti na duḥkha iti naḥ ātmā iti na anātmā iti na śāntāḥ iti na aśāntāḥ iti

original: na śūnyā iti nāśunyā iti na nimittā iti nānimittā iti na praṇihitā iti nāpraṇihitā ity upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: na śūnyāḥ iti na a śunyāḥ iti na nimittāḥ iti na animittāḥ iti na praṇihitāḥ iti na apraṇihitāḥ iti upaparīkṣate

original: na viviktā iti nāviviktā ity upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: na viviktāḥ iti na a viviktāḥ iti upaparīkṣate

original: evam adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: evam adhyātma śūnyatā bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā na nityā iti na anityā iti upaparīkṣate

original: na sukheti na duḥkheti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānteti nāśānteti na śūnyeti nāśūnyeti na nimitteti nānimitteti na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihitety upaparikṣate,
analyzed: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti na ātmā iti na anātmā iti na śāntā iti na aśāntā iti na śūnyā iti na aśūnyā iti na nimittā iti na animittā iti na praṇihitā iti na apraṇihitā iti upaparikṣate

original: na vivikteti nāviviktety upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: na viviktā iti na a viviktā iti upaparīkṣate

original: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni na nityānīti nānityānīty upaparīkṣate na sukhānīti na duḥkhānīti
analyzed: evam smṛti upasthānāni na nityāni iti na anityāni iti upaparīkṣate na sukhāni iti na duḥkhāni iti

analyzed: na ātmāni iti na anātmāni iti na śāntāni iti na aśāntāni iti na śūnyāni iti na aśūnyāni iti na nimittāni iti

original: nānimittānīti na praṇihitānīti nāpraṇihitānīty upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: na animittāni iti na praṇihitāni iti na apraṇihitāni iti upaparīkṣate

original: na viviktānīti nāviviktānīty upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: na viviktāni iti na a viviktāni iti upaparīkṣate

original: evaṃ samyakprahāṇāni ṛddhipādānīndriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'pramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
analyzed: evam samyak prahāṇāni ṛddhipādāni indriyāṇi balāni bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭāṅgaḥ mārgaḥ pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattayaḥ

original: 'bhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ
analyzed: bhijñāḥ daśa tathāgata balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvidaḥ ṣṭādaśa āveṇikāḥ buddha dharmāḥ

original: samādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvajñatā na nityeti nānityety upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: samādhayaḥ sarva dhāraṇī mukhāni sarvajña tā na nityā iti na anityā iti upaparīkṣate

original: na sukheti na duḥkheti nātmeti nānātmeti na śānteti nāśānteti na śūnyeti nāśūnyeti na nimitteti nānimitteti na praṇihiteti nāpraṇihitety upaparīkṣate,
analyzed: na sukhā iti na duḥkhā iti na ātmā iti na anātmā iti na śāntā iti na aśāntā iti na śūnyā iti na aśūnyā iti na nimittā iti na animittā iti na praṇihitā iti na apraṇihitā iti upaparīkṣate

original: na vivikteti nāviviktety upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: na viviktā iti na a viviktā iti upaparīkṣate

original: evaṃ hy āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvao mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān upaparīkṣate.
analyzed: evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran imān dharmān upaparīkṣate

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

analyzed: anutpādaḥ pratibhānam anutpādaḥ dharmaḥ te pi dharmāḥ anutpannāḥ yān ārabhya pratibhāti mantrayitum

analyzed: yāvat skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpada pāramitā bodhi pakṣāḥ dharmāḥ sarva śūnyatā sarva dhāraṇīmukhāni sarva samādhayaḥ bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ

analyzed: āveṇika buddha dharmāḥ peyālam

analyzed: yāvat sarva ākāra jña tā api anutpādāḥ

analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

analyzed: kim punar āyuṣman subhūte yathā eva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiḥ ca abhisamayaḥ ca

analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputraivam etat,
analyzed: evam etat āyuṣman śāriputra evam etat

original: yathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiś cābhisamayaś ca tathaiva lokavyavahāreṇa pañcāṇāṃ gatīnāṃ saṃbhedo bhavati nātra khalu punaḥ paramārthena.  #
analyzed: yathā eva lokavyavahāreṇa prāptiḥ ca abhisamayaḥ ca tathā eva lokavyavahāreṇa pañcāṇām gatīnām saṃbhedaḥ bhavati na atra khalu punar paramārthena  /

original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

analyzed: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām vijñānasya aham āyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya svabhāva śūnyasya utpādam na icchāmi

analyzed: dhāraṇī mukhānām balānām vaiśāradyānām pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām

analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

analyzed: ca anutpādaḥ dvau api etau dharmau na saṃyuktau na visaṃyuktau arūpiṇau a nidarśanau apratighau eka lakṣaṇau yat uta alakṣaṇau

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

analyzed: dharmatā eṣā āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgata śrāvakāṇām a niśrita sarva dharmāṇām te yatas yatas eva paripṛcchyante tatas tatas eva niḥsaranti tat kasya

analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: rūpam āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛtiśūnyaṃ taṃ nādhyātmaniśritaṃ na bahirdhāniśritaṃ nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,

analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā

analyzed: evam śrotram ghrāṇam jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛti śūnyam tam na adhyātma niśritam na bahirdhā niśritam na ubhayam antareṇa upalabhyate

analyzed: evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā prajñāpāramitā api āyuṣman śāriputra prakṛti śūnyā sā na adhyātmam na bahirdhā na ubhayam

original: adhyātmaśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyā sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate,

analyzed: evam bahirdhā śūnyatā adhyātma bahirdhā śūnyatā yāvat abhāva svabhāva śūnyatā prakṛti śūnyā sā na adhyātmam na bahirdhā na ubhayam antareṇa upalabhyate

analyzed: balāni bodhyaṅgāni ārya aṣṭāṅgaḥ mārgaḥ prakṛti śūnyaḥ sa na adhyātmam na bahirdhā na ubhayam antareṇa upalabhyate

analyzed: evam apramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpatti abhijñā samādhi dhāraṇī mukha bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvidaḥ

analyzed: anena āyuṣman śāriputra paryāyeṇa sarva dharmāḥ a niśritāḥ

analyzed: prakṛti śūnyatām upādāya evam hi āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā rūpam pariśodhayitavyam

analyzed: iti sarva ākārajña tā niryāṇam
