original: iyam ucyate laukikī dānapāramiteti. tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra lokato na calati noccalati na saṃkrāmati,
analyzed: iyam ucyate laukikī dāna pāramitā iti tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra lokataḥ na calati na uccalati na saṃkrāmati

original: tenocyate laukikī dānapāramiteti.
analyzed: tena ucyate laukikī dāna pāramitā iti

original: tatra katamā lokottarā dānapāramitā?
analyzed: tatra katamā lokottarā dāna pāramitā

original: yad uta trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ. tatra katamā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ?
analyzed: yat uta tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ tatra katamā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ

original: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan nātmānam upalabhate pratigrāhakaṃ nopalabhate dānaṃ ca nopalabhate,
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dānam dadan na ātmānam upalabhate pratigrāhakam na upalabhate dānam ca na upalabhate

original: tad vipākaṃ ca nopalabhate,
analyzed: tat vipākam ca na upalabhate

original: iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhiḥ.
analyzed: iyam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tri maṇḍala pariśuddhiḥ

original: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadan sarvasattvebhyas tad dānaṃ niryātayati,
analyzed: punar aparam āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dānam dadan sarva sattvebhyaḥ tat dānam niryātayati

original: sattvāṃś ca nopalabhate,
analyzed: sattvān ca na upalabhate

original: ātmānaṃ ca nopalabhate,
analyzed: ātmānam ca na upalabhate

original: tac ca dānam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: tat ca dānam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: na ca bodhim upalabhate. iyam ucyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti.
analyzed: na ca bodhim upalabhate iyam ucyate lokottarā dāna pāramitā iti

original: kena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti?
analyzed: kena kāraṇena ucyate lokottarā dāna pāramitā iti

original: tathā hy āyuṣman śāriputra lokāc calati uccalati saṃkrāmati,
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣman śāriputra lokāt calati uccalati saṃkrāmati

original: tena kāraṇenocyate lokottarā dānapāramiteti,
analyzed: tena kāraṇena ucyate lokottarā dāna pāramitā iti

original: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā.
analyzed: evam śīla pāramitā kṣānti pāramitā vīrya pāramitā dhyāna pāramitā

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: katamāyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitā laukikī,
analyzed: katamā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitā laukikī

original: katamā lokottarā?
analyzed: katamā lokottarā

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: laukikī āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā,
analyzed: laukikī āyuṣman śāriputra prajñāpāramitā

original: iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadāti upalambhaniśrito mātsaryacittaṃ mayā nigrahītavyam iti,
analyzed: iha bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ dānam dadāti upalambha niśritaḥ mātsarya cittam mayā nigrahītavyam iti

original: tac cātmasattvadānasaṃjñāniśritaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajati bāhyaṃ vā adhyātmikaṃ vā vastu upāttaṃ vā anupāttaṃ vā nāsti kiṃcid yaṃ na parityajati,
analyzed: tat ca ātma sattva dāna saṃjñā niśritaḥ sarva svam parityajati bāhyam vā adhyātmikam vā vastu upāttam vā anupāttam vā na asti kiṃcid yam na parityajati

original: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ bodhaye pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhaniśritaḥ,
analyzed: tat ca kuśala mūlam bodhaye pariṇāmayati sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā upalambha niśritaḥ

original: sa śīlaṃ sevate dhūtaguṇapratiṣṭhitaḥ,
analyzed: sa śīlam sevate dhūta guṇa pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: kāyavākcittopalambhaniśritas (PvsP1-2: 170)
analyzed: kāya vāc citta upalambha niśritaḥ

original: tāṃś ca daśa kuśalān karmapathān sevamānaḥ,
analyzed: tān ca daśa kuśalān karma pathān sevamānaḥ

original: ātmadṛṣṭyāṃ sattvadṛṣṭyāṃ kuśaladṛṣṭyāṃ niśrito bodhim upalabhya sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni śīlāni bodhaye pariṇāmayati tac copalambhena,
analyzed: ātma dṛṣṭyām sattva dṛṣṭyām kuśala dṛṣṭyām niśritaḥ bodhim upalabhya sarva sattva sādhāraṇāni śīlāni bodhaye pariṇāmayati tat ca upalambhena

original: ātmānam utkarṣayati parān paṃsayati.
analyzed: ātmānam utkarṣayati parān paṃsayati

original: sa sarvasattvānāṃ duṣkṛtāni kṣamate,
analyzed: sa sarva sattvānām duṣkṛtāni kṣamate

original: ātmasattvakṣāntidṛṣṭiniśritas tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogena.
analyzed: ātma sattva kṣānti dṛṣṭi niśritaḥ tat ca kuśala mūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā upalambha yogena

original: sa vīryam ārabhate kāyam upalambhamānaś cittam upalambhamānaḥ puṇyasaṃbhāram upalambhamānaḥ,
analyzed: sa vīryam ārabhate kāyam upalambhamānaḥ cittam upalambhamānaḥ puṇya saṃbhāram upalambhamānaḥ

original: jñānasaṃbhāram upalambhamānaḥ,
analyzed: jñāna saṃbhāram upalambhamānaḥ

original: ātmānam upalambhamānaḥ,
analyzed: ātmānam upalambhamānaḥ

original: bodhim upalambhamānas tena ca vīryārambhena manyate,
analyzed: bodhim upalambhamānaḥ tena ca vīrya ārambhena manyate

original: tac ca sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā upalambhayogenānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
analyzed: tat ca sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā upalambha yogena anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: sa maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṃ bhāvayati dhyānasamāpattīḥ samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca tā āsvādayati,
analyzed: sa maitrī karuṇā muditā upekṣām bhāvayati dhyāna samāpattīḥ samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca tāḥ āsvādayati

original: tā āsvādayan manyate sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni ca kuśalamūlāni upalambhadṛṣṭiko bodhāya pariṇāmayati. iyam ucyate laukikī prajñāpāramitā.
analyzed: tāḥ āsvādayan manyate sarva sattva sādhāraṇāni ca kuśala mūlāni upalambha dṛṣṭikaḥ bodhāya pariṇāmayati iyam ucyate laukikī prajñāpāramitā

original: sa śūnyatāṃ bhāvayan rūpaṃ śūnyam ity upalabhate,
analyzed: sa śūnyatām bhāvayan rūpam śūnyam iti upalabhate

original: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānaṃ śūnyam ity upalabhate,
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānam śūnyam iti upalabhate

original: yāvad buddhabodhiṃ copalabhate upalambhayogena,
analyzed: yāvat buddha bodhim ca upalabhate upalambha yogena

original: tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
analyzed: tāni kuśala mūlāni sarva sattva sādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati

original: taṃ copalambhayogena,
analyzed: tam ca upalambha yogena

original: sarvapāpaṃ pratideśayaty upalambhayogena,
analyzed: sarva pāpam pratideśayati upalambha yogena

original: ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca puṇyam anumodate,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca pareṣām ca puṇyam anumodate

original: ātmanaś ca parasya cārthāya upalabhamānaḥ sarvabuddhān adhyeṣayate,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca parasya ca arthāya upalabhamānaḥ sarva buddhān adhyeṣayate

original: anupāyena triḥkṛtvaḥ puṇyaṃ sarvajñatāyai pariṇāmayati sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā. iyam ucyate laukikī prajñāpāramitā
analyzed: anupāyena tris kṛtvas puṇyam sarvajña tāyai pariṇāmayati sarva sattva sādhāraṇam kṛtvā iyam ucyate laukikī prajñāpāramitā

original: tatra katamā lokottarā prajñāpāramitā?
analyzed: tatra katamā lokottarā prajñāpāramitā

original: ātmasattvadeyabodhyanupalabdhyā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā dānapāramitāṃ pariśodhayati,
analyzed: ātma sattva deya bodhi anupalabdhyā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhyā dāna pāramitām pariśodhayati

analyzed: bodhāya ātma sattva kṣamā bodhi anupalabdhyā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhyā kṣānti pāramitām pariśodhayati

original: bodhāya cātmakāyacittavīryapuṇyajñānabodhyanupalabdhyā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā vīryapāramitāṃ pariśodhayati,
analyzed: bodhāya ca ātma kāya citta vīrya puṇya jñāna bodhi anupalabdhyā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhyā vīrya pāramitām pariśodhayati

original: bodhāya ātmasattvadhyānasamādhisamāpattibodhyānupalabdhyā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā dhyānapāramitāṃ (PvsP1-2: 171)
analyzed: bodhāya ātma sattva dhyāna samādhi samāpatti bodhya anupalabdhyā tri maṇḍala pariśuddhyā dhyāna pāramitām

analyzed: pariśodhayati

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

analyzed: katamasyāḥ āyuṣman subhūte pāramitāyāḥ ayam puruṣakāraḥ

analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: prajñāpāramitā āyuṣman (PvsP1-2: 172)
analyzed: prajñāpāramitā āyuṣman

original: śāriputra pratigrāhikā sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ,
analyzed: śāriputra pratigrāhikā sarveṣām kuśalānām dharmāṇām śrāvaka pratyekabuddha dharmāṇām bodhisattva dharmāṇām

original: prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣman śāriputra śikṣitvā taiḥ paurvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām āyuṣman śāriputra śikṣitvā taiḥ paurvakaiḥ tathāgataiḥ arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ abhisaṃbuddhā

original: anāgatā apy āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
analyzed: anāgatāḥ api āyuṣman śāriputra tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ iha eva prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitvā anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante

original: ye 'py etarhi āyuṣman śāriputra daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
analyzed: ye pi etarhi āyuṣman śāriputra daśasu dikṣu loke tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmam deśayanti

original: te 'pi sarve ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ.
analyzed: te pi sarve iha eva prajñāpāramitāyām śikṣitvā anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ

original: sacet punar āyuṣman śāriputra asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvasya
analyzed: saced punar āyuṣman śāriputra asyām prajñāpāramitāyām bhāṣyamāṇāyām bodhisattvasya

original: mahāsattvasya na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ na bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ veditavyam etad
analyzed: mahāsattvasya na bhavati kāṅkṣāyita tvam na bhavati dhanvāyita tvam veditavyam etat

original: āyuaṣman śāriputra viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇāvirahitaś cānena
analyzed: āyuaṣman śāriputra viharati ayam bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ nena vihāreṇa avirahitaḥ ca anena

original: manasikāreṇa yad uta sarvasattvaparitrāṇāya sarvasattvāparityāgamanasikāreṇa mahākaruṇāmanasikāreṇa.

original: śāriputra āha:
analyzed: śāriputraḥ āha

original: yad āyuṣman subhūte evam āha,
analyzed: yat āyuṣman subhūte evam āha

original: viharaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena vihāreṇāvirahitaś cānena manasikāreṇeti,
analyzed: viharati ayam bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ nena vihāreṇa avirahitaḥ ca anena manasikāreṇa iti

original: evaṃ saty āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā api bodhisattva bhaviṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: evam sati āyuṣman subhūte sarva sattvāḥ api bodhisattva bhaviṣyanti tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hy āyuṣman subhūte sarvasattvā avirahitā manasikāreṇa.
analyzed: tathā hi āyuṣman subhūte sarva sattvāḥ avirahitāḥ manasikāreṇa

original: subhūtir āha:
analyzed: subhūtiḥ āha

original: sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra upālapsye tvāṃ artha evāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
analyzed: sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra upālapsye tvām arthaḥ eva āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūta pada abhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ

original: sattvāsattayāyuṣman śāriputra manasikārāsattā veditavyā,
analyzed: sattva asat tayā āyuṣman śāriputra manasikāra asattā veditavyā

original: sattvasūnyatayā manasikāraśūnyatā veditavyā,
analyzed: sattva sūnyatayā manasikāra śūnyatā veditavyā

original: sattvāsvabhāvatayā manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā,
analyzed: sattva asvabhāva tayā manasikāra asvabhāva tā veditavyā

original: sattvaviviktatayā manasikāraviviktatā veditavyā,
analyzed: sattva vivikta tayā manasikāra vivikta tā veditavyā

original: sattvānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā,
analyzed: sattva an abhisaṃbodhana tayā manasikāra an abhisaṃbodhana tā veditavyā

original: rūpāsattayā rūpaśūnyatayā rūpāsvabhāvatayā rūpaviviktatayā rūpānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā,
analyzed: rūpa asattayā rūpa śūnya tayā rūpa asvabhāva tayā rūpa vivikta tayā rūpa anabhisaṃbodhana tayā manasikāra anabhisaṃbodhana tā veditavyā

original: vedanā saṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñānāsattayā vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānāsvabhāvatayā vijñānaviviktatayā vijñānānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatāveditavyā.
analyzed: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñāna asattayā vijñāna śūnya tayā vijñāna asvabhāva tayā vijñāna vivikta tayā vijñāna anabhisaṃbodhana tayā manasikāra anabhisaṃbodhana tā veditavyā

original: evaṃ vyastasamasteṣu skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu satyabodhipakṣyadharmapāramitāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣv
analyzed: evam vyasta samasteṣu skandha dhātu āyatana pratītyasamutpādeṣu satya bodhi pakṣya dharma pāramitā pramāṇa dhyāna ārūpya samāpattiṣu

original: abhijñāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsu
analyzed: abhijñāsu sarva śūnyatāsu sarva samādhiṣu sarva dhāraṇī mukheṣu daśa bala vaiśāradya pratisaṃvitsu

original: aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sarvākārajñatāsattayā sarvākārajñatāśūnyatayā sarvākārajñatāsvabhāvatayā
analyzed: aṣṭādaśa āveṇikeṣu buddha dharmeṣu sarva ākārajñatā sattayā sarva ākārajñatā śūnyatayā sarva ākārajñatā svabhāva tayā

original: sarvākārajñatāviviktatayā sarvākārajñatānabhisaṃbodhanatayā manasikārānabhisaṃbodhanatā veditavyā.
analyzed: sarva ākārajña tā vivikta tayā sarva ākārajña tā an abhisaṃbodhana tayā manasikāra an abhisaṃbodhana tā veditavyā

original: anenāyuṣman śāriputra vihāreṇānena ca manasikāraṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti.
analyzed: anena āyuṣman śāriputra vihāreṇa anena ca manasi kāraṇā virahitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ iti

original: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāram adāt

original: sādhu sādhu subhūte,
analyzed: sādhu sādhu subhūte

original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā yathā tvam
analyzed: evam hi subhūte bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitā upadeṣṭavyā yathā tvam

original: upadiśasi yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvenaivaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
analyzed: upadiśasi yathā api nāma tathāgata anubhāvena evam bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām

original: caritavyaṃ yathā tvam upadiśasi.
analyzed: caritavyam yathā tvam upadiśasi

original: asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitā parivarte āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇe trisāhasramahāsāhasro
analyzed: asmin khalu punar prajñāpāramitā parivarte āyuṣmatā subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇe tri sāhasra mahā sāhasraḥ

original: lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍ vikāraṃ prakampito yāvat pūrvottaradakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ vidiśy unnāmāvanāmaṃ
analyzed: lokadhātuḥ ṣaṣ vikāram prakampitaḥ yāvat pūrva uttara dakṣiṇa paścimāyām vidiśi unnāma avanāmam

original: gacchanti sma. atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot.
analyzed: gacchanti sma atha khalu bhagavān tasyām velāyām smitam akarot

original: atha khalv āytiṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
analyzed: atha khalu āytiṣmān subhūtiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

original: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kāḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya?
analyzed: kaḥ bhagavan hetuḥ kāḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya

original: bhagavān āha:
analyzed: bhagavān āha

original: yathaiva subhūte iha lokadhātau tathāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśati tathaiva pūrvasyāṃ
analyzed: yathā eva subhūte iha lokadhātau tathāgataḥ prajñāpāramitām nirdiśati tathā eva pūrvasyām

original: diśy asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bodhisattvānāṃ
analyzed: diśi asaṃkhyeyeṣu aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatāḥ arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ bodhisattvānām

original: mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣante,
analyzed: mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām bhāṣante

original: evaṃ samantād daśasu dikṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśanti,
analyzed: evam samantāt daśasu dikṣu asaṃkhyeyeṣu aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām prajñāpāramitām nirdiśanti

original: asmin khalu punaḥ subhūtinā prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvādaśānām ayutānāṃ devamānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho
analyzed: asmin khalu punar subhūtinā prajñāpāramitā nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvādaśānām ayutānām deva mānuṣikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ anutpattikadharmakṣānti pratilambhaḥ

original: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
analyzed: teṣām api buddhānām bhagavatām samantāt daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu imām prajñāpāramitām

original: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ bhāṣamāṇānām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānām anuttarāyāṃ
analyzed: bodhisattvānām mahāsattvānām bhāṣamāṇānām asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānām sattvānām anuttarāyām

original: samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni.
analyzed: samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpannāni

original: iti mārganiryāṇam
analyzed: iti mārga niryāṇam

original: ity uktā niryāṇapratipattir
analyzed: iti uktā niryāṇa pratipattiḥ

original: ity uktā sarvākārajñatā
analyzed: iti uktā sarva ākāra jña tā

original: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ sarvākārajñatādhikāraḥ subhūtiparivartaḥ
analyzed: ārya pañcaviṃśati sāhasrikāyām bhagavatyām prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamaya alaṃkāra anusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyām sarva ākārajña tā adhikāraḥ subhūti parivartaḥ
